original: @104b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @104b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i buddha ka p'a li tantra s+ya panytsi k'a dzny'a na ba ti n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i buddha ka p'a li tantra s+ya panytsi k'a dzny'a na ba ti n'a ma /
translated: Śrībuddhakapālatantrasya pañcikā jñānavatī nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Buddha's Skull Tantra called Endowed with Wisdom

original: dpal he tu ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal he tu ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Hetuka.

original: bsgrub bya phra gzugs mchog tu bde 'byung dga' ba bcu drug ster byed dam //
analyzed: bsgrub bya phra gzugs mchog tu bde 'byung dga' ba bcu drug ster byed dam //
translated: The object of attainment is the subtle form, the giver of the sixteen joys arising from supreme bliss,

original: mdun nang thig le'i steng sgra yongs shes sems dngos rang bzhin te /
analyzed: mdun nang thig le'i steng sgra yongs shes sems dngos rang bzhin te /
translated: The essence of mind, the nature of sound, on the bindu in front and inside,

original: rang gi dga' ba'i rten gzugs yon tan sdud pa byang chub tshogs snying po //
analyzed: rang gi dga' ba'i rten gzugs yon tan sdud pa byang chub tshogs snying po //
translated: The form that is the basis of one's joy, the essence of the accumulation of qualities and enlightenment,

original: dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin srid pa'i 'jigs sel sna tshogs sde phyag 'tshal //🔽sna tshogs sde mas bshad pa yi //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin srid pa'i 'jigs sel sna tshogs sde phyag 'tshal // sna tshogs sde mas bshad pa yi //
translated: The essence of existence that removes the fear of existence, I pay homage to the various armies.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud //
translated: The tantra of the Buddha's skull,🔽Which was explained by the mother of the various armies,

original: ji ltar bla mas bshad pa dang // ji ltar rgyud gzhan dag mthong ba //
analyzed: ji ltar bla mas bshad pa dang // ji ltar rgyud gzhan dag mthong ba //
translated: Just as explained by the guru, and just as seen in other tantras,

original: de ltar cung zad bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: de ltar cung zad bdag gis bshad //
translated: I have explained it a little bit.

original: de la re zhig rjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ston te /🔽rjod par byed pa ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de la re zhig rjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ston te / rjod par byed pa ni rgyud do //
translated: In this regard, first of all, the statement, the object of statement, the purpose, and the purpose of the purpose are taught.🔽The statement is the tantra.

original: brjod par bya ba ni rgyud kyi don to //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ni rgyud kyi don to //
translated: The object of statement is the meaning of the tantra.

original: dgos pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: The purpose is the realization of the deity yoga.

original: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni sems can gyi don gyis bya ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni sems can gyi don gyis bya ba byed pa'o //
translated: The purpose of the purpose is the performance of activities for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: gal te yang bcom ldan 'das nyid ston pa po la sogs pa'i gzugs su bzhugs mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te yang bcom ldan 'das nyid ston pa po la sogs pa'i gzugs su bzhugs mod kyi /
translated: Even though the Blessed One himself abides in the form of the teacher and so forth,

original: 'on kyang bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i gzugs su logs su bstan to /
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i gzugs su logs su bstan to /
translated: nevertheless, he himself is separately taught in the form of the Blessed Lady.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma las phyag na rdo rjes thos so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma las phyag na rdo rjes thos so //
translated: Then, Vajrapāṇi heard from the Blessed Lady.

original: rgyud sdud par bzhed nas der 'di skad ces bya ba gsungs pa ni /🔽sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: rgyud sdud par bzhed nas der 'di skad ces bya ba gsungs pa ni / sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
translated: Wishing to compile the tantra, he said this:🔽Thus have I heard are the words of compilation.

original: thos pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ma las bdag gis thos zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: thos pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ma las bdag gis thos zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Heard is to be supplied in this way: In this way, I have heard from the Blessed Lady.

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la /
translated: Thus have I heard is as follows.

original: ae ni sar gsungs te /
analyzed: ae ni sar gsungs te /
translated: E is said to be earth,

original: de ni spyan ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni spyan ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the nature of Locanā.

original: wam ni chur gsungs te /
analyzed: wam ni chur gsungs te /
translated: Vam is said to be water,

original: de ni m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the nature of Māmakī.

original: ma ni mer gsungs te /
analyzed: ma ni mer gsungs te /
translated: Ma is said to be fire,

original: de ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the nature of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: y'a ni rlung du gsungs te /
analyzed: y'a ni rlung du gsungs te /
translated: Ya is said to be wind,

original: de ni sgrol ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni sgrol ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the nature of Tārā.

original: yi ge bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhir yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhir yang dag par bshad do //
translated: The four syllables are also explained as the four seals.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gro ba rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gro ba rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
translated: Since the world is sealed by the nature of emptiness, it is a seal.

original: bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for I have heard,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pas thos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pas thos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not that it was heard by the ear consciousness.

original: 'o na ci zhe @105a * //🔽na ; dus gcig gi tshe na'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe @105a * // na ; dus gcig gi tshe na'o //
translated: Then what?🔽At one time.

original: dus gcig na zhes pa la /
analyzed: dus gcig na zhes pa la /
translated: As for at one time,

original: dus ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: dus ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: there are three times:

original: bde ba'i dus dang / sdug bsngal gyi dus dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nyid do //
analyzed: bde ba'i dus dang / sdug bsngal gyi dus dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nyid do //
translated: the time of pleasure, the time of pain, and the inconceivable time.

original: 'jug pa'i rlung ni bde ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rlung ni bde ba'i dus so //
translated: The engaging vāyu is the time of pleasure.

original: 'byung ba'i rlung ni sdug bsngal gyi dus so //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i rlung ni sdug bsngal gyi dus so //
translated: The wind of manifestation is the time of suffering.

original: 'di dag gnyis med par son pa'i rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab par son pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di dag gnyis med par son pa'i rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab par son pa'i dus so //
translated: The nature of the attainment of the nonduality of these two is the time of the attainment of the inconceivable.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la skal ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir na bcom ldan no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la skal ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir na bcom ldan no //
translated: The Blessed One, because of the perfection of good fortune, is the Blessed One.

original: bdud bzhi bcom pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan no //
analyzed: bdud bzhi bcom pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan no //
translated: And because of the destruction of the four demons, he is the Blessed One.

original: 'di la bcom pa yod pas na bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di la bcom pa yod pas na bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs so //
translated: He is the Blessed One because he has destruction in this world.🔽The body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas is the vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba la thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba la thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: All of them are Tathagatas, therefore they are all the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs nyid rdo rje ste mi shes pa'i ri gcod pas rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs nyid rdo rje ste mi shes pa'i ri gcod pas rdo rje'o //
translated: Their body, speech, and mind are the vajra, because they cut through the mountain of ignorance.

original: mi shes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams mi shes pa ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams mi shes pa ste /
translated: Ignorance is the ignorance of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the meaning of the term “obstruction to omniscience. ”

original: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te shes rab kyi gzugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te shes rab kyi gzugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The vajra is nondual intuition, the meaning of the term “form of wisdom. ”

original: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba la /🔽dkyil 'khor chen po yang yin la //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba la / dkyil 'khor chen po yang yin la //
translated: In the center of the great mandala endowed with ornaments.

original: rgyan dang ldan pa yang yin pas na dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rgyan dang ldan pa yang yin pas na dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
translated: It is a great mandala, and it is endowed with ornaments, thus it is the great mandala endowed with ornaments.

original: de nyid dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nyid dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: That itself is the mandala.

original: dkyil ni snying po'o //
analyzed: dkyil ni snying po'o //
translated: The center is the essence.

original: 'khor ni len pa ste snying po len zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ni len pa ste snying po len zhes pa'o //
translated: The circle is the taking up of the essence, the taking up of the essence.

original: de'i dbus su dang po bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes 'chad pa 'gyur ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i dbus su dang po bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes 'chad pa 'gyur ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: In the center of that, the Bhagavat, having passed into nirvāṇa, is explained as connected with the future.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhes ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhes ce na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'o //
translated: All tathāgatas means the five buddhas Vairochana and so on, whose nature is the five aggregates.

original: rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The yoginis are

original: gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Yamadamstrini and the others.

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis brgyan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis brgyan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: They are present means that they are the ornaments of that place.

original: gnas der 'khor gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnas der 'khor gsungs pa /
translated: The retinue in that place is stated:

original: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge 'dun rnams @105b kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskor zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge 'dun rnams @105b kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskor zhes pa'o //
translated: The noble Ananda and the others, the Sangha of the passionless, surround the Bhagavat.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do zhes pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do zhes pa de gsungs pa /
translated: It is not only the passionless who surround him, so it is said:

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The noble Avalokitesvara and the others means that the great bodhisattvas, the noble Avalokitesvara and the others, surround him.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is also together with eighty kotis of bodhisattvas.

original: bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i grangs su bgrangs pa dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i grangs su bgrangs pa dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that they are counted among the eighty-four hundred thousand.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: Those who are endowed with the bodhisattva's effort are the bodhisattvas.

original: thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes pa ni /
translated: The phrase dwelling together means

original: dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that he dwells in the middle of the mandala together with the bodhisattvas.

original: rnam pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid gsungs pa /🔽de nas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa ni /
translated: The verse states the very nirvana of the Lord.🔽The phrase then means

original: de'i rjes thogs su zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs su zhes pa'o //
translated: immediately after that.

original: aa ni thig le'i gzugs so //
analyzed: aa ni thig le'i gzugs so //
translated: The syllable a is the form of the bindu.

original: tha ni bcom ldan 'das gang gi thugs thig ler gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tha ni bcom ldan 'das gang gi thugs thig ler gnas pa'o //
translated: The syllable tha is the bindu in which the Lord's mind abides.

original: de nyid kyi khyad par ji lta bu yin snyam pa la rdo rje'i tshig gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par ji lta bu yin snyam pa la rdo rje'i tshig gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What is the special quality of that? It is stated with the words with the vajra words.

original: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes shes rab kyi ngo bo ste sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes shes rab kyi ngo bo ste sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the essence of the wisdom of nondual intuition, and it is located in the emanation wheel.

original: de'i tshig ni chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i tshig ni chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Its word is the nature of the means located in the dharma wheel.

original: 'di dag gnyis su med par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: 'di dag gnyis su med par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Bhagavān is the nature of their nonduality.

original: rdo rje chen po'i gnas su zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang gi gnas te /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i gnas su zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang gi gnas te /
translated: In the abode of the great vajra means in the abode of the state of the Great Vajradhara.

original: des na chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des na chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is together with the dharma wheel and the emanation wheel.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is its distinction?

original: rgyud thams cad dang sngags yang dag par bshad ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyud thams cad dang sngags yang dag par bshad ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “the perfect explanation of all tantras and mantras.”

original: rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni 'dus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni 'dus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: By the words “all tantras” are meant the Guhyasamāja and so forth.

original: sngags ni aa dang h'um la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni aa dang h'um la sogs pa'o //
translated: Mantras are the a, hūṃ, and so forth.

original: de dag gi gnas su yang dag par bshad pa ni bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de dag gi gnas su yang dag par bshad pa ni bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Their perfect explanation is the abode of great bliss.

original: des na khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhu bar gyur snyam pa la /
analyzed: des na khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhu bar gyur snyam pa la /
translated: Therefore, one should think, “In what way is the Bhagavān melted?”

original: @106a * // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes smos te /
analyzed: @106a * // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes smos te /
translated: The phrase “the lord of all tathāgatas” is stated.

original: rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: He is Vajradhara.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The glorious lord of all buddhas,

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang chen go 'phang ste //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang chen go 'phang ste //
translated: the state of great Vajradhara,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byung ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byung ba //
translated: arises from the method of all buddhas,

original: de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do // zhes gsungs te /
translated: and that is the reality of all phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that he is the one who generates all buddhas.

original: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “through the union of the vajra and lotus” means

original: rdo rje padmar bsnun pa de'i sbyor bas yang dag par bde ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padmar bsnun pa de'i sbyor bas yang dag par bde ba'o //
translated: that through the union of the vajra and lotus, there is perfect bliss.

original: btsun mo'i bha gar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: btsun mo'i bha gar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “in the bhaga of the queen” means

original: spyan ma la sogs pa'i btsun mo'i bha gar ro ;
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa'i btsun mo'i bha gar ro ;
translated: in the bhaga of the queen such as Buddhalocanā and so on.

original: ; yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs su zhu bar gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ; yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs su zhu bar gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Parinirvāṇa” means “dissolution into the form of the thought of awakening.”

original: yongs su ni kun du'o //
analyzed: yongs su ni kun du'o //
translated: “Completely” means “in every way.”

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni rnam par rtog pa las nges par byung ba ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni rnam par rtog pa las nges par byung ba ste /
translated: “Nirvāṇa” means “having come forth from conceptualization.”

original: de ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means “having the nature of the body of truth.”

original: de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Having seen his parinirvāṇa” means

original: chos kyi sku de gzigs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos kyi sku de gzigs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “having seen that body of truth.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces pa ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' 'ang yin la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces pa ni / byang chub sems dpa' 'ang yin la /
translated: “All the bodhisattvas” means

original: thams cad kyang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug go //
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug go //
translated: those who are bodhisattvas and all of them are the six sense-faculties of eye, etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma thams cad ces bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba rang bzhin med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa dang / thabs kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma thams cad ces bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba rang bzhin med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa dang / thabs kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: All yoginis means that which is the nature of method and wisdom, and is the wisdom of the absence of intrinsic existence, and the characteristic of the entity of method.

original: gang dag la de dag yod pa de ni rnal 'byor ma ste /
analyzed: gang dag la de dag yod pa de ni rnal 'byor ma ste /
translated: Those who have those are yoginis,

original: rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //🔽rmad du gyur te zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no // rmad du gyur te zhes pa ni /
translated: the nature of all channels.🔽Marvelous means

original: ngo mtshar du gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: astonishing.

original: gcig la gcig lta zhing zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gcig la gcig lta zhing zhes pa ni /
translated: Looking at each other means

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor ma rnams phan tshun du lta zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor ma rnams phan tshun du lta zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that the bodhisattvas and yoginis look at each other.

original: ci zhig smra zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig smra zhe na /
translated: What do they say?

original: ae ma'o zhes gsungs te /🔽ae ni shes rab yin la /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes gsungs te / ae ni shes rab yin la /
translated: They say, Ema!🔽 Ema is said to be wisdom,

original: ma ni thabs su gsungs te /
analyzed: ma ni thabs su gsungs te /
translated: and o is method.

original: 'o ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'o ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means why?

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The Blessed One is the concentration of the union of the nature of means and insight.

original: de bzhin @106b gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin @106b gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The Lord of all the Tathagatas is Vajradhara, the nature of all the Tathagatas.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the center of the great mandala endowed with ornaments.🔽The mandala is that which is adorned with the Sangha of the passionless, with many Bodhisattvas, with all the Tathagatas, and with the assembly of yoginis.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor de ni dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor de ni dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The great mandala endowed with ornaments is the mandala.

original: de'i dbus kyi gnas su'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus kyi gnas su'o //
translated: In the center of that.

original: ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni /
translated: How does he pass into Nirvana?

original: ji ltar chos skur gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar chos skur gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: How does he become the Dharma Body?

original: sna tshogs sde ma la som nyi 'di zhus te /
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma la som nyi 'di zhus te /
translated: Having asked this question to the various-clan yoginī,

original: de nas zhes pa ni nge ma thag tu zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni nge ma thag tu zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: then has the meaning of immediately.

original: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma zhes bya ba ni gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma zhes bya ba ni gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa ste /
translated: The various-clan yoginī is the channel located in the secret place.

original: de'i sna tshogs ni ngo mtshar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sna tshogs ni ngo mtshar byed pa'o //
translated: Her variousness is the cause of wonder.

original: sde ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te ;
analyzed: sde ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te ;
translated: The clan is the exalted wisdom of great bliss.

original: de nyid theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid theg pa chen po'o //
translated: That itself is the Great Vehicle.

original: gnyi ga'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni /
translated: Endowed with the union of both,

original: rnal 'byor mar brjod de de nyid lha mo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mar brjod de de nyid lha mo'o //
translated: she is called a yoginī, and she herself is the goddess.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa la /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi said this:

original: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Vajra is nondual exalted wisdom.

original: de'i phyag gang la yod pa de ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag gang la yod pa de ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
translated: He who has it in his hand is Vajrapāṇi.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He who has the bodhisattva's diligence is a bodhisattva.

original: sems dpa' yang yin pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' yang yin pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: Since he is also a hero, he is a mahāsattva.

original: sems dpa'i ni rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te /
analyzed: sems dpa'i ni rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te /
translated: The bodhisattva is said to be of two kinds:

original: skal ba bzang po dang skal ba ngan pa'o ;🔽/'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni /
analyzed: skal ba bzang po dang skal ba ngan pa'o ; /'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni /
translated: fortunate and unfortunate.🔽The phrase he said this means

original: 'di skad du zhus te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di skad du zhus te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: he said this.

original: ci zhig smras snyam pa la gsungs pa lha mo zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig smras snyam pa la gsungs pa lha mo zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: What was said? Goddess is the Tibetan for devī.

original: bsod nams dman pa zhes pa ni yid 'dul ba med pas na bsod nams dman pa ste /
analyzed: bsod nams dman pa zhes pa ni yid 'dul ba med pas na bsod nams dman pa ste /
translated: Those of little merit are those of little merit because they do not have a disciplined mind,

original: bsod nams dman pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams so //
analyzed: bsod nams dman pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams so //
translated: that is, those sentient beings who have little merit.

original: nus pa la zhon par 'gyur ba zhes pa la /
analyzed: nus pa la zhon par 'gyur ba zhes pa la /
translated: They will mount the capacity, where

original: nus pa ni rnam pa mang po'o //
analyzed: nus pa ni rnam pa mang po'o //
translated: capacity is of many kinds.

original: de la zhon pa ni sems kyis btsugs pa yin par bzhed do //
analyzed: de la zhon pa ni sems kyis btsugs pa yin par bzhed do //
translated: Mounting that is asserted to be established by the mind.

original: thabs cung zad mchis sam zhes pa ni thabs cung zad mchis sam zhes pa'i 'dod pa @107a * //
analyzed: thabs cung zad mchis sam zhes pa ni thabs cung zad mchis sam zhes pa'i 'dod pa @107a * //
translated: Is there any means? is the desire to ask,

original: ste ; lha mo la zhus pa'o //
analyzed: ste ; lha mo la zhus pa'o //
translated: Is there any means? to the goddess.

original: gsungs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la ni bye ba phrag drug nyid do //
analyzed: gsungs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la ni bye ba phrag drug nyid do //
translated: It was said, In the yoga tantras there are six hundred million.

original: bye ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnam pa drug la'o //
analyzed: bye ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnam pa drug la'o //
translated: The Yoga Tantras are of six kinds.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid do zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnam pa bcu drug la'o ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid do zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnam pa bcu drug la'o ;
translated: The Yoginī Tantras are of sixteen kinds.

original: ; mdo sde so so la ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'o zhes pa la /
analyzed: ; mdo sde so so la ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'o zhes pa la /
translated: Each of the sūtras has eighty kinds.

original: mdo sde so so la rnam pa brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: mdo sde so so la rnam pa brgyad cu'o //
translated: Each of the sūtras has eighty kinds.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la ni bye ba bsgos pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o zhes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la ni bye ba bsgos pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o zhes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The Pāramitāyāna is of five kinds.

original: gzhung rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas rgyas par ma bris so //
analyzed: gzhung rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas rgyas par ma bris so //
translated: Fearing prolixity, I have not written extensively.

original: 'di dag thams cad ces pa ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dang / mdo sde dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ces pa ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dang / mdo sde dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa rnams so //
translated: All these are the Yoga and Yoginī Tantras, the sūtras, and the Pāramitāyāna.

original: thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po'o //
translated: The Lord of Sages is the lord of the Tathāgatas.

original: gsungs zhes pa ni bshad ces pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes pa ni bshad ces pa'o //
translated: Said means explained.

original: sngags zhes pa ni yid skyob par gyur pas na sngags so //
analyzed: sngags zhes pa ni yid skyob par gyur pas na sngags so //
translated: The word “mantra” is so called because it protects the mind.

original: dang zhes pa ni gang gi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dang zhes pa ni gang gi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The word “and” has the meaning of “because.”

original: bral na zhes pa ni ma rtogs par zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bral na zhes pa ni ma rtogs par zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The word “without” has the meaning of “without understanding.”

original: rgyud kyi nus pa mi snang ste zhes pa la /
analyzed: rgyud kyi nus pa mi snang ste zhes pa la /
translated: “The power of the tantra does not appear” means

original: rgyud pa klags pa tsam la ni nus pa dang stobs med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyud pa klags pa tsam la ni nus pa dang stobs med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that merely reading the tantra does not have the power or strength.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: lus kyis bklags par mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: lus kyis bklags par mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: The body does not become a reader,

original: ngag gis bklags par cir 'gyur gyis //🔽gso dpyad bklags pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: ngag gis bklags par cir 'gyur gyis // gso dpyad bklags pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: and what is the point of the voice reading?🔽How can the sick

original: nad pa rnams ni ji ltar 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: nad pa rnams ni ji ltar 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: become well by merely reading a medical text?

original: da ni rnal 'byor ba tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog rnams kyi bzlas pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor ba tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog rnams kyi bzlas pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now the recitation of the inferior, middling, and superior yogis is taught.

original: rgyud la lar zhes pa ni rgyud kha cig tu'o //
analyzed: rgyud la lar zhes pa ni rgyud kha cig tu'o //
translated: “In some tantras” means in some tantras.

original: ci nas zhes pa ni rnam pa kun nas so //
analyzed: ci nas zhes pa ni rnam pa kun nas so //
translated: “In every way” means in every way.

original: sngags bye ba bzlas zhes pa la rnal 'byor ba tha mas ni /
analyzed: sngags bye ba bzlas zhes pa la rnal 'byor ba tha mas ni /
translated: “Ten million mantras are recited” means that the inferior yogi

original: sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that one should recite the mantra ten million times.

original: bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis ni sngags 'bum bzlas zhes pa ni bsod nams 'bring po'i rnal 'byor ba dang bar mas 'bum bzlas par gsungs te myur bar zhes pa ni mgyogs par zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis ni sngags 'bum bzlas zhes pa ni bsod nams 'bring po'i rnal 'byor ba dang bar mas 'bum bzlas par gsungs te myur bar zhes pa ni mgyogs par zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Those of middling merit should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times. The statement is that the mantra should be recited one hundred thousand times by the middling and average yogis. Quickly means quickly.

original: gang gsungs zhes pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gang gsungs zhes pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: What is stated is explained.

original: bsod nams che bas zhes bya ba la bsod @107b nams che ba'i rnal 'byor mchog gis ni khri bzlas par bshad do //
analyzed: bsod nams che bas zhes bya ba la bsod @107b nams che ba'i rnal 'byor mchog gis ni khri bzlas par bshad do //
translated: Those of great merit should recite the mantra ten thousand times. The statement is that the mantra should be recited ten thousand times by the supreme yogis of great merit.

original: de ltar yang bshad pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang bshad pa /
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: rdzogs ldan dus su yi ge 'bum bzlas te //🔽gnyis ldan dus su sngags pas 'bum phrag gnyis //
analyzed: rdzogs ldan dus su yi ge 'bum bzlas te // gnyis ldan dus su sngags pas 'bum phrag gnyis //
translated: In the age of completeness, one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times.🔽In the age of three-quarters, the mantra should be recited two hundred thousand times.

original: gsum ldan dus su 'bum phrag gsum du 'gyur //
analyzed: gsum ldan dus su 'bum phrag gsum du 'gyur //
translated: In the age of two-quarters, it should be recited three hundred thousand times.

original: bye ba phrag gsum 'bum bzhi rtsod dus sbyar //
analyzed: bye ba phrag gsum 'bum bzhi rtsod dus sbyar //
translated: In the age of strife, it should be recited three million four hundred thousand times.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: rdo rje can chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Great Vajradhara is Great Vajradhara.

original: rnam pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One has taught the mantra recitation in this way.

original: 'khor gyi nang du phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams phan tshun gleng bar byed do //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams phan tshun gleng bar byed do //
translated: In the midst of the assembly, the bodhisattvas such as Vajrapāṇi and the yoginīs such as Yamāri, having conversed with each other,

original: bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams zhes pa ni bsod nams dman pa rnams so //
analyzed: bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams zhes pa ni bsod nams dman pa rnams so //
translated: say, “For those sentient beings of little merit,” meaning those of inferior merit,

original: bye ba bzlas par gsungs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bye ba bzlas par gsungs zhes pa ni /
translated: “the recitation is said to be ten million.”

original: bye ba bzlas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: bye ba bzlas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One has taught the recitation to be ten million.

original: sems can rtsol ba chung pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems can rtsol ba chung pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: “For those sentient beings of little effort,”

original: nyung dus mgu ba'i sems can rnams kyi bzlas pa ni 'bum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyung dus mgu ba'i sems can rnams kyi bzlas pa ni 'bum du 'gyur ro //
translated: the recitation for those sentient beings who are satisfied with little is one hundred thousand.

original: bsgom pa la zhon pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni zhes pa la /
analyzed: bsgom pa la zhon pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni zhes pa la /
translated: “For those sentient beings who are mounted on meditation,”

original: de kho na nyid kyi bsgom pa la zhon par nus pa de kho na nyid kyis sems brlan pa de rnams kyi bzlas pa khrir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi bsgom pa la zhon par nus pa de kho na nyid kyis sems brlan pa de rnams kyi bzlas pa khrir 'gyur ro //
translated: those who are able to mount the meditation on reality, those whose minds are moistened by reality, their recitation is ten thousand.

original: 'dod chags la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dod chags la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Those sentient beings who are engaged in desire means those who are associated with desire, hatred, and so on.

original: sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags zhes bye ba la /
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags zhes bye ba la /
translated: As for how is the recitation of mantras?

original: de dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa'i grangs med ces pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa'i grangs med ces pa'o //
translated: It means the number of recitations of their mantras is not counted.

original: blun pa dang lkugs pa'i rigs can rnams kyi zhes pa ni rmongs pa dang dag pa'i rigs can zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: blun pa dang lkugs pa'i rigs can rnams kyi zhes pa ni rmongs pa dang dag pa'i rigs can zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Those of the class of fools and mutes means those of the class of delusion and purity.

original: grangs ji ltar lags zhes pa la /
analyzed: grangs ji ltar lags zhes pa la /
translated: As for how is the number?

original: sems can de rnams kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa la grangs med ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems can de rnams kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa la grangs med ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means the number of recitations of mantras for those sentient beings is not counted.

original: shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa la gcig tu brtson pa ni sngags kyi bzlas pa dgos pa med de /
analyzed: shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa la gcig tu brtson pa ni sngags kyi bzlas pa dgos pa med de /
translated: As for the recitation of mantras that is extremely focused, those who are solely devoted to meditation do not need the recitation of mantras.

original: sngags kyi bzlas pa bas bsam gtan bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas pa bas bsam gtan bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The merit of concentration increases more than the recitation of mantras.

original: 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas zhes pa la sogs @108a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas zhes pa la sogs @108a * //
translated: As such, through mutual conversation and so on.🔽🔽

original: pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Thus, by mutual conversation and so forth are easy to understand.

original: dman pa'i sems kyis zhes pa ni sngags 'dis dngos grub 'thob bam mi thob ces rnam pa de lta bur gal te byed na'o //
analyzed: dman pa'i sems kyis zhes pa ni sngags 'dis dngos grub 'thob bam mi thob ces rnam pa de lta bur gal te byed na'o //
translated: With a lesser mind means that if one acts in such a way, thinking Will I attain power by this mantra or not?

original: bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang zhes pa ni /
translated: For millions of eons like the stars,

original: ji ltar ji srid du nam mkha' la skar ma gnas pa de srid kyi bskal pa'i grangs su yang dngos grub med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar ji srid du nam mkha' la skar ma gnas pa de srid kyi bskal pa'i grangs su yang dngos grub med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: means that for as long as the stars exist in the sky, for that many eons there is no power, that is the meaning.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus also:

original: thams cad du ni sprul ba'i sku //
analyzed: thams cad du ni sprul ba'i sku //
translated: The emanation body is seen everywhere

original: nyan thos la sogs pa yis mthong //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa yis mthong //
translated: by the hearers and so forth.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs longs spyod //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs longs spyod //
translated: The bodhisattvas see the beatific body,

original: de bzhin chos sku sangs rgyas kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin chos sku sangs rgyas kyis //
translated: and the buddhas see the dharma body.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das de nyid na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnal 'byor ma 'ba' zhig gis mthong ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das de nyid na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnal 'byor ma 'ba' zhig gis mthong ngo //
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavān, dwelling there, is seen only by the Tathāgatas and yoginīs.

original: de ltar thos nas zhes pa la //
analyzed: de ltar thos nas zhes pa la //
translated: Having heard thus, he should not be afraid and so forth.

original: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
analyzed: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
translated: The excellent form of the letter E

original: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: is in the middle, adorned with the letter Vaṃ.

original: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
translated: It is the basis of all bliss,

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces so //
translated: the jewel casket of the Buddha.

original: de'i dbus su 'dzag pa ni /
analyzed: de'i dbus su 'dzag pa ni /
translated: The dripping in its middle

original: 'dir sru shra ba na'i skad kyi dbyings kyi sbyor ba las so //
analyzed: 'dir sru shra ba na'i skad kyi dbyings kyi sbyor ba las so //
translated: is from the application of the language of the Śruśruti.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: gang gi tshe na byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe na byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
translated: When the bodhicitta drips, at that time omniscience is attained.

original: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma zhes pa ni gsang ba na gnas pa'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma zhes pa ni gsang ba na gnas pa'i rtsa'o //
translated: The yoginī is called “Viśākhā” because she is the channel located in the secret place.

original: de'i sna tshogs ni ngo mtshar byed pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sna tshogs ni ngo mtshar byed pa ste /
translated: Her “viśa” is the cause of wonder,

original: rtsa thams cad kyi tshogs 'dus pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtsa thams cad kyi tshogs 'dus pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: meaning the gathering of all the channels.

original: de'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: The experience of her great bliss is to be called “yoginī.”

original: thabs dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor ma ni med de ;
analyzed: thabs dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor ma ni med de ;
translated: There is no yoginī without method.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As is said:

original: ma mo mi yi gzugs kyis te //
analyzed: ma mo mi yi gzugs kyis te //
translated: The mother is in the form of a human,

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'gro dang tshul //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'gro dang tshul //
translated: The dakinis are the going and the coming.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni thabs dang ldan //🔽dkyil 'khor las ni rtag tu spro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni thabs dang ldan // dkyil 'khor las ni rtag tu spro //
translated: The yoginis are endowed with the means.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: They are always emanated from the mandala.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sna tshogs sde ma la bcom ldan 'das 'khyud de bzhugs so ;🔽; bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sna tshogs sde ma la bcom ldan 'das 'khyud de bzhugs so ; ; bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavat abides embracing the Goddess.

original: zhal dbu ma bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhal dbu ma bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The Bhagavat's face is the middle face, the nature of great bliss.

original: lta bar byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: lta bar byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: He looks at the Goddess's face,

original: nyams su myong bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nyams su myong bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: which means he experiences her.

original: zur mig dang bcas pa la sogs pa ni so sla'o //
analyzed: zur mig dang bcas pa la sogs pa ni so sla'o //
translated: The glances and so forth are easy to understand.

original: bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo zhes @108b pa la /
analyzed: bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo zhes @108b pa la /
translated: He has conquered the army of demons.

original: bdud ni dbang po la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdud ni dbang po la sogs pa ste /
translated: The demons are the sense organs, and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs bcom mo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs bcom mo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that he has conquered the host of their conceptualizations.

original: slar yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: slar yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig dang ldan zhe na /
translated: Again, what is his special quality?

original: gsungs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i lha mo zhes pa la /
analyzed: gsungs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i lha mo zhes pa la /
translated: It is stated: The Goddess who abides in that way.

original: de ltar gsang ba chen po'i gnas sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi 'khor lor rol pa ni lha mo'o //
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba chen po'i gnas sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi 'khor lor rol pa ni lha mo'o //
translated: Thus, the sport in the secret place, the emanation wheel, and the dharma wheel is the goddess.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: thabs dang shes rab dag yang dag par 'dus pas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag yang dag par 'dus pas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The experience of bliss through the perfect union of means and insight.

original: rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po zhes pa la /
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po zhes pa la /
translated: The lord of all tantras.

original: rgyud kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas rgyud thams cad de 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas rgyud thams cad de 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since it is a tantra and it is all, it is all tantras, such as the Guhyasamaja.

original: de rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug ni sna tshogs sde ma'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug ni sna tshogs sde ma'o //
translated: The lord of them, the powerful one, is Vajravarahi.

original: yang na rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug longs spyod ni gnas pa gzung ste /
analyzed: yang na rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug longs spyod ni gnas pa gzung ste /
translated: Alternatively, the term all tantras refers to the sixteen vowels beginning with a, and enjoyment refers to the retention of the abode.

original: des na rgyud thams cad kyi sgras longs spyod kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: des na rgyud thams cad kyi sgras longs spyod kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bshad do //
translated: Thus, the term all tantras refers to the enjoyment wheel.

original: rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The lord of all tantras is the great bliss wheel.

original: de'i dbang phyug ni gtum mor yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: de'i dbang phyug ni gtum mor yang dag par bshad do //
translated: Its powerful one is explained as candali.

original: 'di dag gis ni sngags kyi de nyid rab tu bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni sngags kyi de nyid rab tu bshad pa yin no //
translated: By these, the reality of mantra is well explained.

original: gzigs pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni gtum mo bsgoms pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzigs pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni gtum mo bsgoms pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: By merely seeing means that by cultivating caṇḍālī, mantra is accomplished.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu las sngags byung ngo zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu las sngags byung ngo zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon no //
translated: The mantra arose from the head of the Bhagavān means the seed of bodhicitta.

original: lus skyong bas na thod pa'o //
analyzed: lus skyong bas na thod pa'o //
translated: Since the body is protected, it is a skull.

original: kam ste yul skyong bas na thod pa'o //
analyzed: kam ste yul skyong bas na thod pa'o //
translated: Since the country is protected, it is a skull.

original: kam ni bde ba skyong ba ste /
analyzed: kam ni bde ba skyong ba ste /
translated: Ka is the protection of bliss.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon mi shigs pa ham do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon mi shigs pa ham do //
translated: The seed of bodhicitta is the indestructible haṃ.

original: de'i gnas nas sngags byung bar 'dod do //
analyzed: de'i gnas nas sngags byung bar 'dod do //
translated: It is asserted that the mantra arose from that place.

original: las rnams bzhir ni rnam gzhag pas //
analyzed: las rnams bzhir ni rnam gzhag pas //
translated: Since the four actions are arranged,

original: mi shigs pa yi gzugs rnams bzhi //🔽lus 'di kha dog rnam bzhi yis //
analyzed: mi shigs pa yi gzugs rnams bzhi // lus 'di kha dog rnam bzhi yis //
translated: there are four forms of the indestructible.🔽This body accomplishes the four actions

original: las rnam bzhi ni rab tu sgrub //
analyzed: las rnam bzhi ni rab tu sgrub //
translated: with the four colors.

original: ces so // slar yang /
analyzed: ces so // slar yang /
translated: Again:

original: a'a li k'a li rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li rab sbyor bas //
translated: By the union of ālikāli,

original: de yi sa bon yang dag btu //
analyzed: de yi sa bon yang dag btu //
translated: extract its seed.

original: smin dbus gnas kyi thig le yi //
analyzed: smin dbus gnas kyi thig le yi //
translated: In the center of the bindu,

original: sa bon ye shes can gyis bsgom //
analyzed: sa bon ye shes can gyis bsgom //
translated: The seed-syllable of the one who has pristine awareness is meditated.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sngags thams cad kyi gnas mi shigs pa'i yum mo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sngags thams cad kyi gnas mi shigs pa'i yum mo //
translated: Therefore, the abode of all mantras is the indestructible mother.

original: gnas der sems btags pa'i sngags spros pas /
analyzed: gnas der sems btags pa'i sngags spros pas /
translated: The mantra is emanated by the mind that is fastened to that abode.

original: dngos grub thob po zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: dngos grub thob po zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is said that one attains power.

original: sngags gang yin zhe na de nyid @109a * //
analyzed: sngags gang yin zhe na de nyid @109a * //
translated: What is the mantra?

original: gsungs pa / aom buddha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rkang pa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / aom buddha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rkang pa brgyad pa'o //
translated: It is said to be the mantra of eight lines beginning with “Om Buddha.”

original: byung zhes pa ni song ba'o //
analyzed: byung zhes pa ni song ba'o //
translated: “Gone” means “having gone.”🔽Where has it gone? It is said:

original: gang du song zhe na de nyid gsungs pa sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang du song zhe na de nyid gsungs pa sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Having gone into the water that is below the seven levels.”

original: ri mo bdun po de la thim par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ri mo bdun po de la thim par gyur pa ste /
translated: It is the dissolution of the seven lines into that.

original: de ni ka la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni ka la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the nature of the letters “ka” and so forth.

original: de nyid las sngags 'phro zhing de nyid du thim mo //
analyzed: de nyid las sngags 'phro zhing de nyid du thim mo //
translated: The mantra emanates from that and dissolves into that.

original: klu rnams bcom par byas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: klu rnams bcom par byas zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is said that “the nagas are destroyed.”

original: klu rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin no //
analyzed: klu rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin no //
translated: The “nagas” and so forth are just as the words say.

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa bcom zhing brlag par byas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa bcom zhing brlag par byas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the object, sense faculty, and consciousness are destroyed and annihilated.

original: slar 'ongs te zhes pa ni slar ri mo de la 'ongs pa ste zhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: slar 'ongs te zhes pa ni slar ri mo de la 'ongs pa ste zhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Having returned” means having returned to that painting, the meaning is “having entered.”

original: sna tshogs sde ma zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang du chud pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang du chud pa'o //
translated: “The various classes” means having entered the avadhūtī.

original: zhal zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis phra ba'i gnas su rlung gi rab tu dbye bas sngags zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zhal zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis phra ba'i gnas su rlung gi rab tu dbye bas sngags zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: “Face” means that one should imagine that the mantra has entered by the division of the wind into the place that is naturally subtle.

original: padma'i nang nas byung nas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: padma'i nang nas byung nas zhes pa ni /
translated: “Having arisen from the lotus” means

original: padma'i nang du chud pa'i thig le las byung zhing 'thon to zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: padma'i nang du chud pa'i thig le las byung zhing 'thon to zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: that it has arisen from the bindu that has entered the lotus, the meaning is that it has emerged.

original: slar thong par zhugs zhes pa la thod pa ste /
analyzed: slar thong par zhugs zhes pa la thod pa ste /
translated: “Having entered the skull” means that the skull is

original: mi shigs pa'i rtsar phra ba'i dngos po zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: mi shigs pa'i rtsar phra ba'i dngos po zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: the subtle thing that has entered the indestructible channel.

original: yang na sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Alternatively, the various classes and so on should be understood literally.

original: rdul byung zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: rdul byung zhes pa ni ;
translated: “Having arisen from the dust” means🔽that the dust is the bindu.

original: rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis las byang chub kyi sems 'phro bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis las byang chub kyi sems 'phro bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The bodhicitta flows from the seventy-two thousand channels.

original: nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu zhes pa ni go bar sla'o //
analyzed: nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu zhes pa ni go bar sla'o //
translated: The nāgas, beginning with Vāsuki, are easy to understand.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus,

original: bde chen 'khor lo las ni brgyad //
analyzed: bde chen 'khor lo las ni brgyad //
translated: eight from the great-bliss wheel,

original: longs spyod 'khor lo las de bzhin /
analyzed: longs spyod 'khor lo las de bzhin /
translated: and likewise from the enjoyment wheel,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo las ni bzhi //🔽de bzhin sprul pa las bcu gnyis //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo las ni bzhi // de bzhin sprul pa las bcu gnyis //
translated: four from the dharma wheel,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: and likewise twelve from the emanation wheel.

original: de ltar rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis las byang chub kyi sems thams cad 'bab po //
analyzed: de ltar rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis las byang chub kyi sems thams cad 'bab po //
translated: Thus, all bodhicitta falls from the thirty-two channels.

original: de ltar yang /🔽gang tshe byang chub sems kyis ni //
analyzed: de ltar yang / gang tshe byang chub sems kyis ni //
translated: Thus,

original: rtsa 'di dag ni gang gyur bas //
analyzed: rtsa 'di dag ni gang gyur bas //
translated: when these channels are filled with bodhicitta,

original: de yi rjes su sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje 'chang ba nyid thob 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de yi rjes su sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje 'chang ba nyid thob 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: after that, buddhahood and Vajradhara are attained.

original: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la kha phyogs te zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma chen po'i mdun du kha bltas pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la kha phyogs te zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma chen po'i mdun du kha bltas pa'o //
translated: Facing the yoginī of the diverse army means facing the great yoginī.

original: klu thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: klu thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: All nāgas means

original: nor rgyas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nor rgyas la sogs pa'o //
translated: Vāmana, and so on.

original: zhus pa zhes pa ni yang dag par gsol ba'o //
analyzed: zhus pa zhes pa ni yang dag par gsol ba'o //
translated: “ Asked” means to request perfectly.

original: snying na gnas pa'i rtsa @109b brgyad por rnams ni klu brgyad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: snying na gnas pa'i rtsa @109b brgyad por rnams ni klu brgyad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The eight nāḍīs that reside in the heart are the nature of the eight nāgas.

original: dbus kyi thig le'i gzugs ni sna tshogs sde ma dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dbus kyi thig le'i gzugs ni sna tshogs sde ma dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The form of the bindu in the center is the Bhagavān endowed with Viśvamātā.

original: lha mo bka' ci zhig stsol zhes te /
analyzed: lha mo bka' ci zhig stsol zhes te /
translated: “ Goddess, what order do you give?”

original: lha mo sna tshogs sde ma bka' stsol cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo sna tshogs sde ma bka' stsol cig ces pa'o //
translated: “ Goddess, give the order to Viśvamātā.”

original: sangs rgyas nyams su myong ba zhes pa la sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyams su myong ba zhes pa la sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga ste /
translated: “ Experience buddhahood” means the five aggregates.

original: de rnams kyi rjes su ni phyis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rjes su ni phyis 'byung ba'o //
translated: “ After them” means that which arises later.

original: des na gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: des na gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Therefore, “you should experience that.”

original: de ltar thos pa tsam zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar thos pa tsam zhes pa ni /
translated: “ Merely hearing that”

original: ae wam yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: ae wam yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
translated: is the union of evam.

original: byang chub kyi sems spros pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems spros pa tsam gyis so //
translated: “ Merely through the imagination of bodhicitta”

original: gnas gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang du zhe na /
translated: means “in what place?”

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su ste 'khor lo bzhi'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su ste 'khor lo bzhi'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the middle of the great maṇḍala, which is endowed with ornaments, i.e., in the middle of the four cakras.

original: gang las zhe na /
analyzed: gang las zhe na /
translated: From what?

original: bcom ldan 'das las te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das las te /
translated: From the Bhagavān.

original: bcom ldan 'das thig le'i gzugs su snang ba las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thig le'i gzugs su snang ba las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it appears in the form of a bindu from the Bhagavān.

original: thod pa kha phye ste zhes pa la thod pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: thod pa kha phye ste zhes pa la thod pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The skull is opened. The skull has been explained.

original: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin gyi thod pa kha phye zhing gsang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin gyi thod pa kha phye zhing gsang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The skull is opened, i.e., the secret of the nature of Īlikāli.

original: glegs bam zhes pa ni chos thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: glegs bam zhes pa ni chos thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
translated: The book is the collection of all dharmas.

original: yang na glegs bam ni byang chub sems te /
analyzed: yang na glegs bam ni byang chub sems te /
translated: Or, the book is bodhicitta.

original: p'u ni p'u li ra'i gnas te spyi ba'o //
analyzed: p'u ni p'u li ra'i gnas te spyi ba'o //
translated: Pū is the place of pūlī, i.e., the head.

original: kam ni bde ba'o//
analyzed: kam ni bde ba'o//
translated: Ka is bliss.

original: ta ni de rgyas par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ta ni de rgyas par byed pa ste /
translated: Ta is its expansion.

original: des ni thig le'i gzugs mi shigs pa'i yid lta bu ni glegs bam mo //
analyzed: des ni thig le'i gzugs mi shigs pa'i yid lta bu ni glegs bam mo //
translated: The book is like the indestructible mind, which is in the form of a bindu.

original: byung po zhes pa ni spros pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: byung po zhes pa ni spros pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The beings refers to the proliferation.

original: nam mkha' las sgra byung ngo zhes pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha' las sgra byung ngo zhes pa la /
translated: A voice arose from the sky.

original: nam mkha' ni chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
translated: Space is the source of phenomena.

original: sgra ni sgra tsam ste /
analyzed: sgra ni sgra tsam ste /
translated: Sound is mere sound.

original: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus gives rise to the vajra.

original: glegs bam byung ba'i dus su nam mkha' la lha rnams kyis rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs par byed do //
analyzed: glegs bam byung ba'i dus su nam mkha' la lha rnams kyis rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs par byed do //
translated: When the book appears, the gods in the sky proclaim various sounds of music.

original: lha mo sna tshogs sde ma zung //🔽zhes pa la lha mo ni bod pa ste /
analyzed: lha mo sna tshogs sde ma zung // zhes pa la lha mo ni bod pa ste /
translated: Take up the goddess Viśākhā.

original: kye lha mo glegs bam zung zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: kye lha mo glegs bam zung zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: Here goddess means O goddess, and take up means take up the book.

original: ; sems can kun la phan 'dogs ma //
analyzed: ; sems can kun la phan 'dogs ma //
translated: Benefactor of all sentient beings.

original: zhes pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad ma zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad ma zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means she who acts to benefit all sentient beings.

original: rgyud 'di rgyal po chen pos te //
analyzed: rgyud 'di rgyal po chen pos te //
translated: This tantra is the great king.

original: zhes pa ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams kyi nang na rgyal po ste gtso bo'i zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽rgyud kyi khyad @110a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams kyi nang na rgyal po ste gtso bo'i zhes pa'i tha tshig go // rgyud kyi khyad @110a * //
translated: This means among the tantras such as the Guhyasamāja, it is the king, the principal one.

original: par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction of this tantra?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: It is stated:

original: rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med //
translated: There is nothing higher than the yoginīs.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the following:🔽

original: spyan ma la sogs pa'i ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa'i ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of Vāgīśvara and so on, which is beyond the path of speech.

original: rgyud kyi mtshan ci zhe na /
analyzed: rgyud kyi mtshan ci zhe na /
translated: What is the name of the tantra?

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'o //
translated: It is the Buddha’s Skull.

original: sangs rgyas ni rdo rjer gsungs la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdo rjer gsungs la /
translated: Buddha is said to be the vajra,

original: thod pa ni padmar bshad de /
analyzed: thod pa ni padmar bshad de /
translated: and skull is explained as the lotus,

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: which is the meaning of the source of phenomena.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: For that very reason, it is the tantra of method and wisdom.

original: de ltar thos nas zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems spros pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar thos nas zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems spros pa'o //
translated: Having heard it in that way, the proliferation of the bodhicitta that is the nature of method and wisdom is the various clans.

original: sna tshogs sde ma zhes bya ba la sna tshogs ni ngo mtshar ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma zhes bya ba la sna tshogs ni ngo mtshar ro //
translated: The various are the wonders,

original: sde ni bde ba chen po zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sde ni bde ba chen po zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: and the clans are the great bliss.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste zhes pa la /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste zhes pa la /
translated: What happens by that? It is the perfect retention of the book.

original: p'u ni p'u li ra'o //
analyzed: p'u ni p'u li ra'o //
translated: Pū is pūlī,

original: kam ni su ka ste mi shigs pa'o //
analyzed: kam ni su ka ste mi shigs pa'o //
translated: and ka is su, which is indestructible.

original: ta ni rgyas par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ta ni rgyas par byed pa ste /
translated: Ta is the expansion.

original: byang chub sems kyi glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste /
translated: The book of the Thought of Enlightenment is the true support.

original: 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs sde ma zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽phyag na rdo rje la nye bar gtong zhes pa la rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs sde ma zhes pa'i tha tshig go // phyag na rdo rje la nye bar gtong zhes pa la rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: The one who goes is the one called Viśākhā.🔽To Vajrapāṇi, means to Vajra-in-the-hand. Vajra is indivisible.

original: de'i phyag gnag la yod pa de ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag gnag la yod pa de ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
translated: He who has it in his hand is Vajrapāṇi.

original: de'i drung du song ste /
analyzed: de'i drung du song ste /
translated: Having gone to him,

original: nye bar gtong zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nye bar gtong zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: means to have gone near him.🔽Why does he go? For the sake of the bestowal of the secret empowerment by Vajrapāṇi.

original: ci'i phyir 'gro zhe na phyag na rdo rje la gsang ba'i dbang sbyin pa'i don du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽sems can kun la bde 'bab pa //🔽zhes pa ni sems can thams cad la bde ba 'bab par byed pas na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'gro zhe na phyag na rdo rje la gsang ba'i dbang sbyin pa'i don du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // sems can kun la bde 'bab pa // zhes pa ni sems can thams cad la bde ba 'bab par byed pas na /
translated: The meaning is that he goes for that purpose.🔽The one who brings happiness to all sentient beings

original: sems can kun la bde 'bab pa //🔽zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sems can kun la bde 'bab pa // zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means the one who brings happiness to all sentient beings.🔽The meaning is that he brings happiness to all sentient beings.

original: dngos grub kun zhes pa ni dngos grub thams cad ster zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dngos grub kun zhes pa ni dngos grub thams cad ster zhes pa'i don to //
translated: All powers means all powers are bestowed.

original: gang dag gi zhe na rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes smos te /
analyzed: gang dag gi zhe na rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes smos te /
translated: To which ones? To the yoginīs.

original: rnal 'byor ba rnams la zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rnams la zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should add to the yogis.

original: 'bras bu myur du ste zhes pa la byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster par 'gyur ba'o //🔽mnan dang spar dang ye shes che //
analyzed: 'bras bu myur du ste zhes pa la byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster par 'gyur ba'o // mnan dang spar dang ye shes che //
translated: Quickly means that the very same thought of enlightenment will bestow the power of the Great Seal.

original: zhes pa la man na pa'i sgra ni shes rab kyi padma'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la man na pa'i sgra ni shes rab kyi padma'o //
translated: The word pressing means the lotus of wisdom.

original: spar ba'i sgra ni rdo rje zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: spar ba'i sgra ni rdo rje zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The word thrusting means the vajra.

original: rdo rje dang padma dag la skyes pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni ye shes chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma dag la skyes pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni ye shes chen po ste /
translated: The wisdom that arises from the vajra and lotus is the great wisdom,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: which is to say, the innate nature.

original: ye shes de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ye shes de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the special quality of that wisdom?

original: gong na med pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes pa ste /
translated: It is unsurpassed,

original: ngag gi lam @110b gyi spyod yul las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi lam @110b gyi spyod yul las 'das pa'o //
translated: beyond the range of verbal expression.

original: rnyed par dka' zhes pa ni rtsa bskyod pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnyed par dka' zhes pa ni rtsa bskyod pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: It is hard to attain, as one should understand from the shaking of the root.

original: 'di dag gis ni rang rig pa tsam bstan to //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni rang rig pa tsam bstan to //
translated: These [verses] teach the mere self-awareness.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: And so it is said:

original: rtag tu 'dod pa bstan bya zhing //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dod pa bstan bya zhing //
translated: One should always show one's desire,

original: chu yi mchog kyang btung bar bya //
analyzed: chu yi mchog kyang btung bar bya //
translated: and drink the best of waters.

original: chos bsten chos min spang bar bya //
analyzed: chos bsten chos min spang bar bya //
translated: One should follow the Dharma and avoid what is not Dharma.

original: 'di ni pho mo'i brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni pho mo'i brtul zhugs so //
translated: This is the discipline of male and female.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: nyan thos la sogs pas dka' ba spyad kyang ming tsam yang mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pas dka' ba spyad kyang ming tsam yang mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that even though the Sravakas and so on practice austerities, they do not find even a mere name.

original: gsang ba zhes pa la gsang ba'i sgras ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyab par byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de las byung bas na gsang ba ste /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa la gsang ba'i sgras ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyab par byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de las byung bas na gsang ba ste /
translated: As for secret, the term secret means the dharmadhatu, which pervades by its mode and from which all Tathagatas arise, so it is secret.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na gsang ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na gsang ba'o //
translated: Since it is not the domain of experience of the Sravakas and so on, it is secret.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni phul du byung ba'i ye shes dam pa'i phul lo //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni phul du byung ba'i ye shes dam pa'i phul lo //
translated: Supreme means the best of the best of sublime wisdom.

original: nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sbyor bas nyams dga'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sbyor bas nyams dga'o //
translated: Delightful means delightful because it is applied to joy.

original: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
translated: It is present in the whole body.
