original: zhes pa ni lus can thams cad kyi snying gi dbus na bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyi rnam par gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus can thams cad kyi snying gi dbus na bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyi rnam par gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the form of great bliss abiding in the middle of the heart of all embodied beings.

original: de'i las gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i las gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is its function?

original: de nyid gsungs pa nam mkha'i lding la sogs pa'i las bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa nam mkha'i lding la sogs pa'i las bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said to be the twelve functions of the garuḍa and so forth.🔽The various mantras in their proper order,

original: sna tshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang // zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bag chags las yid skyo bar byed pas sna tshogs sngags zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sna tshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang // zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bag chags las yid skyo bar byed pas sna tshogs sngags zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the various habitual tendencies give rise to the mind, and so it is called the various mantras.

original: rim ji bzhin zhes pa ni sngags kyi go rims ji lta ba bzhin 'byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rim ji bzhin zhes pa ni sngags kyi go rims ji lta ba bzhin 'byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: In their proper order means that they arise in the order of the mantras.

original: ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma skyes dang // zhes pa la /
analyzed: ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma skyes dang // zhes pa la /
translated: The yoginīs in their proper order,

original: rnal 'byor ma ni gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: the yoginīs are Kṣitigarbhā, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi ji ltar 'byung ba ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams su bskyed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ji ltar 'byung ba ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams su bskyed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Their order is the generation in the directions and quarters in their proper order.

original: dpal chen he ru ka'i zhes pa la /
analyzed: dpal chen he ru ka'i zhes pa la /
translated: The great hero Heruka,

original: he ni rgyu sogs spangs pa'o //
analyzed: he ni rgyu sogs spangs pa'o //
translated: He means abandoning the cause, etc.

original: ru ni gzugs bcom pa'i don to //
analyzed: ru ni gzugs bcom pa'i don to //
translated: Ru means the meaning of destroying form.

original: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa ste /
translated: Ka means not abiding anywhere.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni dpa' bo chen po dpal he ru ka zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni dpa' bo chen po dpal he ru ka zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The union of ālikāli is the nature of the great bliss of bodhicitta, which is the meaning of the glorious Śrī Heruka, the great hero.

original: dang ni sdud pa'o //
analyzed: dang ni sdud pa'o //
translated: And means to collect.🔽The cause of generation and abiding

original: bskyed pa dang ni gnas rgyu dang // zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lngas he ru ka bskyed cing bzhengs pa zhes pa'i don to //🔽de'i @111a * //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang ni gnas rgyu dang // zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lngas he ru ka bskyed cing bzhengs pa zhes pa'i don to // de'i @111a * //
translated: means that the generation of Heruka by means of the five manifest enlightenments is the meaning of “arisen.”

original: gnas pa'i rang bzhin de nyid rgyu ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gnas pa'i rang bzhin de nyid rgyu ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: That very nature of abiding is the cause, which is the cause and result of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: dngos dang dngos med ces pa la /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med ces pa la /
translated: As for “entity and nonentity,”

original: bcom ldan 'das ni dngos po'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni dngos po'i ngo bo ste /
translated: the Bhagavān is the entity of entity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yang de'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yang de'o //
translated: He is also the entity of nonentity.

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the nature of emptiness, which is endowed with the most sublime of manifestations.

original: de ltar yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
analyzed: de ltar yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
translated: Thus, the glorious Guhyasamaja states:

original: dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing //
translated: Free from all things,🔽free from the aggregates, elements, and sense bases,

original: phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam smangs  pa //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam smangs  pa //
translated: free from the concepts of object and subject,

original: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pa //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pa //
translated: the equality of the absence of self in phenomena,

original: rang sems gdong nas ma skyes pa //
analyzed: rang sems gdong nas ma skyes pa //
translated: the mind itself is primordially unborn,

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the nature of emptiness.

original: lang kar gshegs pa las kyang /🔽ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags pa'i //
analyzed: lang kar gshegs pa las kyang / ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags pa'i //
translated: The Sutra of the Descent to Lanka also states:🔽The external objects

original: phyi yi don ni yod pa min //
analyzed: phyi yi don ni yod pa min //
translated: imagined by the childish do not exist.

original: 'dod chags kyis ni sbags pa'i sems //🔽don du snang ba rab tu skye //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis ni sbags pa'i sems // don du snang ba rab tu skye //
translated: The mind, defiled by attachment,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: gives rise to the appearance of objects.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Thus, the nature of the absence of things is the Bhagavan.

original: spros med ces pa ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir na spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: spros med ces pa ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir na spros pa med pa'o //
translated: Free from elaborations means free from elaborations.

original: srid par spyod cing gos pa med //🔽ces pa ni /
analyzed: srid par spyod cing gos pa med // ces pa ni /
translated: One acts in existence without being defiled.

original: srid pa'i 'khor bar spyod par byed par byed pas na srid par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'khor bar spyod par byed par byed pas na srid par spyod pa'o //
translated: One acts in existence because one acts in the cycle of existence.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa zhes ba nas ral gri zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i las bco brgyad por 'gyur ba de ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa zhes ba nas ral gri zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i las bco brgyad por 'gyur ba de ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is one to accomplish the eighteen activities, from the one called “intentional explanation” up to the one called “sword”?

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis // zhes pa la /
translated: By the union of the Buddha’s skull.

original: sangs rgyas ni rdo rjer gsungs la thod pa ni padma nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdo rjer gsungs la thod pa ni padma nyid do //
translated: Buddha is said to be the vajra, and skull is the lotus.

original: de dag gi sbyor ba'i bsam gtan gyis 'grub par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi sbyor ba'i bsam gtan gyis 'grub par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The meditative concentration of their union is asserted to be the means of accomplishment.

original: mi snang ba zhes pa ni lha dang mi rnams kyis mi mthong ba'i don to //🔽sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul dang // zhes pa la /
analyzed: mi snang ba zhes pa ni lha dang mi rnams kyis mi mthong ba'i don to // sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul dang // zhes pa la /
translated: “Invisibility” means the meaning of not being seen by gods and humans.🔽The various miracles and magical emanations.

original: sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul ni sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul te rnam pa sna tshogs pa byed par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul ni sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul te rnam pa sna tshogs pa byed par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The various miracles are the various magical emanations, which are the various aspects that one will create.

original: rang gi gzugs su bsgyur ba dang / zhes pa la rang gi gzugs kyi rang bzhin bsgyur zhing gzhan gyi gzugs su byed pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi gzugs su bsgyur ba dang / zhes pa la rang gi gzugs kyi rang bzhin bsgyur zhing gzhan gyi gzugs su byed pa ste /
translated: “One’s own form” is one’s own nature of form, which is transformed into another’s form.

original: gzugs sna tshogs par sprul par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs sna tshogs par sprul par byed pa'o //
translated: “Various forms” are emanations.

original: gzhan gyi lus la gzhug sogs dang // zhes pa la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi lus la gzhug sogs dang // zhes pa la /
translated: “Entering another’s body, etc.”

original: gzhan gyi lus ni gzhan gyi khog pa ste der @111b 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lus ni gzhan gyi khog pa ste der @111b 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: “Another’s body” is another’s physical body, which is entered.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni gong du 'pho ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni gong du 'pho ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Etc.” refers to “transference” above.

original: las kyi tshogs ni gzhung rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas ma bris te /
analyzed: las kyi tshogs ni gzhung rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas ma bris te /
translated: The collection of rites is not written here for fear of being too wordy.

original: gang na bzhi ba dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dag las bla ma'i man ngag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang na bzhi ba dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dag las bla ma'i man ngag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: They should be known from the guru’s intimate instructions in the Caturdevi and Vajradaka tantras.

original: sangs rgyas bye bas rab gsungs pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye bas rab gsungs pa //
translated: “Ten million buddhas have taught well”

original: zhes pa la sangs rgyas bye ba ni rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sangs rgyas bye ba ni rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Ten million buddhas” are Vajradhara and so on.

original: rab gsungs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can gtum mo bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rab gsungs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can gtum mo bsgom pa'o //
translated: “Taught well” is the meditation on the coemergent form of caṇḍālī.

original: sangs rgyas bu mo zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang bu mo lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bu mo zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang bu mo lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma ste /
translated: The Buddha's daughter is the goddess Sahaja-rupa, the daughter of the Buddha and Vajradhara.

original: bu mo de yang mchog chen mo'o //
analyzed: bu mo de yang mchog chen mo'o //
translated: And that daughter is Maha-maha.

original: khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs byed na //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs byed na // zhes pa ni /
translated: By mere anger, he attracts.

original: chags pa'i sbyor bas gtum mo sbyar te /
analyzed: chags pa'i sbyor bas gtum mo sbyar te /
translated: By the union of passion, he unites with candali.

original: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa ni 'gugs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa ni 'gugs pa yin no //
translated: The emission of bodhicitta is the attraction.

original: sangs rgyas bu mo zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i aa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bu mo zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i aa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The Buddha's daughter is the meditation on the A of the emanation wheel.

original: sangs rgyas bye bas zhes pa la ko ti ni rtse mo ste chos kyi 'khor lo'i thig le'i gzugs phra mo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye bas zhes pa la ko ti ni rtse mo ste chos kyi 'khor lo'i thig le'i gzugs phra mo'o //
translated: The ten million Buddhas are the kotis, the subtle essence of the Dharma wheel.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon rnams so //
translated: The Buddhas are the seeds of the Tathagatas.

original: rab srung zhes pa ni yongs su bskor zhes pa'i the tshig go //
analyzed: rab srung zhes pa ni yongs su bskor zhes pa'i the tshig go //
translated: The well-protected is the word for surrounded.

original: chos dang sprul pa dag bsgom pas gong du 'pho ba dang / gzhan gyi lus la 'jug par byed ces sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos dang sprul pa dag bsgom pas gong du 'pho ba dang / gzhan gyi lus la 'jug par byed ces sbyar ro //
translated: By meditating on the Dharma and emanation wheels, he causes the transference upward and the entry into another's body.

original: gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos //
analyzed: gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention others?

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: Here,

original: gzhan ni sprul pa dang chos dag las gzhan pa'i longs spyod kyi 'khor lo cha bcu drug dang ldan par bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan ni sprul pa dang chos dag las gzhan pa'i longs spyod kyi 'khor lo cha bcu drug dang ldan par bshad do //
translated: the other is the enjoyment wheel, which is explained as having sixteen parts, other than the emanation and Dharma wheels.

original: smos lta ci zhig dgos zhes pa ni mchog rab kyi ham ngo //
analyzed: smos lta ci zhig dgos zhes pa ni mchog rab kyi ham ngo //
translated: What need is there to mention the supreme?

original: 'khor lo gang la yod pa'i 'khor lo de ni bde ba chen por gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo gang la yod pa'i 'khor lo de ni bde ba chen por gsungs so //
translated: The wheel that exists in any wheel is said to be the great bliss.

original: 'khor lo bzhi bsgoms pas sems brtan par gyur na sangs rgyas thod par gang gsungs pa de thams cad 'grub ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi bsgoms pas sems brtan par gyur na sangs rgyas thod par gang gsungs pa de thams cad 'grub ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of what is said in the Buddha Skull is that when the mind becomes stable through the cultivation of the four wheels, everything is accomplished.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus,

original: sa gnyis dag la sems byed pa //
analyzed: sa gnyis dag la sems byed pa //
translated: the mind is made on the two stages,

original: 'di ni grol bar rab tu grags //
analyzed: 'di ni grol bar rab tu grags //
translated: and this is well known as liberation.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: And,

original: mig 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: mig 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The magic wheel, etc. , is easy to understand.

original: 'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin pas //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin pas // zhes pa la /
translated: While enjoying the five desires,

original: 'dod pa lnga dbang po lngas bsten par bya zhing nyams su myong bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga dbang po lngas bsten par bya zhing nyams su myong bar bya'o //
translated: the five desires are to be enjoyed and experienced by the five senses.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'o //
translated: Form, sound, and so forth.

original: de rnams 'dod par byas na @112a * //
analyzed: de rnams 'dod par byas na @112a * //
translated: If one desires those,

original: 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa ste /
translated: one desires the desire realm.

original: des rnal 'byor ba 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: des rnal 'byor ba 'grub pa yin no //
translated: By that, the yogi is accomplished.

original: 'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po //
analyzed: 'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po //
translated: The great dispute of fear and destruction

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: and so forth are easy to understand.

original: 'dzag byed cing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dzag byed cing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The leaking is

original: bud med rnams las 'dzag par gsungs so //
analyzed: bud med rnams las 'dzag par gsungs so //
translated: said to be leaking from women.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: khro bo'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo la ;
analyzed: khro bo'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo la ;
translated: On the tip of the wrathful one's index finger,🔽imagine the syllable of nectar,

original: ; bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams pa dang // lte ba bya gdong mdzub rtse la //
analyzed: ; bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams pa dang // lte ba bya gdong mdzub rtse la //
translated: and at the navel, the face of the bird on the fingertip.

original: sbyor ba gsum po bsams nas ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba gsum po bsams nas ni //
translated: Having imagined the three yogas,

original: mdzub mo de yis bsgul bya zhing //🔽yang dag man ngag bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mdzub mo de yis bsgul bya zhing // yang dag man ngag bsgom par bya //
translated: one should move that index finger

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: and meditate on the true esoteric instruction.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa la sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud 'ba' zhig tu gsungs kyi rgyud gzhan du ni ma gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa la sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud 'ba' zhig tu gsungs kyi rgyud gzhan du ni ma gsungs so //
translated: As for Buddhakapāla, it is taught only in the tantra called Buddhakapāla, not in other tantras.

original: rdo rje mgon po zhes pa la rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje mgon po zhes pa la rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: As for vajra lord, vajra is nondual wisdom, the nature of wisdom.

original: mgon po ni thabs so //
analyzed: mgon po ni thabs so //
translated: The protector is the means.

original: de gnyis kyis na thabs dang shes rab bo //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis na thabs dang shes rab bo //
translated: The two of them are means and insight.

original: bsam gtan 'di nyid kyis khams bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'i sbyor ba bco brgyad 'grub ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan 'di nyid kyis khams bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'i sbyor ba bco brgyad 'grub ste /
translated: By means of this very meditative concentration, the eighteen applications of the purification of the eighteen elements are accomplished.

original: sbyor ba bco brgyad po de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba bco brgyad po de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The very eighteen applications are stated:

original: sha li ka'i sbyor bas zhes pa la /
analyzed: sha li ka'i sbyor bas zhes pa la /
translated: By the application of śālika,

original: klu dgug pa'i don du ri skegs mngag 'dab ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: klu dgug pa'i don du ri skegs mngag 'dab ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: for the purpose of summoning the nāgas, the parrot is sent, that is the meaning.

original: rig pa 'dzin pa ni dug bsal ba'i don du rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu'i gzugs su sprul zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin pa ni dug bsal ba'i don du rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu'i gzugs su sprul zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: For the purpose of removing poison, the knowledge-holder emanates in the form of a knowledge-holder person, that is the meaning.

original: rgya na po zhes bya ba ni cho lo rtse bas dug sel ba'o //
analyzed: rgya na po zhes bya ba ni cho lo rtse bas dug sel ba'o //
translated: The so-called dice is the removal of poison by playing dice.

original: rnga rdung zhes pa ni rnga brdung bzhin pas dug sel ba'o //
analyzed: rnga rdung zhes pa ni rnga brdung bzhin pas dug sel ba'o //
translated: The so-called drum is the removal of poison by beating a drum.

original: bud med 'brog ces pa ni dug gis zin pa'i skyes bu'i chung ma phrogs pas dug gis zin pa'i skyes bu langs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bud med 'brog ces pa ni dug gis zin pa'i skyes bu'i chung ma phrogs pas dug gis zin pa'i skyes bu langs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The so-called woman’s wilderness is the removal of poison by the woman of the person who is seized by poison rising up.

original: shing bsnun pa zhes pa ni ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma la mngon par bsngags te /
analyzed: shing bsnun pa zhes pa ni ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma la mngon par bsngags te /
translated: The wood-striking is the recitation of the mantra on a branch of karavira.

original: des mgo bo dad rkang pa'i mthar thug par reg par bya'o //
analyzed: des mgo bo dad rkang pa'i mthar thug par reg par bya'o //
translated: With that, one should touch from the head to the feet.

original: dang ni sdud pa'o //🔽zhags pas 'ching ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dang ni sdud pa'o // zhags pas 'ching ba zhes pa ni /
translated: The and is a conjunction.

original: thag pa zhags pa'i rnam pa lta bus mgrin par bcings te dgug par bya'o //🔽khu byug ces pa ni /
analyzed: thag pa zhags pa'i rnam pa lta bus mgrin par bcings te dgug par bya'o // khu byug ces pa ni /
translated: The binding with a noose is the binding of the neck with a rope in the form of a noose.

original: khu byug gi sgra bton pas dug gis zin pa sangs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khu byug gi sgra bton pas dug gis zin pa sangs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The cuckoo is the sound of a cuckoo, by which the poison is removed.

original: padma 'byed pa zhes pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa gnyis mnan pas dug sel ba'o //
analyzed: padma 'byed pa zhes pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa gnyis mnan pas dug sel ba'o //
translated: The lotus opening is the removal of poison by pressing the two channels of the enjoyment chakra.

original: stag byed ces pa ni stag gi rnam pa'i tshim rngam bya ba'o //
analyzed: stag byed ces pa ni stag gi rnam pa'i tshim rngam bya ba'o //
translated: The tiger is the roar of a tiger.

original: chu zhes pa ni chus dug sel ba'o //
analyzed: chu zhes pa ni chus dug sel ba'o //
translated: The water is the removal of poison by water.

original: dung zhes pa ni dung chus @112b bkang ste rug gis zin pa'i spyi bor blugs pa'o //
analyzed: dung zhes pa ni dung chus @112b bkang ste rug gis zin pa'i spyi bor blugs pa'o //
translated: The conch is filling a conch with water and pouring it on the head of the one bitten.

original: thod lo kor 'phrog ces pa ni thod lo kor gyis dug gis zin pa'i ming bris na dug sel bar byed ces sbyar ro //
analyzed: thod lo kor 'phrog ces pa ni thod lo kor gyis dug gis zin pa'i ming bris na dug sel bar byed ces sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase taking away the skull is to be applied as if one writes the name of the person bitten by the skull with poison, the poison is removed.

original: skyug pa zhes pa ni dug slon pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyug pa zhes pa ni dug slon pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase vomiting is to be done in the manner of vomiting the poison.

original: ras g-yogs zhes pa ni ras yug chen gyi sa dug gis zin pa g-yogs na dug sel to //
analyzed: ras g-yogs zhes pa ni ras yug chen gyi sa dug gis zin pa g-yogs na dug sel to //
translated: The phrase covering with cloth is that if one covers the person bitten by the poison with a large cloth, the poison is removed.

original: thal lcag brdab ces pa ni dug gis zin pa la thal lcag drag tu brdab pa'o //
analyzed: thal lcag brdab ces pa ni dug gis zin pa la thal lcag drag tu brdab pa'o //
translated: The phrase slapping with the palm is to slap hard with the palm of the hand on the person bitten by the poison.

original: yig gsum zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yig gsum zhes pa ni /
translated: The phrase three syllables is

original: ha ho: hr'i: ste yi ge 'bru gsum mo //
analyzed: ha ho: hr'i: ste yi ge 'bru gsum mo //
translated: ha, ho, and hri, the three seed syllables.

original: 'dis dug sel bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis dug sel bar byed do //
translated: This removes the poison.

original: bsam gtan gyi ni gtam zhes pa ni dkar po'i bsgom pa'i gtam gyis dug nyams par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi ni gtam zhes pa ni dkar po'i bsgom pa'i gtam gyis dug nyams par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase talk of meditation is that the poison is destroyed by talk of the cultivation of the positive.

original: 'di rnams kyis ni dgug par bya //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ni dgug par bya // zhes pa ni /
translated: By these one should summon.🔽The phrase by these

original: sbyor ba bco brgyad po 'di rnams kyis dug sel bar byed do //
analyzed: sbyor ba bco brgyad po 'di rnams kyis dug sel bar byed do //
translated: refers to the eighteen methods.

original: rdo rje mgon po zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje mgon po zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The phrase Vajra Lord is the nature of the bodhicitta of Great Vajradhara.

original: de nas zhes pa ni rgyu des na nang gi rnal 'byor gsungs pa'o //🔽rab bshad ces pa ni gang gi tshig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni rgyu des na nang gi rnal 'byor gsungs pa'o // rab bshad ces pa ni gang gi tshig yin zhe na /
translated: Then is the cause, and the inner yoga is taught.

original: sna tshogs sde ma'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma'o //
translated: If it is asked whose words are they, it is said, the various clans.

original: de ni sna tshogs sde mas gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni sna tshogs sde mas gsungs so //
translated: That is, the various clans speak.

original: ci zhig gsungs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs she na /
translated: If it is asked, What do they say?

original: mchog gi ye shes pa ste /
analyzed: mchog gi ye shes pa ste /
translated: It is the supreme gnosis.

original: ye shes kyi rol zhing rtse bas na mchog gi ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rol zhing rtse bas na mchog gi ye shes so //
translated: Since one plays and delights in gnosis, it is supreme gnosis.

original: des na rab bshad ces pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: des na rab bshad ces pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said, the various clans speak.

original: bha ga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs //
analyzed: bha ga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs //
translated: Abiding in the middle of the bhaga

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: ae'i cha byad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lor aa thung ngu'i rnam par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: ae'i cha byad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lor aa thung ngu'i rnam par gnas pa ste /
translated: abiding in the form of the short a in the emanation cakra of the shape of e.

original: ka la sogs pa sde bdun gyi ri mo'i rnam pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: ka la sogs pa sde bdun gyi ri mo'i rnam pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: It is surrounded by the seven groups of consonants beginning with ka.

original: bde ba chen po ster byed pa //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ster byed pa //
translated: The bestower of great bliss

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: gnas der bsgoms pa tsam gyis bde ba chen po ster byed par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gnas der bsgoms pa tsam gyis bde ba chen po ster byed par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: that merely by meditating in that place, one becomes the bestower of great bliss.

original: 'di nyid du ni kun gnas kyang //
analyzed: 'di nyid du ni kun gnas kyang //
translated: Although all abide in this,

original: zhes pa ni nam mkha' lding dang / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len la sogs pa der bsgoms pa tsam gyis grub kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nam mkha' lding dang / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len la sogs pa der bsgoms pa tsam gyis grub kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: This is the meditation on the garuḍa, mercury, elixir, and so on, which are accomplished by merely meditating on them, not otherwise.

original: dkyil 'khor bzang po zhes pa la dkyil ni snying po'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzang po zhes pa la dkyil ni snying po'o //
translated: The good maṇḍala is the essence,

original: 'khor ni len pa ste dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'khor ni len pa ste dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: and the retinue is the maṇḍala.

original: mdzes par byed pas na bzang po ste mchog ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mdzes par byed pas na bzang po ste mchog ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since it beautifies, it is good, that is, supreme.

original: slob ma dbang bskur zhes pa la gnas de nyid du slob ma dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: slob ma dbang bskur zhes pa la gnas de nyid du slob ma dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
translated: The consecration of the disciple is the consecration of the disciple in that place.

original: bla ma'i man ngag las khong du chud par bya zhes @113a * //🔽pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag las khong du chud par bya zhes @113a * // pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It should be understood from the guru’s instruction.

original: he ru ka dpa' bo zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su bla mas bstan pa ste /
analyzed: he ru ka dpa' bo zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su bla mas bstan pa ste /
translated: The hero Heruka is the teaching of the guru after the consecration.

original: gnas de nyid du he ru ka bsgom par bya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: gnas de nyid du he ru ka bsgom par bya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It should be applied to the meditation on Heruka in that place.

original: khyad par ji lta bu'i he ru ka bsgom zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu'i he ru ka bsgom zhe na /
translated: What kind of Heruka is to be meditated on?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso bo //
analyzed: gsungs pa / nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso bo //
translated: The principal one of the twenty-four.

original: zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya zhes sbyar ro //🔽der ni nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya zhes sbyar ro // der ni nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa //
translated: This is to be applied to the meditation on the Blessed One surrounded by the goddesses of the nature of the twenty-four.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The fear of the garuḍa, etc., is easy to understand.

original: phyag rgya chen po grags chen po //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po grags chen po //
translated: The great fame of the great seal

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the following:🔽

original: aa thung ngu'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i don du grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //🔽dngos grub kun gyi 'dod byed ma //
analyzed: aa thung ngu'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i don du grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o // dngos grub kun gyi 'dod byed ma //
translated: the possession of the fame of the meaning of the great seal, which is the nature of the short vowel a.

original: zhes pa ni 'dod pa dang ldan pa la sangs rgyas nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dod pa dang ldan pa la sangs rgyas nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The desire for all powers is the attainment of buddhahood for one who possesses desire.

original: dbang bskur ba'i don du phyag rgya'i tshogs gsungs pa la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i don du phyag rgya'i tshogs gsungs pa la /
translated: The assembly of seals is stated for the purpose of consecration.

original: ma zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ma zhes pa ni /
translated: The mother

original: dang po shes rab ma mthong ba las dga' ba tsam skye bas na ma'o //
analyzed: dang po shes rab ma mthong ba las dga' ba tsam skye bas na ma'o //
translated: is the mother because mere joy arises from not seeing the wisdom woman at first.

original: tsha mo zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma'i 'jug pas mchog tu dga' ba'i rnam par dbye ba ston pas na tsha mo'o //
analyzed: tsha mo zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma'i 'jug pas mchog tu dga' ba'i rnam par dbye ba ston pas na tsha mo'o //
translated: The niece is the niece because she shows the division of supreme joy by the entry of the vajra and lotus.

original: sring mo zhes pa ni thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pas padmar rten par byed pas na sring mo'o //
analyzed: sring mo zhes pa ni thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pas padmar rten par byed pas na sring mo'o //
translated: Sister means that by means of various methods, one relies on the lotus, and so she is a sister.

original: bu mo zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bu mo zhes pa ni /
translated: Girl means that

original: gnas bco brgyad nas lhan cig skyes pa 'tsho bas na bu mo'o //
analyzed: gnas bco brgyad nas lhan cig skyes pa 'tsho bas na bu mo'o //
translated: she is a girl because she is nourished by the innate being in the eighteen abodes.

original: bud med rab brtan ma zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bud med rab brtan ma zhes pa ni /
translated: Firm woman means that

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i dus su ngo mtshar chung ba'i dus med de yang dag pa'i bde bsgrub pa'i don gyis na /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i dus su ngo mtshar chung ba'i dus med de yang dag pa'i bde bsgrub pa'i don gyis na /
translated: at the time of supreme joy, there is no time of little wonder, and because she is the one who accomplishes true bliss,

original: mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: she is supreme.

original: rig ma bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor bas bde ba nyid bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rig ma bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor bas bde ba nyid bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The four consorts are united, and bliss is to be accomplished.

original: 'gro ba drug ces pa ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba drug ces pa ni /
translated: The six migrations means that

original: 'gro ba drug tu 'jug pa rnams kyis bde ba nyis sgrub mod kyi /
analyzed: 'gro ba drug tu 'jug pa rnams kyis bde ba nyis sgrub mod kyi /
translated: those who enter the six migrations do indeed accomplish bliss,

original: 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyi ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyi ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: but the bliss of the childish is contaminated.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyi ni zag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyi ni zag pa med pa'o //
translated: The bliss of the āryas is uncontaminated.

original: 'on kyang bde ba 'ba' zhig sgrub kyi gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: 'on kyang bde ba 'ba' zhig sgrub kyi gzhan ni med do //
translated: However, only bliss is accomplished, and nothing else.

original: de bas na sgrub thabs du ma'i rjes su 'brangs te /
analyzed: de bas na sgrub thabs du ma'i rjes su 'brangs te /
translated: Therefore, following many of the means of achievement,

original: bde ba'i don nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i don nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: the meaning of bliss itself should be accomplished.

original: 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyi ni ji srid du bde ba de srid du rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyi ni ji srid du bde ba de srid du rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
translated: However, for the childish, as long as there is bliss, for that long it is naturally pure.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As is said:

original: bde ba yis ni bde ba bsgrub //
analyzed: bde ba yis ni bde ba bsgrub //
translated: Bliss is accomplished by bliss.

original: rgyu bde bas ni 'bras bu bde //
analyzed: rgyu bde bas ni 'bras bu bde //
translated: The result is blissful by the cause of bliss.

original: @113b zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: @113b zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa nyid //🔽ces pa ni /
analyzed: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa nyid // ces pa ni /
translated: Samsara is nirvana itself.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnal 'byor bas dbyer med par nye bar spyad par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnal 'byor bas dbyer med par nye bar spyad par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, samsara and nirvana should be viewed by the yogi as being inseparable.

original: gal te tha dad par byas na nyes pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te tha dad par byas na nyes pa ci yod ce na /
translated: If one makes them different, what is the problem?

original: bde ba med pa dang dngos grub med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba med pa dang dngos grub med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: There would be no bliss and no spiritual powers.

original: 'char dang nub pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'char dang nub pa zhes pa ni /
translated: As for “arising and setting,”

original: byang chub kyi sems 'char ba'i tshe dbang po thams cad nub par 'gyur ba'o //🔽sems can kun la bde ba 'bab //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'char ba'i tshe dbang po thams cad nub par 'gyur ba'o // sems can kun la bde ba 'bab //
translated: when the bodhicitta arises, all the sense organs set.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: Bliss descends on all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la bde ba ster ba'i sna tshogs sde ma de ni rtsa yin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde ba ster ba'i sna tshogs sde ma de ni rtsa yin no //
translated: The nāḍī is the goddess Viśvamātā, who bestows bliss to all sentient beings.

original: sna tshogs sde ma btang ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma btang ste /
translated: Having abandoned Viśvamātā,

original: gang de kho na nyid la re ba ni ci yang 'grub pa med do //
analyzed: gang de kho na nyid la re ba ni ci yang 'grub pa med do //
translated: there is nothing at all accomplished by one who hopes for reality.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: And it is also said:

original: blo dman byis pas rang gi lus btang na //
analyzed: blo dman byis pas rang gi lus btang na //
translated: The inferior mind of a fool gives up his own body,

original: de ni 'dod pas gzugs brnyan tshol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pas gzugs brnyan tshol bar 'gyur //
translated: but he seeks a form of desire.

original: ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa bor nas ni //
analyzed: ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa bor nas ni //
translated: Having abandoned a tree with ripe fruit,

original: de ni sa bon rgyud khrid dus la sdod //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni sa bon rgyud khrid dus la sdod // ces gsungs so //
translated: he waits for the time of the seed.

original: glegs bam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: glegs bam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The so-called book, and so on, is easy to understand.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: “Buddha” is nondual gnosis,

original: rdo rje dang padma'i sbyor bas mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma'i sbyor bas mtshon par bya'o //
translated: which should be illustrated by the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes pa la /
translated: “Vajra Buddha” is as follows:

original: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Vajra is nondual gnosis.

original: sangs rgyas ni thabs kyi rang bzhin te gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni thabs kyi rang bzhin te gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The Buddha is the nature of means, the nature of nondual intuition is to be cultivated.

original: thod pa gru gsum yang dag byung //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: thod pa gru gsum yang dag byung // zhes pa la /
translated: The skull is the triangle.

original: lus skyong bas thod pa'o //
analyzed: lus skyong bas thod pa'o //
translated: The skull is the skull because it protects the body.

original: grong skyong bas na yang thod pa'o //
analyzed: grong skyong bas na yang thod pa'o //
translated: The skull is also the skull because it protects the town.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gru gsum pa las yang dag par byung bas na gru gsum yang dag byung ngo //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gru gsum pa las yang dag par byung bas na gru gsum yang dag byung ngo //
translated: The triangle is the triangle because it arises from the triangle of the great bliss cakra.

original: sbyor pa zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba bsgom par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sbyor pa zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba bsgom par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The union is the union of the nature of means and insight.

original: gnas gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: Where is it to be cultivated?

original: de nyid gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The channel that abides in the secret place.

original: gsang ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: The channel that abides in the secret emanation cakra.

original: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is its special feature?

original: dbyangs yig lnga pa klu dbang lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig lnga pa klu dbang lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the five vowels, like the lord of the nagas.

original: de ni sgra tsam gyi rang bzhin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ni sgra tsam gyi rang bzhin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of “it is the nature of mere sound.”

original: de'i sna tshogs zhes pa ni mtshon par bya ba'i gnas der rnam par rtog pa las sems skyob pas na sna tshogs so //
analyzed: de'i sna tshogs zhes pa ni mtshon par bya ba'i gnas der rnam par rtog pa las sems skyob pas na sna tshogs so //
translated: “ Its variety” is the variety of the mind that is protected from conceptualization in the place of the object of expression.

original: ngo mtshar byed ces pa ni dngos grub sna tshogs pa @114a * //
analyzed: ngo mtshar byed ces pa ni dngos grub sna tshogs pa @114a * //
translated: “ It is wondrous” is the meaning of “it is the means of accomplishing the various powers.”

original: sgrub par byed pa'i thabs kyis 'jig rten pa ngo mtshar byed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i thabs kyis 'jig rten pa ngo mtshar byed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: “ It is the world’s wonder” is the meaning of “it is the means of accomplishing the various powers.”

original: sde ni bde chen ye shes so //
analyzed: sde ni bde chen ye shes so //
translated: “ The class is the exalted wisdom of great bliss.”

original: zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi sde'i tshogs las bde ba chen po'i ye shes nyams su myong ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi sde'i tshogs las bde ba chen po'i ye shes nyams su myong ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of “the experience of the exalted wisdom of great bliss from the collection of the class of the seventy-two thousand channels.”

original: 'di nyid theg pa chen po ste //
analyzed: 'di nyid theg pa chen po ste //
translated: “ This itself is the Great Vehicle.”

original: zhes pa ni theg pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na theg pa chen po ste /🔽rnam pa bdun zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni theg pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na theg pa chen po ste / rnam pa bdun zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of “it is the Great Vehicle because it is a vehicle and it is great.”🔽“ It has seven aspects.”

original: rnam pa bdun ni don rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: rnam pa bdun ni don rnam pa bdun te /
translated: The seven aspects are the seven topics.

original: brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni brjod par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni brjod par mi nus pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of the eighth is inexpressible.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung //
translated: Arisen from the channel of the yoginīs,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: rtsa yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: rtsa yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
translated: the nature of the channel is the yoginī.

original: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de ni rmad byung chen po ste //
analyzed: de ni rmad byung chen po ste //
translated: That is the great wonder,

original: zhes pa ni gnas der byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni che ba'i mchog ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnas der byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni che ba'i mchog ces pa'i don to //
translated: means that the bodhicitta arisen in that place is the supreme great one.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The Buddha, etc., is easy to understand.

original: de nyid he ru ka dpa' bo //
analyzed: de nyid he ru ka dpa' bo //
translated: That is the hero Heruka,

original: zhes pa la he ru ka'i sgras yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid sku gsung thugs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la he ru ka'i sgras yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid sku gsung thugs so //
translated: means that the word Heruka is the nature of the three syllables, body, speech, and mind.

original: dpa' bo ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dpa' bo ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Hero means free from passion, etc.

original: 'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa //
translated: The liberator from the fear of saṃsāra,

original: zhes pa ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar byed pa bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar byed pa bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go ;
translated: means that the Bhagavān Heruka is the liberator from the fear of saṃsāra.

original: ; sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ; sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni /
translated: The practice of the Buddha’s skull,

original: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas he ru ka'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa bsgom par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas he ru ka'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa bsgom par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that one should meditate on the innate nature of Heruka by the perfect union of the vajra and lotus.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde 'bab pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde 'bab pa //
translated: The descent of bliss of all Buddhas

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: means the following.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sgra ni mig la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sgra ni mig la sogs pa ste /
translated: The word Buddha refers to the eye, etc.

original: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin rtag tu bde ba 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin rtag tu bde ba 'bab pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the descent of bliss of all of them, which is the nature of the Buddha, is constant.

original: rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs sde //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs sde //
translated: The diverse army of yoginis

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: means the following.

original: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ni aa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ni aa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The diverse army of yoginis is of the nature of the letter A.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
translated: What is the special quality of this?

original: ta dad pa sbyar ba'i yi ge ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ta dad pa sbyar ba'i yi ge ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The meaning is that it is not the letter A as it is ordinarily pronounced,

original: ta dngar sbyar ba'i yi ge aa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ta dngar sbyar ba'i yi ge aa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: but the letter A as it is pronounced with the addition of the letter T.

original: ta'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ta'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The word T refers to the bodhicitta.

original: ra ni chags pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: ra ni chags pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The word R refers to the nature of passion,

original: de nyid kyis na khrag dang khu ba'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na khrag dang khu ba'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: and by that very fact it refers to the nature of blood and semen.

original: de ni thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: de ni thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la // zhes pa la /
translated: That is the mandala in the middle of the skull.

original: thod pa ni sprul ba'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thod pa ni sprul ba'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: In the above, the skull is the emanation wheel.

original: de nyid dkyil 'khor de dkyil ni snying @114b po'o ;
analyzed: de nyid dkyil 'khor de dkyil ni snying @114b po'o ;
translated: That itself is the mandala. The middle is the essence.

original: ;'khor ni len pa ste dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ;'khor ni len pa ste dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The wheel is the collection.

original: sngags dang rgyud ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud ni rnam par gnas //
translated: The mantra and tantra are situated there.

original: zhes pa ni yid skyob par gyur pa'i phyir na sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yid skyob par gyur pa'i phyir na sngags so //
translated: The mantra is so called because it protects the mind.

original: des sems rnam par rtog pa las skyob par byed pas na rgyud do //
analyzed: des sems rnam par rtog pa las skyob par byed pas na rgyud do //
translated: The tantra is so called because it protects the mind from discursive thought.

original: sngags dang rgyud mtha' dag gi don rnam par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud mtha' dag gi don rnam par gnas pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the entire mantra and tantra is situated there.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Situated in various ways is the meaning of situated.

original: de ye shes bzang po zhes pa ni shes pas ye shes so //
analyzed: de ye shes bzang po zhes pa ni shes pas ye shes so //
translated: That is the good wisdom. Wisdom is so called because it knows.

original: mdzes pas na bzang po'o //
analyzed: mdzes pas na bzang po'o //
translated: Good is so called because it is beautiful.

original: de nyid kyis ni ye shes bzang po mchog ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni ye shes bzang po mchog ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: That itself is the good wisdom, the supreme.

original: lhan cig skyes pa dag las byung //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dag las byung //
translated: It arises from the connate.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyar ba las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyar ba las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba skyes pa'o //
translated: This is the arising of the innate joy from the perfect union of the vajra and lotus.

original: dag pa las byung bas na dag byung ngo //
analyzed: dag pa las byung bas na dag byung ngo //
translated: Since it arises from the pure, it is pure-arisen.

original: der ni rig pa'i dbang lnga dang // zhes pa ni /
analyzed: der ni rig pa'i dbang lnga dang // zhes pa ni /
translated: There, the five awarenesses🔽In that place, the bindu has five light rays in the nāḍī of emanation.

original: sprul ba'i mdud par thig le la 'od zer lnga yod pa de ni dbang lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sprul ba'i mdud par thig le la 'od zer lnga yod pa de ni dbang lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It has the nature of the five empowerments.

original: sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te //
translated: It has the name of the seven buddhas.

original: zhes pa ni gnas der sangs rgyas bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ri mo bdun gyi bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnas der sangs rgyas bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ri mo bdun gyi bskor ba'o //
translated: In that place, there are seven lines that have the nature of the seven buddhas.

original: ri mo bdun po phra ba'i rang bzhin 'bar ba'i bsgom pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ri mo bdun po phra ba'i rang bzhin 'bar ba'i bsgom pa gsungs pa /
translated: The seven lines are taught to be the blazing of the nature of the subtle.

original: gang gi tshe rlung 'byung ba de'i tshe ri mo bdun 'byung bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rlung 'byung ba de'i tshe ri mo bdun 'byung bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: When the vāyu moves, at that time, imagine that the seven lines move.

original: gang gi tshe 'jug pa de'i tshe thig le phra mo la rang gi sems 'jug par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'jug pa de'i tshe thig le phra mo la rang gi sems 'jug par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: When it enters, at that time, meditate that one’s mind enters the subtle bindu.

original: de nyid dbang bskur zhes pa'i tha tshi go //
analyzed: de nyid dbang bskur zhes pa'i tha tshi go //
translated: That is the empowerment conferral.

original: bsgom bzhin pas na bskyed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni lhan cig skyes par gsungs te /
analyzed: bsgom bzhin pas na bskyed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni lhan cig skyes par gsungs te /
translated: The pristine wisdom that is generated by meditating on that is said to be connate.

original: dbang bskur ba bdun zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽yang sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba bdun zhes pa'i tha tshig go // yang sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning of “seven empowerments.”

original: sangs rgyas bdun ni rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can la sogs pa ste bsam gtan 'dis sangs rgyas bdun 'grub ces pa'i tha tshig go //🔽sna tshogs sbyor dang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bdun ni rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can la sogs pa ste bsam gtan 'dis sangs rgyas bdun 'grub ces pa'i tha tshig go // sna tshogs sbyor dang zhes pa ni /
translated: Again, “the seven buddhas” are Vipaśyin, Śikhin, and so on. This means that by this meditative stabilization the seven buddhas are accomplished.

original: dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs pa 'grub pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs pa 'grub pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Various yogas” means that various yogas of the means of achieving powers and so on are accomplished.

original: tshe 'phel zhes pa ni tshe 'phel ba'i sbyor ba gsungs pa /🔽gang gi tshe rlung 'jug pa de'i tshe aa'o //
analyzed: tshe 'phel zhes pa ni tshe 'phel ba'i sbyor ba gsungs pa / gang gi tshe rlung 'jug pa de'i tshe aa'o //
translated: “Increasing life” is the teaching of the yoga of increasing life.🔽When the wind enters, at that time think of āḥ.

original: gang gi tshe rlung 'byung ba de'i tshe h'um bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rlung 'byung ba de'i tshe h'um bsam par bya'o //
translated: When the wind exits, at that time think of hūṃ.

original: 'di ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bzlas pa ste /
translated: This is the recitation of method and wisdom.

original: des tshe 'phel gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des tshe 'phel gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: By that, life increases, but not otherwise.

original: @115a * // sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: @115a * // sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the practice of the Buddha Skull,

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas thams cad sgrub ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor bas thams cad sgrub ste /
translated: means by the practice of the union of the vajra and lotus, all is accomplished,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //🔽man ngag lam las gang shes pa //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no // man ngag lam las gang shes pa //
translated: but not otherwise.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: What is known from the path of instruction,

original: 'dis lung 'bogs par byed pas na man ngag go //
analyzed: 'dis lung 'bogs par byed pas na man ngag go //
translated: means that which is called instruction because it instructs,

original: tshol bas na lam mo //
analyzed: tshol bas na lam mo //
translated: and the path is that which is sought.

original: gang shes pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gang shes pa zhes pa ni /
translated: What is known means

original: khyod kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad shes par bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad shes par bya zhes pa'o //
translated: that all that you have said should be known.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: bla ma'i drin las zhes pa la /
analyzed: bla ma'i drin las zhes pa la /
translated: By the grace of the guru,

original: bla ma ni rgyud dang sngags ston par byed pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma ni rgyud dang sngags ston par byed pas na ston pa'o //
translated: The guru is the teacher because he teaches the tantra and mantra.

original: de'i drin gyis de kho na nyid shes par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i drin gyis de kho na nyid shes par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: By his grace, reality should be known, is the meaning.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po //
translated: The great tantra of the Buddha Skull,

original: zhes pa la thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ni sangs rgyas thod pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes pa la thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ni sangs rgyas thod pa zhes brjod do //
translated: The yoga of the nature of method and wisdom is called the Buddha Skull.

original: rgyud kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rgyud chen po'o //
analyzed: rgyud kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rgyud chen po'o //
translated: Since it is a tantra and it is great, it is a great tantra.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rtsa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi gong na med pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rtsa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi gong na med pa ste /
translated: The non-existence of yoginis means the non-existence of the yoginis that are of the nature of the channels.

original: ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul las 'das pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul las 'das pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that it is beyond the domain of verbal expression.

original: gsang ba zhes pa ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The secret is of the nature of method.

original: shin tu gsang ba zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: shin tu gsang ba zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The very secret is of the nature of wisdom.

original: dngos grub thams cad ces pa ni //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ces pa ni //
translated: All powers means

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad ster gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad ster gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: that all powers are bestowed by the practice of the Buddha Skull Tantra, not by any other.

original: ye shes gtan la dbab pa zhes pa la shes pas na ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes gtan la dbab pa zhes pa la shes pas na ye shes so //
translated: As for determining pristine consciousness, it is pristine consciousness because it is known.

original: le'u gang la ye shes gtan la dbab pa yod pa'i le'u de ni ye shes gtan la dbab pa'i le'u'o //
analyzed: le'u gang la ye shes gtan la dbab pa yod pa'i le'u de ni ye shes gtan la dbab pa'i le'u'o //
translated: The chapter in which there is the determination of pristine consciousness is the chapter of the determination of pristine consciousness.

original: thod pa kha bye ba las zhes pa la /
analyzed: thod pa kha bye ba las zhes pa la /
translated: As for from the opened skull,

original: thod pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o ;
analyzed: thod pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o ;
translated: the skull is the great-bliss wheel.

original: ; kha phye ba zhes pa ni gsang ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽glegs bam byung zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ; kha phye ba zhes pa ni gsang ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go // glegs bam byung zhes pa ni /
translated: The word opened is synonymous with secret.🔽 The word book

original: yang dag par byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang dag par byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: is synonymous with arisen.

original: le'u zhes pa la sgrib g-yogs gcod pas na le'u'o //
analyzed: le'u zhes pa la sgrib g-yogs gcod pas na le'u'o //
translated: The word chapter is synonymous with cutting through obscuration.

original: slob dpon chen po sa ra ha pas mdzad pa'i dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa las le'u dang po'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po sa ra ha pas mdzad pa'i dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa las le'u dang po'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the first chapter of the commentary called Endowed with Wisdom, composed by the great master Saraha.

original: // / de nas zhes pa ni dngos grub thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i rjes thogs su thal ba'i sbyor ba dang / las sna tshogs gtan la 'bebs pa'i sngags kyi le'u gsungs so //
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa ni dngos grub thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i rjes thogs su thal ba'i sbyor ba dang / las sna tshogs gtan la 'bebs pa'i sngags kyi le'u gsungs so //
translated: Then, after the chapter on the ascertainment of all powers, the chapter on the mantra of the ascertainment of the various rites and actions is taught.

original: ji bzhin gsungs pa zhes pa ni sangs @115b rgyas thod pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis po las ji lta ba bzhin ba tus pa'i sngags rnam pa nyi shu po de sngags kyi le 'u las 'char par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji bzhin gsungs pa zhes pa ni sangs @115b rgyas thod pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis po las ji lta ba bzhin ba tus pa'i sngags rnam pa nyi shu po de sngags kyi le 'u las 'char par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word just as refers to the twenty types of mantra that are extracted from the root tantra of the Buddha's Crown in twelve thousand chapters, which will arise in the chapter on the mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po rnams //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po rnams //🔽zhes pa la /
translated: The dakinis, the mothers, and the bhutas,

original: mkha' 'gro ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi 'grub pa'o //
translated: The dakinis are the four yoginis, Dakini and so forth.

original: ma mo zhes pa ni thabs dang 'brel ba'i ma mo zhes bstan to //
analyzed: ma mo zhes pa ni thabs dang 'brel ba'i ma mo zhes bstan to //
translated: The mamos are taught to be the mamos connected with the method.

original: 'byung po zhes pa ni zhi byed la sogs pa 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung po zhes pa ni zhi byed la sogs pa 'grub pa'o //
translated: The bhutas are the accomplishments of pacification and so forth.

original: dad pa brtan pas zhes pa ni rgyud 'di la dad pa brtan pa gang yin pa de ni dad pa brtan pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa brtan pas zhes pa ni rgyud 'di la dad pa brtan pa gang yin pa de ni dad pa brtan pa'o //
translated: With firm faith is the firm faith in this tantra.

original: rgyu des na sngags kyi le'u nyon cig ces sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu des na sngags kyi le'u nyon cig ces sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: By that cause, listen to the chapter on mantra is to be applied.

original: aom buddha ka p'a lo ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: aom buddha ka p'a lo ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Om buddhakapalani and so forth are easy to understand.

original: aom ham zhes pa la sogs pa ni gnas bdun gyi go cha'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom ham zhes pa la sogs pa ni gnas bdun gyi go cha'i sngags so //
translated: Om ham and so forth are the armor mantras of the seven places.

original: de'i gnas gsungs pa snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / spyi gtsug dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang ba dang / yan lag thams cad kyi gnas su rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyis sngags 'dis cho cha ba'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas gsungs pa snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / spyi gtsug dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang ba dang / yan lag thams cad kyi gnas su rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyis sngags 'dis cho cha ba'o //
translated: The places are taught to be the heart, forehead, crown, two shoulders, two eyes, secret place, and all the limbs. The yogi himself should armor with this mantra in those places.

original: go cha'i sngags kyi rjes thogs su dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo //
analyzed: go cha'i sngags kyi rjes thogs su dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo //
translated: After the armor mantra, invite the mandala.

original: de'i rjes thogs su gshegs su gsol lo //
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs su gshegs su gsol lo //
translated: After that, request them to depart.

original: de'i rjes thogs su gtor ma gtong ngo //
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs su gtor ma gtong ngo //
translated: After that, offer the bali.

original: gtor ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: gtor ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bali?

original: 'byung po thams cad la'o //
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad la'o //
translated: It is for all the bhūtas.

original: da ni mi snang bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni mi snang bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the invisibility is taught:

original: 'bras s'a lu blangs te zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras s'a lu blangs te zhes pa ni /
translated: Taking red rice,

original: 'bras dmar po chus lugs so //
analyzed: 'bras dmar po chus lugs so //
translated: the red rice is washed with water.

original: 'o mas zhes pa ni ba dkar mo'i 'o mas bkrus zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'o mas zhes pa ni ba dkar mo'i 'o mas bkrus zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Milk means washed with white cow's milk.

original: gzhon nu ma zhes pa ni nu ma ma mnyes shing pabma  ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma zhes pa ni nu ma ma mnyes shing pabma  ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A virgin is one whose breasts have not developed and whose hymen is intact.

original: gzhon nu ma ste des 'bras btags par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma ste des 'bras btags par bya'o //
translated: She should tie the rice.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How is that done?

original: de nyid gsungs pa shin tu zhib par btags zhes pa ni 'bras phye mar byas la ras bal gyis btsag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa shin tu zhib par btags zhes pa ni 'bras phye mar byas la ras bal gyis btsag par bya ste /
translated: That is taught: Very finely ground, meaning that the rice is ground into flour and sifted with cotton.

original: des ni phye ma zhib mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni phye ma zhib mor 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, it becomes fine flour.

original: btags pa 'di las phyag bzhi pa'i khrag 'thung byas te /
analyzed: btags pa 'di las phyag bzhi pa'i khrag 'thung byas te /
translated: Having made the four-armed Heruka from this flour,

original: g-yas na ral gri dang thod pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas na ral gri dang thod pa'o //
translated: In the right hand, a sword and a skull-cup.

original: g-yon na cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga'o //
analyzed: g-yon na cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga'o //
translated: In the left, a small drum and a Khatvanga staff.

original: rnam pa he ru ka bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa he ru ka bya'o //
translated: One should visualize the form of Heruka.

original: ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i phye mas zhes pa ni dur khrod kyi sol ba'i phye ma'o //
analyzed: ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i phye mas zhes pa ni dur khrod kyi sol ba'i phye ma'o //
translated: The ashes of a funeral pyre means the ashes of a cremation ground.

original: rdo rje gtsug ces pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug ces pa ni /
translated: The vajra crest

original: dang po khrag dang ldan pa dang @116a * //
analyzed: dang po khrag dang ldan pa dang @116a * //
translated: is the first menstrual blood.

original: snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gtsug ces bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gtsug ces bya'o //
translated: The bodhicitta that arises from union is called the vajra crest.

original: rdo rje gtsug de dang dur khrod kyi sol ba'i phye ma mnye bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug de dang dur khrod kyi sol ba'i phye ma mnye bar bya'o //
translated: One should mix that vajra crest with the ashes of a funeral pyre.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes pa ni he ru ka'i rnal 'byor byas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes pa ni he ru ka'i rnal 'byor byas te /
translated: The yogī of the Buddha's skull means one who has performed the yoga of Heruka.

original: rdo rje dang padmo'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba las /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padmo'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba las /
translated: From the perfect union of the vajra and lotus,

original: aom ma h'a badzra he ru ka zer ba la zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom ma h'a badzra he ru ka zer ba la zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: one should recite the mantra Oṃ mahāvajraheruka and so forth.

original: chu zhes pa ni nang gi chu ste lan bdun mngon par bsngags la he ru ka'i gzugs brnyan bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu zhes pa ni nang gi chu ste lan bdun mngon par bsngags la he ru ka'i gzugs brnyan bkru bar bya'o //
translated: The “water” is the inner water, and one should wash the image of Heruka while repeating it seven times.

original: bla ma dang sangs rgyas mchod par byas te gdong bkrus na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla ma dang sangs rgyas mchod par byas te gdong bkrus na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one washes one’s face while worshipping the guru and the buddhas, one will become as one has been described.

original: de'i rjes thogs su thal ba'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs su thal ba'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: After that, the application of the ashes is taught.

original: gzugs brnyan de nyid la shing 'ba' bo las so phug cing shing 'ba' bo la shun phrags bshus pa skam po dang / tshangs pa rdo rje zhes pa'i dri chen skam po dang lhan cig bsreg ste dur khrod kyi me rab tu sbar ba la gzugs brnyan de thal bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de nyid la shing 'ba' bo las so phug cing shing 'ba' bo la shun phrags bshus pa skam po dang / tshangs pa rdo rje zhes pa'i dri chen skam po dang lhan cig bsreg ste dur khrod kyi me rab tu sbar ba la gzugs brnyan de thal bar bya'o //
translated: In that very image, one should dig with a hoe made of khadira wood, and having stripped off the bark of the khadira wood, one should burn it together with the dry feces called “Brahma-vajra” in a fire that has been lit in a charnel ground, and one should reduce the image to ashes.

original: de nas thal ba de kham phor so ma btang ba la nyi ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thal ba de kham phor so ma btang ba la nyi ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should place the ashes in an unfired clay pot for four days in the sun.

original: de nas padma'i snod du nyi ma lngar gzhag go //
analyzed: de nas padma'i snod du nyi ma lngar gzhag go //
translated: Then, one should place it in a lotus vessel for five days in the sun.

original: de nas zhag dgur sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhag dgur sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Then, for nine days, one should recite the mantra.

original: sngags gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngags gsungs pa /
translated: The mantra is taught:

original: aom buddha ka p'a li ni zhes pa la sogs sngags rkang pa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: aom buddha ka p'a li ni zhes pa la sogs sngags rkang pa lnga pa'o //
translated: Oṃ buddhakāpalinī and so forth, five lines of mantra.

original: kham por so ma btang ba dang / padma dag gi man ngag gsungs pa /
analyzed: kham por so ma btang ba dang / padma dag gi man ngag gsungs pa /
translated: The instructions for the unfired clay pot and the lotuses are stated:

original: gnyis ka la yang padma 'dab ma bzhi pa bris te /
analyzed: gnyis ka la yang padma 'dab ma bzhi pa bris te /
translated: On both, draw a four-petaled lotus.

original: dbus su ni sna tshogs sde ma'i sngags bri'o //
analyzed: dbus su ni sna tshogs sde ma'i sngags bri'o //
translated: In the center, write the mantra of Viśvamātā.

original: 'dab ma rnams la ni gzhan gyi sngags bri'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma rnams la ni gzhan gyi sngags bri'o //
translated: On the petals, write the other mantras.

original: de ltar byas nas thal ba gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas thal ba gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Having done that, place the ashes.

original: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Then, recite the mantra.

original: rdo rje gtsug gis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug gis zhes pa ni /
translated: The vajra crest is as follows:

original: rang 'byung dang bsres pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang thal bar bsres te /
analyzed: rang 'byung dang bsres pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang thal bar bsres te /
translated: Mix self-arisen and blended bodhicitta with the ashes.

original: lus byug par bya'o //
analyzed: lus byug par bya'o //
translated: Anoint the body with that.

original: de'i lus la mtshon cha phog na yang mi tshugs shing dgra thams cad kyi mgo chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i lus la mtshon cha phog na yang mi tshugs shing dgra thams cad kyi mgo chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if weapons strike that person's body, they will not penetrate, and the heads of all enemies will be severed.

original: skyes bu de la 'gal bar spyod pa tsam gyis longs spyod pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: skyes bu de la 'gal bar spyod pa tsam gyis longs spyod pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: By merely acting in contradiction to that person, one will obtain enjoyments and so forth.

original: mar khu bzang pos zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mar khu bzang pos zhes pa ni /
translated: The excellent ghee is as follows:

original: 'phyang ba'i skyes bu'i mar khu dang / thal ba lhan cig sbyar bas mig la byugs na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phyang ba'i skyes bu'i mar khu dang / thal ba lhan cig sbyar bas mig la byugs na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: The eye ointment of the person hanging upside down, together with the ashes, when applied to the eyes, one will become as described.

original: gang ci yang rung ba zhes pa la @116b sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gang ci yang rung ba zhes pa la @116b sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Whatever is suitable, etc., is easy to understand.

original: rdzas su bya bar gsungs pa thal ba dang zha nye'i phye ma dang / rdo rje'i gtsug lhan cig tu cha mnyam par byas la /
analyzed: rdzas su bya bar gsungs pa thal ba dang zha nye'i phye ma dang / rdo rje'i gtsug lhan cig tu cha mnyam par byas la /
translated: The substances mentioned are ashes, iron filings, and diamond dust, made equal parts.

original: de nas kha ba len gyi lcags kyi phye ma dang / gser gyi phye ma cha mnyam pa yang bsre'o //
analyzed: de nas kha ba len gyi lcags kyi phye ma dang / gser gyi phye ma cha mnyam pa yang bsre'o //
translated: Then, the filings of zinc and gold dust are also mixed.

original: rdo rje mchu'i khu ba zhes pa ni shin tu gnag pa'i phag gi khrag go //
analyzed: rdo rje mchu'i khu ba zhes pa ni shin tu gnag pa'i phag gi khrag go //
translated: The juice of the diamond flower is the blood of a very black pig.

original: zangs ma'i snod ces pa ni snod der nyi ma bdun du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: zangs ma'i snod ces pa ni snod der nyi ma bdun du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The copper vessel is the vessel in which it is to be placed for seven days.

original: mkhris pa chen pos zhes pa ni mi'i mkhris pas mnye bar bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mkhris pa chen pos zhes pa ni mi'i mkhris pas mnye bar bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: With great bile means that it is to be churned with human bile.

original: rta'i khrag dang zhes pa ni snod de nyid du nyi ma gsum du mnye bar bya'o //
analyzed: rta'i khrag dang zhes pa ni snod de nyid du nyi ma gsum du mnye bar bya'o //
translated: And the horse blood is to be churned in that very vessel for three days.

original: lcags kyi snod du zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: lcags kyi snod du zhes pa ni ;
translated: In an iron vessel means

original: khab len gyi lcags kyi snod du gzhag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: khab len gyi lcags kyi snod du gzhag par bya ba'o //
translated: in a vessel of magnetic iron.

original: me'i nang du bcug na gser dang dngul du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni /🔽zangs ma ni gser du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me'i nang du bcug na gser dang dngul du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni / zangs ma ni gser du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is placed in fire, it becomes gold and silver.🔽Copper becomes gold.

original: lcags ni dngul du 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: lcags ni dngul du 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Iron becomes silver.

original: srang gcig kyang srang stong gi zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: srang gcig kyang srang stong gi zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: One ounce of this, etc. , is easy to understand.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du gang gsungs pa'i sbyor ba des ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du gang gsungs pa'i sbyor ba des ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By the yoga taught in the Guhyasamaja and other tantras, it will not be accomplished.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du ni gdon mi za ba kho nar 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du ni gdon mi za ba kho nar 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: In the Yoginitantras, it will certainly be accomplished, not otherwise.

original: glegs bam la ma bris zhes pa ni /
analyzed: glegs bam la ma bris zhes pa ni /
