translated: Not written in a book means

original: glegs bam bklags pas shes par mi 'gyur gyi bla ma'i drin las shes par bya zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: glegs bam bklags pas shes par mi 'gyur gyi bla ma'i drin las shes par bya zhes pa'i don te /
translated: that it is not to be known by reading a book, but by the kindness of the guru.

original: bla ma'i drin las shes par bya //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: bla ma'i drin las shes par bya // zhes pa la /
translated: It is to be known by the kindness of the guru.

original: dang po dga' ba ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: dang po dga' ba ni bla ma'o //
translated: The first joy is the guru.

original: bla mas dngos grub ces pa ni mchog tu dga' ba ste mchog tu grub pa'i gnas skabs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bla mas dngos grub ces pa ni mchog tu dga' ba ste mchog tu grub pa'i gnas skabs zhes pa'o //
translated: The guru says that siddhi is supreme joy, the state of supreme accomplishment.

original: bla mas thar zhes pa ni dga' bral te rnam pa sna tshogs pas thar zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bla mas thar zhes pa ni dga' bral te rnam pa sna tshogs pas thar zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The guru says that mukti is the separation from joy, up to the separation from the various.

original: bla ma ston pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de nyid ston pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma ston pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de nyid ston pa'o //
translated: The guru is the teacher of the innate joy.

original: ltas blta ba'i don du bu mo zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ltas blta ba'i don du bu mo zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The meaning of “girl” and so on for the purpose of divination is easy to understand.

original: bdug spos lngas zhes pa ni go ku da ha na ste sha lnga'i spos kyis bdug par bya'o ;
analyzed: bdug spos lngas zhes pa ni go ku da ha na ste sha lnga'i spos kyis bdug par bya'o ;
translated: The five incense are gokūdana, the incense of the five meats.

original: ; bu mo la 'bab ces pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ; bu mo la 'bab ces pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: “Girl” and so on is easy to understand.

original: ral gri'i dngos grub gsungs pa grub don gyi 'bras bu zhes pa ni yungs kar dkar po ste /🔽bu mo'i thod par bskyed de smin pa'i yungs kar 'di dang / aom buddha ka p'a li ni zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags @117a * //
analyzed: ral gri'i dngos grub gsungs pa grub don gyi 'bras bu zhes pa ni yungs kar dkar po ste / bu mo'i thod par bskyed de smin pa'i yungs kar 'di dang / aom buddha ka p'a li ni zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags @117a * //
translated: The statement of the siddhi of the sword is “the result of the purpose of accomplishment.”🔽White mustard seeds are generated in the skull of the girl and ripen as mustard seeds.

original: bsnyen pa 'bum byas la /
analyzed: bsnyen pa 'bum byas la /
translated: This and the mantra oṃ buddhakapālinī and so on are repeated one hundred thousand times.

original: yungs kar dang lhan cig bu mo'i gdong la sngags des bsnun par bya'o //
analyzed: yungs kar dang lhan cig bu mo'i gdong la sngags des bsnun par bya'o //
translated: Together with mustard seed, one should strike the girl’s face with this mantra.

original: bsnun ma thag tu sngags kyi mthus ral gri'i dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsnun ma thag tu sngags kyi mthus ral gri'i dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Immediately upon striking, by the power of the mantra, the accomplishment of the sword will be achieved, as taught.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: “The yogin of Buddhakapāla” and so forth is easy to understand.

original: ri lu'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ri lu'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of mercury is taught:

original: de'i thal ba zhes pa ni de'i thal ba yang dag par blangs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i thal ba zhes pa ni de'i thal ba yang dag par blangs pa'o //
translated: “Its ash” is taking up its ash.

original: lcags gsum zhes pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang byin za ste /
analyzed: lcags gsum zhes pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang byin za ste /
translated: “The three metals” are the sun, moon, and Rāhu.

original: zangs ma dang dngul dang gser rnams rim pa bzhin du dkri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zangs ma dang dngul dang gser rnams rim pa bzhin du dkri bar bya'o //
translated: Copper, silver, and gold are to be wrapped in sequence.

original: de'i tshad gsang ba'i mdzod las ;
analyzed: de'i tshad gsang ba'i mdzod las ;
translated: Its measure is taught in the Secret Treasury:

original: gser dang zla ba zangs ma rnams //
analyzed: gser dang zla ba zangs ma rnams //
translated: Gold, silver, and copper

original: rig byed gsum bzhi ma sha'i tshad //
analyzed: rig byed gsum bzhi ma sha'i tshad //
translated: are the measure of the three Vedas, four, and five māṣas.

original: ra ti bdun gsum lnga lhag pas //
analyzed: ra ti bdun gsum lnga lhag pas //
translated: With seven, three, and five māṣas in excess,

original: rim pa bzhin du ri lu bcings //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du ri lu bcings //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: the mercury pills are wrapped in sequence.

original: rim pa 'dis dkris na ri lu'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rim pa 'dis dkris na ri lu'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If one binds in this sequence, one will accomplish the power of the pill.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: sum cu pa yang 'khor zhes pa la sogs pas che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sum cu pa yang 'khor zhes pa la sogs pas che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The thirty-second verse also states the greatness of the wheel, etc.

original: thal ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni //
analyzed: thal ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni //
translated: These syllogisms of the consequences

original: sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka' //
translated: are difficult to find even for the Buddhas.

original: zhes pa ni gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' na /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' na /
translated: This means that if they are difficult to find even for the Buddhas,

original: gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci yod ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci yod ces pa'i don to //
translated: what need is there to mention others?

original: aom buddha ka p'a li dza: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di ni dbang du byed pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom buddha ka p'a li dza: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di ni dbang du byed pa'i sngags so //
translated: Oṃ buddha kapālī jaḥ, etc. This is the mantra for subjugation.

original: sna tshogs sde ma mdog dmar po bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma mdog dmar po bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the red-colored Cāmuṇḍā.

original: aom ma h'a ka p'a li badzra zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis skrod par byed do //
analyzed: aom ma h'a ka p'a li badzra zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis skrod par byed do //
translated: With the mantra Oṃ mahākapālī vajra, etc., one should drive away.

original: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sna tshogs sde ma bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sna tshogs sde ma bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should meditate on Cāmuṇḍā in accordance with the rite, this is the meaning.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa la /
translated: As for Buddhakapāla, etc.

original: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The Buddha is the vajra.

original: thod pa ni padma ste /
analyzed: thod pa ni padma ste /
translated: The skull is the lotus.

original: 'di dag ni rgyud do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni rgyud do //
translated: These are the tantras.

original: rgyud kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rgyud chen po'o //
analyzed: rgyud kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rgyud chen po'o //
translated: Since it is a tantra and it is great, it is the Great Tantra.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhes pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhes pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The yoginis are the goddesses such as Yamari.

original: gong na med pa zhes pa ni ngag gi lam gyi yul las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes pa ni ngag gi lam gyi yul las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is unsurpassed because it transcends the domain of verbal expression.

original: gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes pa la gsang ba ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes pa la gsang ba ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the secret of secrets because it is the secret of the Guhyasamaja and so forth.

original: de bas kyang gsang ba ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de bas kyang gsang ba ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud do //
translated: It is more secret than that because it is the Buddhakapala Tantra.

original: thal ba'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni thal ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa'o //
analyzed: thal ba'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni thal ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa'o //
translated: The ash union is the explanation of the ash union.

original: @117b lam sna tshogs gtan la dbab pa zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: @117b lam sna tshogs gtan la dbab pa zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las kyi tshogs so //
translated: The ascertainment of various paths is the collection of various activities.

original: le'u gang la sngags yod pa de ni sngags kyi le'u'o //
analyzed: le'u gang la sngags yod pa de ni sngags kyi le'u'o //
translated: The chapter in which the mantra is found is the mantra chapter.

original: gcig la ltos pas na gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gcig la ltos pas na gnyis pa'o //
translated: Since it depends on one, it is the second.

original: las kyi tshogs du ma'i rjes su lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi tshogs du ma'i rjes su lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
translated: After the many collections of activities, the god chapter should be explained.

original: de nas zhes pa ni de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then means immediately.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi said this to the yoginī Viśvamātā.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rab sbas pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rab sbas pa //
translated: The secret of all buddhas

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis skal ba med pa'i sems can la ma gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis skal ba med pa'i sems can la ma gsungs pa'o //
translated: means that the deities such as Vajrasattva are not taught to sentient beings who are not fortunate.

original: de ni 'bad de zhes pa ni kye ma lha mo nang gi don yang dag pa'i sbyor bas gsal bar mdzod ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni 'bad de zhes pa ni kye ma lha mo nang gi don yang dag pa'i sbyor bas gsal bar mdzod ces pa'i don to //
translated: That should be made clear with effort means, “Alas, goddess, make clear the inner reality through the practice of union.”

original: ci zhig gsal bar mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig gsal bar mdzad ce na /
translated: What is made clear?

original: de nyid gsungs pa lha'i le'u zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa lha'i le'u zhes pa ste /
translated: That itself is stated: the chapter on the deities.

original: he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed pa'i le'u'o//
analyzed: he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed pa'i le'u'o//
translated: The chapter on the generation of the deities such as Heruka.

original: ji lta bu zhes pa ni ji lta bur 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhes pa ni ji lta bur 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: What kind? means what kind of?

original: gang du zhe na /🔽sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gang du zhe na / sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa ste /
translated: Where?🔽In the Buddha’s Skull.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sgra ni he ru ka'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sgra ni he ru ka'o //
translated: The word buddha is Heruka.

original: thod pa ni lha mo'o //
analyzed: thod pa ni lha mo'o //
translated: Skull is the goddess.

original: rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab dag ji ltar bsgom par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab dag ji ltar bsgom par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: The yoginīs are the method and wisdom, and how they are cultivated.

original: rgyud du lha rnams du zhig gsungs //
analyzed: rgyud du lha rnams du zhig gsungs //
translated: How many deities are taught in the tantra?

original: zhes pa ni rgyud 'dir lha'i grangs du zhig gsungs zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgyud 'dir lha'i grangs du zhig gsungs zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means how many numbers of deities are taught in this tantra.

original: gzugs ji lta bu zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gzugs ji lta bu zhes pa ni /
translated: What are their forms?

original: lha de rnams kyi mdog dang phyag la sogs pa ji lta bu lags zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lha de rnams kyi mdog dang phyag la sogs pa ji lta bu lags zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means what are the colors, hand implements, and so on of those deities.

original: gus pas zhes pa ni zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas pas nyan par 'tshal zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: gus pas zhes pa ni zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas pas nyan par 'tshal zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Respectfully means I wish to listen with respect and reverence.

original: gsungs pa zhes pa la aa ni lha mo'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa zhes pa la aa ni lha mo'o //
translated: The statement a is the goddess.

original: ha zhes pa ni he ru ka'o //
analyzed: ha zhes pa ni he ru ka'o //
translated: The statement ha is Heruka.

original: 'di dag gi sbyor ba de nyid sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gi sbyor ba de nyid sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The union of these two is the union of reality.

original: da ni sna tshogs sde ma'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sna tshogs sde ma'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the maṇḍala of Viśva is explained.

original: ram las nyi ma zhes pa ni bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas byang chub kyi tshogs kyi don du sems tsam du gnas te /
analyzed: ram las nyi ma zhes pa ni bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas byang chub kyi tshogs kyi don du sems tsam du gnas te /
translated: The statement the sun from raṃ means that oneself and all migrating beings are meditated on as emptiness and abide as mere mind for the purpose of the accumulation of enlightenment.

original: de'i snang ba'i ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i snang ba'i ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um ngo //
translated: The raṃ of that appearance completely transforms into a sun maṇḍala. Upon that, a hūṃ is generated.

original: de nyid phung po lnga'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor ma'i sems so //
analyzed: de nyid phung po lnga'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor ma'i sems so //
translated: That is the mind of the yoginī, the nature of the five aggregates.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i lte bar h'um ngo //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i lte bar h'um ngo //
translated: That completely transforms into a vajra with a hūṃ at the hub.

original: nag po bsreg pa'i bdag ces pa la /
analyzed: nag po bsreg pa'i bdag ces pa la /
translated: “Black, the nature of fire” means

original: @118a * // rdo rje de las byung ba'i 'od zer me dang 'od mnyam par 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: @118a * // rdo rje de las byung ba'i 'od zer me dang 'od mnyam par 'bar ba'o //
translated: that the vajra is blazing with light rays equal to fire and light.

original: 'od zer de nyid las srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer de nyid las srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
translated: From those light rays, one should meditate on the protection wheel.

original: mtshams bcings zhes pa ni phyogs bcur bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams bcings zhes pa ni phyogs bcur bcing bar bya'o //
translated: “Binding the directions” means binding in the ten directions.

original: ra ba zhes pa ni rdo rje'i ra bar bsam pa'o //
analyzed: ra ba zhes pa ni rdo rje'i ra bar bsam pa'o //
translated: “The fence” is imagining the vajra fence.

original: dra ba zhes pa ni nam mkha' gur gyi rnam par bkab pa bdag nyid kyis bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dra ba zhes pa ni nam mkha' gur gyi rnam par bkab pa bdag nyid kyis bsam par bya'o //
translated: “The net” is imagining the sky covered with the form of a tent.

original: mtshams bcing ba ni thugs so //
analyzed: mtshams bcing ba ni thugs so //
translated: The binding of the directions is mind.

original: ra ba ni gsung ngo //
analyzed: ra ba ni gsung ngo //
translated: The fence is speech.

original: dra ba ni sku ste sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi srung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: dra ba ni sku ste sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi srung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The net is body. The protection wheel is the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje nag po zhes pa ni h'um dang ldan pa'i rdo rje las rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgom zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje nag po zhes pa ni h'um dang ldan pa'i rdo rje las rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgom zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase “black vajra” means that one should visualize the vajra ground from the vajra endowed with the syllable hūṃ.

original: rdo rje sa gzhi'i dbus chud pa //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje sa gzhi'i dbus chud pa // zhes pa la /
translated: In the middle of the vajra ground,🔽the meaning of the phrase “in the middle of the vajra ground” is as follows.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje sa gzhi ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje sa gzhi ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The vajra ground that is coemergent is the emanation wheel.

original: gnas der gnas pas na /
analyzed: gnas der gnas pas na /
translated: Since it is located in that place,

original: de'i sa gzhi zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i sa gzhi zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it is called “its ground.”

original: ae yi rnam pa'i bdag nyid che //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: ae yi rnam pa'i bdag nyid che // zhes pa la /
translated: The great nature of the form of e.

original: ae'i cha byad che ba'i bdag nyid ni ae'i gnas te /
analyzed: ae'i cha byad che ba'i bdag nyid ni ae'i gnas te /
translated: The great nature of the form of e is the place of e.

original: sems can thams cad kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ni bdag nyid che ste de nyid 'tsho ba'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ni bdag nyid che ste de nyid 'tsho ba'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The great nature of all sentient beings is the great nature. It is the nature of life.

original: gru gsum zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: gru gsum zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The triangle is the triangle of the source of phenomena.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas de nyid khams gsum pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽yi ge lam gyur pa yis ni //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas de nyid khams gsum pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go // yi ge lam gyur pa yis ni //
translated: The source of phenomena is the nature of the three realms.🔽The square mandala is yellow

original: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rab ser ba //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rab ser ba //
translated: from the transformation of the syllable ma.

original: zhes pa ni yi ge lam yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la rdo rjes mtshan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni yi ge lam yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la rdo rjes mtshan pa ste /
translated: This is the square earth mandala, marked with a vajra, which is the transformation of the syllable Lam.

original: de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the nature of the Dharma wheel.

original: de'i dbus gnas zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus kyi steng du longs spyod kyi 'khor lo bcud kyi rten gyi rang bzhin chu'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus kyi steng du longs spyod kyi 'khor lo bcud kyi rten gyi rang bzhin chu'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: In the middle of that, means in the middle of the Dharma wheel, above, is the enjoyment wheel, the nature of the support of the essence, the water mandala.

original: aom las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni aom yongs su gyur pa las longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: aom las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni aom yongs su gyur pa las longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel arisen from Om is the enjoyment wheel, which is the transformation of Om.

original: 'khor lo'i dbus su yi ge aom bsam mo //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbus su yi ge aom bsam mo //
translated: One should think of the syllable Om in the middle of the wheel.

original: rtsa rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: rtsa rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can //
translated: The nature of all the channels.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams la gnas pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams la gnas pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that the innate nature abides in the channels of the four wheels.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs //
translated: The yoginis are situated there.

original: zhes pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis las byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa de rnams ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis las byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa de rnams ni /
translated: This means that the bodhicitta that flows from the thirty-two channels

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin te /
translated: It is the nature of great bliss.

original: der @118b gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: der @118b gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is what is meant by “abiding there.”

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: rab tu dga' ba'i nam mkha' las //🔽bde chen 'khor lo las ni brgyad //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i nam mkha' las // bde chen 'khor lo las ni brgyad //
translated: From the space of the very joyful,🔽eight are from the wheel of great bliss,

original: de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo'i brgyad //
analyzed: de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo'i brgyad //
translated: eight are from the wheel of enjoyment,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo las ni bzhi //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo las ni bzhi //
translated: four are from the wheel of phenomena,

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo las bcu gnyis //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo las bcu gnyis //
translated: and twelve are from the emanation wheel.

original: rtsa 'di dag ni bde chen dngos //
analyzed: rtsa 'di dag ni bde chen dngos //
translated: These channels are the actual great bliss,

original: rtag tu byang chub sems 'bab 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rtag tu byang chub sems 'bab 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and the bodhicitta always flows from them.

original: rtsa ni bcu drug la brgyan pa //
analyzed: rtsa ni bcu drug la brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with sixteen channels

original: zhes pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo la aom bcud kyi rten gyi rang bzhin du 'dug pa dang / aa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin bcu drug po de rnams kyis brgyan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo la aom bcud kyi rten gyi rang bzhin du 'dug pa dang / aa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin bcu drug po de rnams kyis brgyan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: means that the wheel of enjoyment is the nature of the support of the essence, and the sixteen natures beginning with a are said to be the adornment.

original: de nyid 'pho ba bcu drug gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'pho ba bcu drug gi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of the sixteen movements.

original: bde ba chen po 'khor lo'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po 'khor lo'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The thirty-two channels of the great-bliss wheel are the nature of the thirty-two periods.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la ni dbyug tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la ni dbyug tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The emanation wheel has the nature of sixty-four finger lengths.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo la ni thun brgyad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo la ni thun brgyad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The dharma wheel has the nature of eight periods.

original: des na rtsa brgya nyi shu'o zhes pa ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni brgya dang nyi shu'o //
analyzed: des na rtsa brgya nyi shu'o zhes pa ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni brgya dang nyi shu'o //
translated: Thus, there are one hundred and twenty nāḍīs.

original: de nas lus dang ngag dang sems kyis bsgres na sum brgya drug cur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas lus dang ngag dang sems kyis bsgres na sum brgya drug cur 'gyur ro //
translated: When those are multiplied by the body, voice, and mind, there are three hundred and sixty.

original: des ni lo gcig gi zhag gi grangs kyang gzung ngo //
analyzed: des ni lo gcig gi zhag gi grangs kyang gzung ngo //
translated: That also holds the number of days in a year.

original: sprul pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab //
analyzed: sprul pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab //
translated: The emanation wheel has sixty-four petals.

original: ces pa ni rlung gi 'pho ba phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis dbyug tshod bzhi brtsir med pa dor bas drug cu'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni rlung gi 'pho ba phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis dbyug tshod bzhi brtsir med pa dor bas drug cu'o //
translated: Since the subtle nature of the movement of the vāyu is calculated as four finger lengths, minus the four finger lengths that cannot be calculated, there are sixty.

original: sum brgya drug cu bsgres pa'i drug cu la ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang drug brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sum brgya drug cu bsgres pa'i drug cu la ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang drug brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: When those sixty are multiplied by three hundred and sixty, there are twenty-one thousand and six hundred.

original: 'dis lo gcig gi dbyug tshod dang zhag gcig gi dbugs kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis lo gcig gi dbyug tshod dang zhag gcig gi dbugs kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: This also should be understood as the finger lengths of a year and the vāyus of a single day.

original: rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid che //
analyzed: rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid che //
translated: The great nature of the vajrakāya

original: zhes pa la rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa la rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: The vajra is the Tathagatas.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi sku'o //
translated: The body is of their nature.

original: sku de la rtsa 'di dag gnas pa yin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sku de la rtsa 'di dag gnas pa yin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that these channels are located in that body.

original: de yi dbus gnas sa bon ni //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de yi dbus gnas sa bon ni // zhes pa ni /
translated: The seed is located in its center.

original: der 'khor lo bzhi'i ngo bo 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i sa bon gnas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: der 'khor lo bzhi'i ngo bo 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i sa bon gnas zhes pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the seed of the four great elements, which are the nature of the four wheels, is located there.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bam dkar yi ge las byung ba //
analyzed: bam dkar yi ge las byung ba //
translated: The white syllable Bam.

original: zhes pa ni bam yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bam yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the water maṇḍala, which is a circle arisen from the transformation of Bam, is marked with a vase.

original: bam de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: bam de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: That Bam is like the dharmacakra.

original: sa'i dkyil 'khor ni sngon du gsungs so //🔽rtsa rnams thams cad chu yi ni //
analyzed: sa'i dkyil 'khor ni sngon du gsungs so // rtsa rnams thams cad chu yi ni //
translated: The earth maṇḍala was mentioned previously.

original: dkyil 'khor la ni thim par @119a * //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la ni thim par @119a * //
translated: All the channels dissolve into the water maṇḍala.

original: 'gyur / ; zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las rlung gi bsgom pa'i rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo la thim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur / ; zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las rlung gi bsgom pa'i rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo la thim par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning is that, according to the guru’s instruction, all the channels, which are the nature of the vāyu yogas, dissolve into the dharmacakra.

original: de lta mod kyi der sems spre'u lta bu bla ma'i man ngag gis bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi der sems spre'u lta bu bla ma'i man ngag gis bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Nevertheless, the mind, which is like a monkey, should be bound by the guru's instructions.

original: slar yang bsam par bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'og gi char me'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang bsam par bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'og gi char me'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
translated: Again, what should be contemplated is the fire maṇḍala below the emanation cakra.

original: ram dmar las byung me'i dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: ram dmar las byung me'i dkyil 'khor //
translated: The fire maṇḍala arises from raṃ.

original: zhes pa ni ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum mdog dmar po 'bar ba bdun gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽rab tu 'bar bzhin pa yi ni ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum mdog dmar po 'bar ba bdun gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go // rab tu 'bar bzhin pa yi ni ;
translated: This means that one should contemplate the fire maṇḍala, which is triangular, red, and marked with seven flames, from the transformation of raṃ.

original: ; rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag blta //
analyzed: ; rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag blta //
translated: The channel cakra is seen blazing.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa'i gnas na sde brgyad kyis brgyan pa'i aa me ltar 'bar bzhin pa de blta zhing bsgom zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa'i gnas na sde brgyad kyis brgyan pa'i aa me ltar 'bar bzhin pa de blta zhing bsgom zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: that one should see and meditate on the blazing a in the location of the knot of the channel cakra, which is adorned with the eight groups.

original: yam gyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: yam gyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The wind maṇḍala arises from yaṃ.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means🔽that one should contemplate the wind maṇḍala, which is below the fire maṇḍala, from the transformation of yaṃ.

original: me'i 'og tu yam yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: me'i 'og tu yam yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: Below the fire, the wind mandala arises from yaṃ, marked with two banners.

original: rtsa rnams rab tu g-yo ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: rtsa rnams rab tu g-yo ba'i gzugs //
translated: The form of the movement of the nāḍīs.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad nas byang chub kyi sems rlung gis bskyod pas de dang mthun pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad nas byang chub kyi sems rlung gis bskyod pas de dang mthun pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa bskyed pa'o //
translated: that since the bodhicitta is moved by the vāyu from all the nāḍī cakras, the connate nature is generated.

original: der byang chub kyi sems g-yos nas rlung la thim par gyur te /
analyzed: der byang chub kyi sems g-yos nas rlung la thim par gyur te /
translated: When the bodhicitta is moved there, it dissolves into the vāyu.

original: 'khor lo'i bsgom pas rang rig par 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i bsgom pas rang rig par 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of “self-awareness through the meditation of the cakras” is as follows:

original: de dag thams cad thim 'gyur ba //
analyzed: de dag thams cad thim 'gyur ba //
translated: All of those dissolve.

original: zhes pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad der thim par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad der thim par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This means that all the skandhas, dhātus, and āyatanas dissolve there.

original: de yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: de yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogi/nī who is in the middle of that

original: zhes pa ni de la rnal 'byor ba rang gis sems brtags shing der gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rnal 'byor ba rang gis sems brtags shing der gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that the yogi/nī examines the mind there and remains there.

original: de ltar yang gdan pa bzhi pa las /
analyzed: de ltar yang gdan pa bzhi pa las /
translated: As such, in the Four Seats Tantra, it also states:

original: sa gnyis dag ni bsam pa yis //
analyzed: sa gnyis dag ni bsam pa yis //
translated: The two stages are liberated by the mind,

original: grol bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //🔽chos dang sbrul pa bsgom pa yis //
analyzed: grol bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min // chos dang sbrul pa bsgom pa yis //
translated: not otherwise.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar 'gyur //
translated: The yogin is liberated by the meditation on the Dharma and the Nirmāṇakāya.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽de ltar yang /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: zla ba nyi mas brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: zla ba nyi mas brgyan pa yi //
translated: The moon and sun are adorned

original: thabs dang shes rab 'di dag bsgom //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab 'di dag bsgom //
translated: with method and wisdom.

original: zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: This is said.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i h'um kha thur du phyogs pa de la gnas pa zla ba phyed pa'i 'od zer gyis aa la gnas pa'i thig le'i ri mo gyen du phyogs pa la rig par bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i h'um kha thur du phyogs pa de la gnas pa zla ba phyed pa'i 'od zer gyis aa la gnas pa'i thig le'i ri mo gyen du phyogs pa la rig par bya ste /
translated: The hūṃ of the Dharma wheel faces downward, and one should know that the moon with its light rays faces upward, and the drop located in the a is also facing upward.

original: rlung gis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag @119b gis 'phyang bzhin pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag @119b gis 'phyang bzhin pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that it is hanging down by the movement of the vāyu.

original: phyis ni der phra ba'i ngo bos thim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyis ni der phra ba'i ngo bos thim par 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, it dissolves there by the nature of subtlety.

original: rlung gi bsgom pas ni 'di'i rang bzhin khong du chud par bya'o //🔽de nas zla ba bsam par bya //
analyzed: rlung gi bsgom pas ni 'di'i rang bzhin khong du chud par bya'o // de nas zla ba bsam par bya //
translated: The meditation on the vāyu should be understood to be its nature.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: Then, one should imagine the moon.

original: aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu gnyis nyis skor du byas pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom ste /
analyzed: aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu gnyis nyis skor du byas pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom ste /
translated: The twelve vowels beginning with a are doubled, and one meditates on them as a moon disk.

original: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the nature of mirror-like primordial wisdom.

original: zla ba'i steng du nyi ma zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zla ba'i steng du nyi ma zhes pa ni /
translated: “On top of the moon, the sun”

original: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi la ya ra la wada dha bsnan pas bzhi bcur 'gyur la /
analyzed: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi la ya ra la wada dha bsnan pas bzhi bcur 'gyur la /
translated: means that the thirty-four consonants beginning with ka, plus ya, ra, la, and va, make forty.

original: de nyis skor du byas pa'i brgyad cu ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyis skor du byas pa'i brgyad cu ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te /
translated: Those doubled make eighty, which is the sun disk.

original: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the nature of the primordial wisdom of equality.

original: de yis dbus chud sa bon ni //
analyzed: de yis dbus chud sa bon ni //
translated: “In the middle of that, the seed”

original: zhes pa ni de dag gi dbus su aa dang h'um shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de dag gi dbus su aa dang h'um shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas pa ste /
translated: means that in the middle of those two, the a and the hūṃ, which are the nature of wisdom and method, abide.

original: de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the nature of the primordial wisdom of discernment.

original: yi ge ka yis ha brgyan te //
analyzed: yi ge ka yis ha brgyan te //
translated: “The letter ka is adorned with ha”

original: zhes pa ni yi ge ka nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin de la ha thim par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yi ge ka nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin de la ha thim par gyur pa'o //
translated: means that the letter ka, which is the nature of the sun disk, dissolves into the ha.

original: yang na ka yis rnam brgyan pa //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na ka yis rnam brgyan pa // zhes pa ni /
translated: Or it is adorned with the letter ka.

original: kam bde ba chen pos mi shigs pa'i ha mgo bo stong pas brgyan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: kam bde ba chen pos mi shigs pa'i ha mgo bo stong pas brgyan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that the letter ka is adorned with the head of the letter ha, which is indestructible great bliss, and the head of the letter a, which is emptiness.

original: ka ni ha la thim par 'gyur //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ka ni ha la thim par 'gyur // zhes pa ni /
translated: The letter ka dissolves into the letter ha.

original: ka shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang / aa thabs kyi rang bzhin thim par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ka shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang / aa thabs kyi rang bzhin thim par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This means that the letter ka, which is the nature of wisdom, dissolves into the letter ha, which is the nature of method.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens as a result?

original: aa h'um dbyer med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: aa h'um dbyer med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The letter ha and the letter a become inseparable.

original: gug skyed dang bral ba'i ha ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gug skyed dang bral ba'i ha ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The letter ha, which is free of the vowel diacritics, is the nature of wisdom.

original: h'um ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: h'um ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The letter ha, which is endowed with the vowel diacritics, is the nature of method.

original: des ni thabs dang shes rab gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni thabs dang shes rab gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, method and wisdom become one.

original: mi phyed pa'i ha zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i ha zhes pa ni /
translated: The letter ha, which is indivisible,

original: gug skyed dang bral ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin dang / dbyangs yig drug pa gcig tu gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: gug skyed dang bral ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin dang / dbyangs yig drug pa gcig tu gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te /
translated: is the nature of sound, which is free of the vowel diacritics, and becomes the single sixth vowel.

original: h'um de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: h'um de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: That letter ha is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams //
analyzed: h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams //
translated: The light rays that arise from the letter ha

original: zhes pa ni h'um de las byung ba'i 'od zer te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni h'um de las byung ba'i 'od zer te /
translated: This is the light ray arisen from that hūṃ.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid / rlung lnga'i rang bzhin de rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bskul bas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid / rlung lnga'i rang bzhin de rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bskul bas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
translated: The nature of the five transcendent lords, the nature of the five winds, those [winds] stimulate the great-bliss wheel, and the nectar drips.

original: ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can //
analyzed: ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can //
translated: The rabbit-marked one like a cloud.

original: zhes pa la ri bong can ni zla ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la ri bong can ni zla ba ste /
translated: The rabbit-marked one is the moon.

original: de ni 'jug pa'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'jug pa'i rlung ngo //
translated: That is the entering wind.

original: ba mo zhes pa ni nyi ma ste /
analyzed: ba mo zhes pa ni nyi ma ste /
translated: The cloud is the sun.

original: de ni 'byung ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'byung ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: That is the emerging wind.

original: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bsam @120a * //🔽gtan du brjod do //
analyzed: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bsam @120a * // gtan du brjod do //
translated: The yoga of those two becoming one is called “contemplation.”

original: nyi mar lhan cig zhu gyur cing //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: nyi mar lhan cig zhu gyur cing // zhes pa la /
translated: The sun and moon melt together.

original: nyi ma ni chags pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dag gcig tu gyur pa'i chags pa tsam 'ba' zhig nyi ma nyid du blta ste /
analyzed: nyi ma ni chags pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dag gcig tu gyur pa'i chags pa tsam 'ba' zhig nyi ma nyid du blta ste /
translated: The sun is passion and passionlessness becoming one, just passion alone, seen as the sun itself.

original: khrag dang khu ba'i mdog tu snang ba'o //
analyzed: khrag dang khu ba'i mdog tu snang ba'o //
translated: It appears as the color of blood and semen.

original: de nyid ni nyi ma ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni nyi ma ste /
translated: That itself is the sun.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal la sogs pa'i sdig pa bsregs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal la sogs pa'i sdig pa bsregs pa'o //
translated: The pride of the nature of pristine consciousness burns the sin of pride and so forth.

original: yang ni h'um byung 'od zer zhes pa ni khrag dang khu ba'i rang bzhin gyi thig le h'um du bsgom ste /
analyzed: yang ni h'um byung 'od zer zhes pa ni khrag dang khu ba'i rang bzhin gyi thig le h'um du bsgom ste /
translated: Again, the light rays that arise from hūṃ are the bindu of the nature of blood and semen, meditated on as hūṃ.

original: de'i 'od zer rnams 'gro ba dang 'ong ba sems kyis bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer rnams 'gro ba dang 'ong ba sems kyis bsam par bya'o //
translated: The light rays of that are imagined to go out and return by the mind.

original: rtsa yi 'khor lo thams cad la //
analyzed: rtsa yi 'khor lo thams cad la //
translated: All the channel wheels

original: zhes pa ni khams bco brgyad gnas pa'i rtsa las 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni khams bco brgyad gnas pa'i rtsa las 'dzag pa'o //
translated: are the channels that abide in the eighteen elements.

original: 'dzag pa des thig le'i nang du chud pa'i h'um bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dzag pa des thig le'i nang du chud pa'i h'um bkru bar bya'o //
translated: The bindu that drips from those fills the hūṃ inside the bindu.

original: bkrus pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: bkrus pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens by filling it?

original: bde ba chen po'i ye shes skye ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ye shes skye ste /
translated: The pristine consciousness of great bliss arises.

original: de nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi yon tan dang ldan zhing dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan pa'i he ru ka sna tshogs su snang ba sna tshogs sde mas 'khyud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi yon tan dang ldan zhing dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan pa'i he ru ka sna tshogs su snang ba sna tshogs sde mas 'khyud par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is the various Herukas endowed with the good qualities of the thirty-two marks and ornamented with the eighty adornments, embraced by the mother, the various armies.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs pa /
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su h'um bsam /
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su h'um bsam /
translated: In the middle of the moon and sun, imagine a hūṃ.

original: h'um gyur pa las rdo rje de'i lte ba la yang h'um ngo //
analyzed: h'um gyur pa las rdo rje de'i lte ba la yang h'um ngo //
translated: From the transformation of the hūṃ, a vajra. In the center of that, also a hūṃ.

original: sa bon rdo rje las byung ba //
analyzed: sa bon rdo rje las byung ba //
translated: “Arisen from the seed and the vajra”

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: sa bon h'um dang rdo rje dag gcig tu gyur pa las byung zhing bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon h'um dang rdo rje dag gcig tu gyur pa las byung zhing bskyed pa'o //
translated: arisen from and generated by the seed, the hūṃ and the vajra, having become one.

original: gang gi zhe na dpa' bo ste bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo de'i'o //
analyzed: gang gi zhe na dpa' bo ste bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo de'i'o //
translated: Whose? The hero’s, of the Bhagavān, the hero.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dpa' bo'o //
translated: He is a hero because he is free from the afflictions of desire and so on.

original: he ru ka mdog sngon po zhes pa la /
analyzed: he ru ka mdog sngon po zhes pa la /
translated: “Blue Heruka” means

original: he ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: he ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang bral ba'o //
translated: he is free from the cause of all phenomena.

original: ru ni gzugs kyi bkod pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ru ni gzugs kyi bkod pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Ru is free from the arrangement of forms.

original: ka ni chos thams cad gang na yang mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni chos thams cad gang na yang mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Ka is that all phenomena do not abide anywhere.

original: ha ni thabs so //
analyzed: ha ni thabs so //
translated: Ha is the method.

original: ae ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: ae ni shes rab ste /
translated: Ai is wisdom.

original: de'i bdag nyid la he'i sgrar gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid la he'i sgrar gsungs so //
translated: The nature of that is expressed by the term he.

original: ra ni khu ba'o //
analyzed: ra ni khu ba'o //
translated: Ra is semen.

original: au ni khrag gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: au ni khrag gi rang bzhin no //
translated: Au is the nature of blood.

original: ra ni khu ba'o //
analyzed: ra ni khu ba'o //
translated: Ra is semen.

original: au ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: au ni bde ba'o //
translated: Au is bliss.

original: 'di dag ni khu ba dang bde ba ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni khu ba dang bde ba ste /
translated: These are the semen and bliss,

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of method and wisdom.

original: he ni dam tshig sems dpa'o //
analyzed: he ni dam tshig sems dpa'o //
translated: He is the pledge being.

original: ru ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: ru ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: Ru is the wisdom being.

original: ka ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
translated: Ka is the generation of the exalted wisdom of great bliss.

original: ae ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ae ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Ai is the action seal.

original: ha ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ha ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Ha is the doctrine seal.

original: ra ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ra ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Ra is the pledge seal.

original: au ni sgra'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: au ni sgra'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Au is the great seal, the nature of sound.

original: ka ni phyag rgya 'di rnams la bcom ldan @120b 'das bde ba'i gzugs su bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni phyag rgya 'di rnams la bcom ldan @120b 'das bde ba'i gzugs su bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Ka is the Bhagavat abiding in the form of bliss in these seals.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni bla ma'i man ngag las khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni bla ma'i man ngag las khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The Bhagavat is to be understood from the guru's instruction.

original: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
translated: One face, four arms.

original: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can dang / bcom ldan 'das ma ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can dang / bcom ldan 'das ma ste /
translated: This is the form of the Bhagavat and the Bhagavati,

original: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i gzugs so //
translated: the form of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: Just as Vajrasattva, so is Vajradhatviśvarī.

original: gtso bo h'um zhes 'dod pa zhes sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gtso bo h'um zhes 'dod pa zhes sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The desire for the principal HŪṀ, etc. is easy to understand.

original: dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa //
translated: The hero who liberates from cyclic existence

original: zhes pa ni de ltar rnal 'byor pas dpa' bo bsgoms nas 'khor ba las sgrol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de ltar rnal 'byor pas dpa' bo bsgoms nas 'khor ba las sgrol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: means that the yogī, having meditated on the hero, will be liberated from cyclic existence.

original: ji ltar 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed ce na /
translated: How does he liberate from cyclic existence?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: byang chub sa bon rang bzhin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sa bon rang bzhin zhes pa ste /
translated: The nature of the seed of enlightenment

original: phra ba'i h'um bsgoms pas bde ba chen po skye ba'o //
analyzed: phra ba'i h'um bsgoms pas bde ba chen po skye ba'o //
translated: means that by meditating on the subtle HŪṀ, great bliss arises.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: kha dog dmar mo zhes pa la sna tshogs sde ma ni dmar me'o //
analyzed: kha dog dmar mo zhes pa la sna tshogs sde ma ni dmar me'o //
translated: Red-colored means that the Cakrasaṃvara is red.

original: he ru ka ni nag po ste gnyi ga snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: he ru ka ni nag po ste gnyi ga snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: Heruka is black, and both are in union.

original: ji ltar padma dmar po la bung ba gnas pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po la bung ba gnas pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das blta bar bya'o //
translated: Just as a bee is on a red lotus, so should one view the Bhagavān.

original: zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba //
analyzed: zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba //
translated: The face is very distorted

original: zhes pa ni zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa'o //
translated: means that blood drips from the face.

original: sna tshogs sde ma yang phyag bzhi pa ste g-yas na cang te'u dang gri gug / g-yon na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs sde ma yang phyag bzhi pa ste g-yas na cang te'u dang gri gug / g-yon na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa'o //
translated: The four-armed Viśvadevī holds a ḍamaru and flaying knife in the right hands and a khaṭvāṅga and skull in the left hands.

original: phyag gnyis pa'i phyogs la sna tshogs sde ma gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa'i phyogs la sna tshogs sde ma gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the case of the two-armed [form], Viśvadevī should be visualized holding a flaying knife and skull.

original: rang gi lus skyes 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: rang gi lus skyes 'od zer gyis //
translated: “The light rays born from one’s body”

original: zhes pa ni lus dang lhan cig par yod pa lus bcas te aa dang h'um ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus dang lhan cig par yod pa lus bcas te aa dang h'um ngo //
translated: means the light rays that exist together with the body, along with the body, as the a and hūṃ.

original: de dag gi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag gi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed do //
translated: They cause the light rays to go out and return.

original: rtsa yi 'khor lo bskul bar bya //
analyzed: rtsa yi 'khor lo bskul bar bya //
translated: “Stir the channel cakras”

original: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i aa'i 'od zer gyis chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po yang dag par bskul pas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i aa'i 'od zer gyis chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po yang dag par bskul pas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
translated: means that the light rays of the a located in the emanation cakra stir the dharma, enjoyment, and great bliss, causing the nectar to drip.

original: bdud rtsi des chos kyi 'khor lo'i sa bon bkrus pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rtsa brgyad po rang bzhin gyis rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed nas /
analyzed: bdud rtsi des chos kyi 'khor lo'i sa bon bkrus pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rtsa brgyad po rang bzhin gyis rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed nas /
translated: By merely washing the seed of the wheel of Dharma with that nectar, the eight channels located in the wheel of Dharma generate the eight yoginis by nature.

original: phyi rol du phyung ste he ru ka mchod par byed //
analyzed: phyi rol du phyung ste he ru ka mchod par byed //
translated: They are brought out externally and worship Heruka.

original: brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog //
analyzed: brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog //
translated: The eight are the best of the girls.

original: ces pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin gyi bu mo mchog rab ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin gyi bu mo mchog rab ces pa'i don to //
translated: This means that the best of the girls who are the nature of the wheel of Dharma.

original: mchod pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa @121a * //
analyzed: mchod pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa @121a * //
translated: Holding various offerings,

original: yis ; / zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yis ; / zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: ri dags kyis mtshan ma la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad 'dzin par byed pas na mchod pa brgyad do //
analyzed: ri dags kyis mtshan ma la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad 'dzin par byed pas na mchod pa brgyad do //
translated: holding the eight offerings such as the deer-marked moon.

original: rnal 'byor ma de rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma de rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are those yoginis?

original: rdo rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mche ba ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are Vajadanta, etc.

original: rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa //
analyzed: rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa //
translated: Vajadanta is located in the east of Heruka.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means

original: he ru ka'i shar phyogs na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: he ru ka'i shar phyogs na gnas pa'o //
translated: she is located in the east of Heruka.

original: rdo rje mche ba mi ni khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mche ba mi ni khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: Vajadanta holds a skull cup filled with the blood of humans.

original: gzi brjid chen mo gsol bar mdzad //🔽ces pa la /
analyzed: gzi brjid chen mo gsol bar mdzad // ces pa la /
translated: The great glorious one drinks blood.

original: gzi brjid ni khrag gi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gzi brjid ni khrag gi rang bzhin te /
translated: The great glorious one is blood by nature.

original: phyag gnyis kyis khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams te gsol ba ni tshim pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams te gsol ba ni tshim pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: She drinks blood from a skull-cup held in both hands.

original: rdo rje pho nya cang te'u brdung //
analyzed: rdo rje pho nya cang te'u brdung //
translated: The vajra messenger beats a small drum.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje pho nya ma dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gnas shing /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje pho nya ma dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gnas shing /
translated: The vajra messenger abides in the northeast.

original: phyag g-yas dang g-yon pas cang te'u brdung ba'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas dang g-yon pas cang te'u brdung ba'o //
translated: She beats a small drum with her right and left hands.

original: rdo rje gdong ma dri snod dang // zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje gdong ma dri snod dang // zhes pa ni /
translated: The vajra-faced one holds a perfume vessel.🔽The vajra-faced one abides in the southeast.

original: rdo rje gdong ma me'i phyogs su gnas shing phyag gnyis na dri'i snod bsnams pa ste /🔽dri chen gyi snod bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gdong ma me'i phyogs su gnas shing phyag gnyis na dri'i snod bsnams pa ste / dri chen gyi snod bsnams pa'o //
translated: She holds a perfume vessel in both hands.

original: rdo rje can ma mchod yon snod //🔽ces pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje can ma mchod yon snod // ces pa ni /
translated: The vajra-holder holds a vessel of offerings.🔽The vajra-holder abides in the southwest.

original: rdo rje can ma bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas shing mchod yon gyi snod bdud rtsis bkang ba phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can ma bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas shing mchod yon gyi snod bdud rtsis bkang ba phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'o //
translated: She holds a vessel of offerings filled with nectar in both hands.

original: rdo rje gtsigs ma zhes pa ni lho phyogs su gnas shing phyag gnyis kyis rnga brdung ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gtsigs ma zhes pa ni lho phyogs su gnas shing phyag gnyis kyis rnga brdung ba'o //
translated: Vajra-mouth is in the south, and with two hands she beats a drum.

original: rlung du rdo rje lte ba ma //
analyzed: rlung du rdo rje lte ba ma //
translated: In the wind quarter, Vajra-navel.

original: zhes pa la rdo rje lte ba ma ni /
analyzed: zhes pa la rdo rje lte ba ma ni /
translated: Vajra-navel

original: rlung gi phyogs su gnas shing ri bong can gyi snod de byang chub kyi sems kyi snod bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su gnas shing ri bong can gyi snod de byang chub kyi sems kyi snod bsnams pa'o //
translated: is in the wind quarter, and she holds a vessel of the rabbit-marked moon, that is, a vessel of bodhicitta.

original: nub tu rdo rje 'jigs ma'o //
analyzed: nub tu rdo rje 'jigs ma'o //
translated: In the west, Vajra-fearful.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'jigs ma nub kyi phyogs su gnas shing ce sbyang gi sha 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'jigs ma nub kyi phyogs su gnas shing ce sbyang gi sha 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Vajra-fearful is in the western quarter, and she holds the flesh of a hyena.

original: byang du rdo rje 'dod chags ma //
analyzed: byang du rdo rje 'dod chags ma //
translated: In the north, Vajra-passion.

original: zhes pa ni byang gi phyogs su gnas nas chags pa chen po la rjes su chags pas he ru ka mchod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang gi phyogs su gnas nas chags pa chen po la rjes su chags pas he ru ka mchod pa'o //
translated: Vajra-passion is in the northern quarter, and she worships Heruka with great passion for great passion.

original: rnal 'byor ma 'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu ba la gnas par dgongs so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma 'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu ba la gnas par dgongs so //
translated: These yoginis are considered to abide in the flow of bodhicitta.

original: dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos //🔽zhes pa la ;
analyzed: dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos // zhes pa la ;
translated: The five sweet substances, flowers, and incense.

original: dri zhim ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: dri zhim ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: The five sweet substances are the five nectars.

original: me tog ni bud med kyi rdul gyi me tog go //
analyzed: me tog ni bud med kyi rdul gyi me tog go //
translated: Flowers are the flowers of the dust of women.

original: spos ni gtum mo'i 'od zer gyi spos so //
analyzed: spos ni gtum mo'i 'od zer gyi spos so //
translated: The incense is the incense of the light rays of caṇḍālī.

original: 'di dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po mi shigs pa'i rang bzhin mchod do //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po mi shigs pa'i rang bzhin mchod do //
translated: With these, one worships the Bhagavān, the nature of great bliss and indestructibility.

original: dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni //
translated: Having seen the hero complete,

original: zhes pa ni dkyil @121b 'khor rdzogs nas nang gi rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkyil @121b 'khor rdzogs nas nang gi rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
translated: after the maṇḍala is complete, one should meditate on the inner cakra of nāḍīs.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Why is that? In order to confer empowerment.

original: 'khor lo de'i rtsa stong ba'i gnas su sprul zhes pa'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo de'i rtsa stong ba'i gnas su sprul zhes pa'i tha tshig ste /
translated: The nāḍīs of that cakra are the locations of the thousand buddhas.

original: der gnas pa'i mdud pa'i nang du 'od zer gyi gzugs 'khyil bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: der gnas pa'i mdud pa'i nang du 'od zer gyi gzugs 'khyil bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the form of light rays is coiled within the knots that exist there.

original: 'od zer des byang chub kyi sems 'dzag par 'gyur te 'dzag pa des rnal 'byor ma rnam pa mang po rdzogs par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'od zer des byang chub kyi sems 'dzag par 'gyur te 'dzag pa des rnal 'byor ma rnam pa mang po rdzogs par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: That light ray causes the bodhicitta to drip. With that dripping, one should complete the many types of yoginīs.

original: rnal 'byor ma de rnams rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan cing /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma de rnams rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan cing /
translated: Those yoginīs are adorned with various ornaments.

original: lang tsho'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lang tsho'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
translated: They possess the form of youth.

original: lo bcu gnyis lon pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis las rdzogs pa de rnams ni sna tshogs sde ma'i sprul pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis lon pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis las rdzogs pa de rnams ni sna tshogs sde ma'i sprul pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: They are the nature of emanations of the Cāmuṇḍā.

original: rgyud 'dir lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i shes rab mar gsungs so //🔽byang chub sems gang bum pa bsnams //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i shes rab mar gsungs so // byang chub sems gang bum pa bsnams //
translated: In this Tantra, a wisdom woman of twelve years is taught.🔽The one who holds the vase of bodhicitta

original: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa ste padma bsnams shing brel ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa ste padma bsnams shing brel ba'o //
translated: is the one who holds the lotus filled with the vase of bodhicitta.

original: aa mra'i lcug babs zhes pa ni rdul dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: aa mra'i lcug babs zhes pa ni rdul dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The one with the mango shoot is the one with the menstrual discharge.

original: khrag dang khu ba 'dres pa des gsang ba'i dbang sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: khrag dang khu ba 'dres pa des gsang ba'i dbang sbyin par bya'o //
translated: With that mixture of blood and semen, the secret empowerment is given.

original: lo bcu gnyis ma'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la dbang gi don du gsol ba gdab po //
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis ma'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la dbang gi don du gsol ba gdab po //
translated: One should request the twelve-year-old yoginīs for the purpose of empowerment.

original: dbang med pa'i nyes pa bstan pa'i phyir //🔽dbang dang bral na dngos grub med //
analyzed: dbang med pa'i nyes pa bstan pa'i phyir // dbang dang bral na dngos grub med //
translated: In order to demonstrate the fault of not being empowered,

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Without empowerment, there is no spiritual power.”

original: dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim // zhes pa la /
translated: For example, a house without children

original: bu ni mig la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: bu ni mig la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: The children are the bodhisattvas such as Akṣobhya.

original: de ltar de rnams kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i lus ni khyim ste /
analyzed: de ltar de rnams kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i lus ni khyim ste /
translated: Thus, the body not blessed by those is the house.

original: de stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that as empty.

original: shi ma thag tu stong pa nyid //
analyzed: shi ma thag tu stong pa nyid //
translated: Immediately after death, emptiness.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: This is

original: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
translated: the blessing of those bodhisattvas.

original: shi nas rnal 'byor pa khyad par can du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shi nas rnal 'byor pa khyad par can du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: After death, one does not become a special yogin.

original: de bzhin dbang dang bral ba ni //
analyzed: de bzhin dbang dang bral ba ni //
translated: Similarly, without empowerment,🔽this is

original: zhes pa ni dbang med na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dbang med na'o //
translated: if there is no empowerment.

original: ye shes kun gyis stong pa nyid //
analyzed: ye shes kun gyis stong pa nyid //
translated: Emptiness of all wisdoms.

original: ces pa la /
analyzed: ces pa la /
translated: Here,

original: ye shes kun me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kun me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'o //
translated: all wisdoms are the mirror-like wisdom, and so on.

original: de rnams kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa ni theg pa chen po yongs su shes pas stong pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa ni theg pa chen po yongs su shes pas stong pa'o //
translated: Not blessed by those is the emptiness of the complete understanding of the Great Vehicle.

original: 'dis ci zhig ston ce na /
analyzed: 'dis ci zhig ston ce na /
translated: What does this teach?

original: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the consecration of the eyes, and so on, one should give the bodhicitta, which is the nature of the five wisdoms, to the disciple.

original: de ltar @122a * //
analyzed: de ltar @122a * //
translated: Thus,

original: yang ; kha la mthe bo srin lag gis //
analyzed: yang ; kha la mthe bo srin lag gis //
translated: Also:

original: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu myang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu myang //
translated: The yogi/nī should always taste🔽with the thumb and ring finger.

original: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na //
analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na //
translated: Having tasted like a drink of peace,

original: dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: one will attain the stable siddhi.

original: tshigs bcad 'dis ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bstan to //
analyzed: tshigs bcad 'dis ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bstan to //
translated: This verse teaches the secret empowerment.

original: da ni shes rab ye shes dpe'i sgo nas ston te /
analyzed: da ni shes rab ye shes dpe'i sgo nas ston te /
translated: Now, the wisdom-knowledge empowerment is taught by way of an example.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: dper na pi wang sbyor kun tshogs //
analyzed: dper na pi wang sbyor kun tshogs //
translated: For example, when all the parts of a lute are assembled,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: pi wang gi sgra ni aa wa ddh'u t'i'o //
analyzed: pi wang gi sgra ni aa wa ddh'u t'i'o //
translated: The sound of the lute is the avadhūti.

original: de'i sbyor ba kun tshogs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba kun tshogs pa ni /
translated: The assembly of all the parts of that

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'dus pa ni bde ba chen po'i bsam gtan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'dus pa ni bde ba chen po'i bsam gtan du 'gyur ro //
translated: is the union of all the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, which becomes the meditative stabilization of great bliss.

original: rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung //
analyzed: rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung //
translated: If it is separated from the tantra, it is not to be played.

original: zhes pa ni rgyud dang ldan pa'i phyir na rgyud can no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgyud dang ldan pa'i phyir na rgyud can no //
translated: Since it is endowed with a tantra, it has a tantra.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang bral na bde ba chen po myong bar mi rung ba ni brdung du mi rung ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang bral na bde ba chen po myong bar mi rung ba ni brdung du mi rung ba'o //
translated: If one is devoid of the flow of the Thought of Enlightenment, one is not fit to experience the Great Bliss.

original: de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni //
analyzed: de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni //
translated: Similarly, if one is devoid of the consecration,

original: zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bral na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bral na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub med pa'o //
translated: if one is devoid of the consecration of the Knowledge of Wisdom, one does not have the Great Seal Siddhi.

original: sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: One does not achieve the mantra and the contemplation.

original: zhes pa ni yid skyob pas na sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yid skyob pas na sngags so //
translated: The mantra is so called because it protects the mind.

original: sngags kyis ni las kyi tshogs 'grub la /
analyzed: sngags kyis ni las kyi tshogs 'grub la /
translated: By the mantra one achieves the aggregate of actions.

original: bsam gtan gyis ni phyag rgya chen po 'grub ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis ni phyag rgya chen po 'grub ste /
translated: By the contemplation one achieves the Great Seal.

original: bde ba chen po'i bsam gtan med par ni dngos grub med do snyam du bsams so //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bsam gtan med par ni dngos grub med do snyam du bsams so //
translated: Without the contemplation of the Great Bliss, there is no Siddhi.

original: rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par //
analyzed: rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par //
translated: That deluded one who, without power,

original: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pa'i rmongs pa dbang med par slob ma rnams sdud par byed pa'i sems can de rnams dmyal bar 'gro par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pa'i rmongs pa dbang med par slob ma rnams sdud par byed pa'i sems can de rnams dmyal bar 'gro par 'gyur ro //
translated: The deluded one who does not know the reality of the Buddha, that sentient being who gathers disciples without power, goes to hell.

original: bdag ni dbang bskur zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bdag ni dbang bskur zhes pa ni /
translated: The line I am the one who is consecrated

original: bdag la dbang yod ces brdzun du smra zhing phyis slob ma la dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bdag la dbang yod ces brdzun du smra zhing phyis slob ma la dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: means that one lies that one has power, and later confers consecration on the disciple.

original: slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro //
analyzed: slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro //
translated: One goes to hell together with the disciple.

original: zhes pa ni slob dpon slob ma dang lhan cig tu mnar med pa'i dmyal bar 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni slob dpon slob ma dang lhan cig tu mnar med pa'i dmyal bar 'gro ba'o //
translated: This means that the master goes to the Avici hell together with the disciple.

original: dus ji tsam gyi bar du zhe na /
analyzed: dus ji tsam gyi bar du zhe na /
translated: For how long a time?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The same text says,

original: ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar //
analyzed: ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar //
translated: For as long as the Buddha remains.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means,

original: ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas pa'i dus de srid du dmyal bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas pa'i dus de srid du dmyal bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: For as long as the teaching of the Buddha remains, for that long one remains in hell.

original: de ltar shes byas rnal 'byor mas //🔽zhes pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i nyes pa mkhyen par mdzod la /
analyzed: de ltar shes byas rnal 'byor mas // zhes pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i nyes pa mkhyen par mdzod la /
translated: Thus, the yoginis should know this.

original: kye lha mo sna tshogs sde ma'i rang bzhin bdag @122b la dbang bskur cig ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: kye lha mo sna tshogs sde ma'i rang bzhin bdag @122b la dbang bskur cig ces pa'i don to //
translated: This means, Knowing this kind of fault, O Goddess, consecrate me, who am by nature Camarabhadra.

original: dbang bskur zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The line consecrate and so forth is easy to understand.

original: phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi //
analyzed: phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi //
translated: The line the outer, inner, and secret

original: dbang bskur tsam gyis shes pa ni //
analyzed: dbang bskur tsam gyis shes pa ni //
translated: By the mere conferral of initiation,

original: phyi'i dbang ni thun mong gi dbang ngo //
analyzed: phyi'i dbang ni thun mong gi dbang ngo //
translated: the outer initiation is the common initiation.

original: gsang ba'i dbang ni byang chub sems kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang ni byang chub sems kyi dbang ngo //
translated: The secret initiation is the initiation of the bodhicitta.

original: dbang bskur tsam gyis zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang rdzogs pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur tsam gyis zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang rdzogs pa'i bar du'o //
translated: By the mere conferral of initiation refers to the perfection of the initiation of the wisdom consort.

original: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Space and so on are easy to understand.

original: de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams //
translated: Then those yoginīs

original: rtsa yi 'khor lo la thim pa //🔽zhes pa la //
analyzed: rtsa yi 'khor lo la thim pa // zhes pa la //
translated: dissolve into the channel cakras.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su'o //
translated: The word then is immediately after the conferral of initiation.

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa khong stong gi gnas kyi thig le la lo bcu gnyis ma'i rnal 'byor ma lha mo de dag thams cad thim par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa khong stong gi gnas kyi thig le la lo bcu gnyis ma'i rnal 'byor ma lha mo de dag thams cad thim par gyur ba'o //
translated: All those goddesses, yoginīs of twelve years, dissolve into the bindu in the empty center of the knot of the channel cakras.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med par zhes pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med par zhes pa la /
translated: In the Tantra of the Buddha’s Crown, it says, “There is nothing higher than the yoginī.”
