original: ri skegs kyi sbyor ba dang chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o //🔽// da ni bcud kyis len gyi le'u rab tu bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: ri skegs kyi sbyor ba dang chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o // // da ni bcud kyis len gyi le'u rab tu bshad par bya ste /
translated: This is the fourth chapter on the method of avadhūta and the method of water.🔽Now, the chapter on rasāyana should be fully explained.

original: de nas zhes pa ni dug gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i le'u bshad pa'i rjes thogs su bcud kyis len gyi le'u rab tu bshad par bya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni dug gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i le'u bshad pa'i rjes thogs su bcud kyis len gyi le'u rab tu bshad par bya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: “Then” means that after explaining the chapter on the empowerment of poison and so on, the chapter on rasāyana should be fully explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog / ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang phung po lnga'i ngo bo mchog tu phul du byung ba snying por gyur ba'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog / ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang phung po lnga'i ngo bo mchog tu phul du byung ba snying por gyur ba'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa'i tha tshig go // rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med /
translated: The supreme essence of the Tathagatas is the five nectars, which are the supreme, most excellent essence of the nature of the five Tathagatas and the five aggregates.

original: ces pa ni rnal 'byor ma rtsa lnga'i rang @129a * //
analyzed: ces pa ni rnal 'byor ma rtsa lnga'i rang @129a * //
translated: The unsurpassed of yoginis is the nature of the five channel-yoginis.

original: bzhin te / de rnams kyi gong na med pa'i snying po zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bzhin te / de rnams kyi gong na med pa'i snying po zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The unsurpassed of those is the essence.

original: gzhon nu ma zhes pa ni lo brgyad ma'i mig las byung ba la gzhon nu ma zhes yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma zhes pa ni lo brgyad ma'i mig las byung ba la gzhon nu ma zhes yang dag par bshad do //
translated: The maiden is the substance that arises from the eye of an eight-year-old girl.

original: sha ri ka zhes pa ni lo bcu gnyis ma'i rtsa khong stong las yang dag par byung ba'i rdzas la sha ri ka zhes yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: sha ri ka zhes pa ni lo bcu gnyis ma'i rtsa khong stong las yang dag par byung ba'i rdzas la sha ri ka zhes yang dag par bshad do //
translated: The śārika is the substance that arises from the hollow channel of a twelve-year-old girl.

original: grub ma zhes pa ni lo bcu drug ma me tog dang ldan pa dang / kha dog sbyar ba'i sbyor ba byas pa las gang byung ba'i rdzas te /
analyzed: grub ma zhes pa ni lo bcu drug ma me tog dang ldan pa dang / kha dog sbyar ba'i sbyor ba byas pa las gang byung ba'i rdzas te /
translated: The accomplished one is the substance that arises from the union of a sixteen-year-old girl with a flower and the application of color.

original: de ni grub mar yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: de ni grub mar yang dag par bshad do //
translated: That is explained as the “accomplished butter. ”

original: byis can ma zhes pa ni lo nyi shu ma dang po rdul dang ldan pa dang kha sbyar ba'i sbyor ba las gang byung ba'i rdzas de ni byis can mar yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: byis can ma zhes pa ni lo nyi shu ma dang po rdul dang ldan pa dang kha sbyar ba'i sbyor ba las gang byung ba'i rdzas de ni byis can mar yang dag par bshad do //
translated: The “young girl” is the substance that arises from the union of the twenty-year-old girl who possesses the menstrual discharge and the union of the mouth. That is explained as the “young girl. ”

original: thod bzangs can ma zhes pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i shes rab kyi khu ba dang / thabs kyi khu ba dang / shes rab kyi snum ba sregs pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni thod can mar yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: thod bzangs can ma zhes pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i shes rab kyi khu ba dang / thabs kyi khu ba dang / shes rab kyi snum ba sregs pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni thod can mar yang dag par bshad do //
translated: The “skull-bearer” is the substance that is burned by the semen of the twenty-five-year-old wisdom woman, the semen of the method, and the oil of wisdom. That is explained as the “skull-bearer. ”

original: de dag ni shes rab ma lnga'i rtsa lnga las bdud rtsi lnga yang dag par 'bab par bshad do //
analyzed: de dag ni shes rab ma lnga'i rtsa lnga las bdud rtsi lnga yang dag par 'bab par bshad do //
translated: Those are explained as the five nectars that flow from the five nāḍīs of the five wisdom women.

original: sangs rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka' //
translated: Even the five buddhas find it difficult to obtain.

original: zhes pa la sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
translated: The five buddhas are Vairocana and so on.

original: de rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' zhing dka' ches pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' zhing dka' ches pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Even they find it difficult to obtain, that is, it is very difficult to obtain.

original: 'dis ni sman lnga po rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni sman lnga po rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This states the greatness of the five medicines.

original: gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu //
translated: The maiden for six months.

original: zhes pa ni lo brgyad pa'i mig las byung ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni lo brgyad pa'i mig las byung ba ste /
translated: This is from the eye of an eight-year-old girl.

original: mig gi chu dang dngul chu ra ti gcig pa bsres te zla ba drug tu zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gi chu dang dngul chu ra ti gcig pa bsres te zla ba drug tu zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Mix the eye water with one ratti of mercury and eat it for six months. You will become as described.

original: de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum //
analyzed: de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum //
translated: Likewise, the śārika for three months.

original: zhes pa ni lo bcu gnyis ma'i shes rab ma'i dang po'i rdul dang dngul chu ra ti gcig dang lhan cig tu zla ba gsum du zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lo bcu gnyis ma'i shes rab ma'i dang po'i rdul dang dngul chu ra ti gcig dang lhan cig tu zla ba gsum du zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: This is from the first menstrual discharge of a twelve-year-old wisdom woman. Mix it with one ratti of mercury and eat it for three months. You will become as described.

original: grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o //
analyzed: grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o //
translated: The mature woman for one month.

original: zhes pa ni lo bcu drug ma mdog nag mo dang lhan cig tu yang dag pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i rdzas blangs te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni lo bcu drug ma mdog nag mo dang lhan cig tu yang dag pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i rdzas blangs te /
translated: This is from a sixteen-year-old dark-complexioned woman. Take the substance that comes from perfect union with her.

original: dngul chu ra ti gcig dang lhan cig tu zla ba gcig tu bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngul chu ra ti gcig dang lhan cig tu zla ba gcig tu bza' bar bya'o //
translated: Mix it with one ratti of mercury and eat it for one month.

original: byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis //
analyzed: byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis //
translated: The young woman for two half-months.

original: zhes pa ni lo nyi shu ma'i bu mo gang ma nyams shing skyes pa gzhan gyis ma spyad pa de'i nyi @129b ma dang po las byung ba'i rdul dang de dang yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i rdzas dang dngul chu ra ti gcig dang bsres pa
analyzed: zhes pa ni lo nyi shu ma'i bu mo gang ma nyams shing skyes pa gzhan gyis ma spyad pa de'i nyi @129b ma dang po las byung ba'i rdul dang de dang yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i rdzas dang dngul chu ra ti gcig dang bsres pa
translated: This is a twenty-year-old girl who is not damaged and has not been used by another man. Her menstrual blood is mixed with the substance that comes from her perfect union and one measure of mercury.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats it for two fortnights, it will be as stated.

original: thod can ma yang zla bar te //
analyzed: thod can ma yang zla bar te //
translated: The twenty-five-year-old is also a fortnight.

original: zhes pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i yang dag par sbyor ba med par padmar 'ongs pa'i bcud blangs la /
analyzed: zhes pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i yang dag par sbyor ba med par padmar 'ongs pa'i bcud blangs la /
translated: This is a twenty-five-year-old who does not have perfect union. The essence that comes from her lotus is taken.

original: dngul chu ra ti gcig dang bsres te zla bar zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngul chu ra ti gcig dang bsres te zla bar zos na ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is mixed with one measure of mercury and eaten for a fortnight. It will be as stated.

original: 'di dag thams cad zos par gyur na ji skad gsungs pa'i tsher 'gyur ro //🔽bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad zos par gyur na ji skad gsungs pa'i tsher 'gyur ro // bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs //
translated: If one eats all of these, one will have the stated lifespan.🔽The crow-faced one is the form of a crow.

original: zhes pa ni bya rog can ma'i shes rab ma bya rog gi gzugs ltar mdog gnag pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bya rog can ma'i shes rab ma bya rog gi gzugs ltar mdog gnag pa ste /
translated: This is the wisdom woman who has the face of a crow, her color is dark.

original: de'i rdul ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rdul ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Her menstrual discharge occurs on the waning side of the moon.

original: glang po ma ni ngang ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: glang po ma ni ngang ba'i gzugs //
translated: The elephant woman has the form of a goose.

original: zhes pa ni glang po ma'i shes rab ma gang yin pa ni glang po che'am chang gi dri bro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni glang po ma'i shes rab ma gang yin pa ni glang po che'am chang gi dri bro ba'o //
translated: The wisdom woman who is an elephant woman smells like an elephant or beer.

original: ngang ba'i gzugs zhes pa ni mdog dkar po ste de'i rdul ni zla ba yar ngo la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngang ba'i gzugs zhes pa ni mdog dkar po ste de'i rdul ni zla ba yar ngo la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The form of a goose means she is white in color. Her menstrual discharge occurs on the waxing side of the moon.

original: drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te //
analyzed: drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te //
translated: The hot one has a hot form.

original: zhes pa ni drod can ma'i shes rab ni sngo ba sangs te //
analyzed: zhes pa ni drod can ma'i shes rab ni sngo ba sangs te //
translated: The wisdom woman who is a hot one is pale blue.

original: drod kyi gzugs zhes pa ni thams cad du lus dro ba ste /
analyzed: drod kyi gzugs zhes pa ni thams cad du lus dro ba ste /
translated: The form of heat means her body is warm all over.

original: de'i rdul ni zla ba ngo gnyi ga la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rdul ni zla ba ngo gnyi ga la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Her menstrual discharge occurs on both sides of the moon.🔽The pale blue, the white, and the blue one with blue eyes

original: sngo bsangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig / ces pa ni sngo bsangs dang / dkar mo dang sngon mo rnams kyi mig gi dri ma 'di dang dngul chu bsres te bza'o //
analyzed: sngo bsangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig / ces pa ni sngo bsangs dang / dkar mo dang sngon mo rnams kyi mig gi dri ma 'di dang dngul chu bsres te bza'o //
translated: means that the menstrual discharge of the pale blue, the white, and the blue ones is mixed with mercury and eaten.

original: kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni //
analyzed: kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni //
translated: At the time of union

original: zhes pa ni 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i dus kyi tshe kha sbyar sbyor zhing dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug par byas nas byang chub kyi sems blangs te rdul dang bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i dus kyi tshe kha sbyar sbyor zhing dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug par byas nas byang chub kyi sems blangs te rdul dang bsre bar bya'o //
translated: When one is united with these, one should unite the two organs, take the bodhicitta, and mix it with the menstrual discharge.

original: mig las byung ba'i rdzas gang yin //
analyzed: mig las byung ba'i rdzas gang yin //
translated: What is the substance that comes from the eye?

original: zhes pa ni 'di rnams kyi mig gi dri ma'i sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'di rnams kyi mig gi dri ma'i sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma zhes pa ste /
translated: The name of the eye-dirt medicine of these is “maiden.”

original: sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma'i ming can no //
analyzed: sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma'i ming can no //
translated: The name of that medicine is “having the name of maiden.”

original: 'di ni bstan par som nyi med //
analyzed: 'di ni bstan par som nyi med //
translated: This is taught without doubt.

original: ces pa ni sman des lus brlan par bya zhing tshing bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ces pa ni sman des lus brlan par bya zhing tshing bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that one should moisten and fill the body with that medicine.

original: de yi padma las byung rdzas //
analyzed: de yi padma las byung rdzas //
translated: The substance that comes from her lotus

original: zhes pa ni bud med rnams kyi rdul de khrag ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bud med rnams kyi rdul de khrag ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “menstrual discharge” is the menstrual discharge of women.🔽The substance that is in the channel is black

original: rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnag / zhes pa ni rtsa khong stong na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnag / zhes pa ni rtsa khong stong na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi'o //
translated: The meaning of “in the channel” is the nectar that is in the hollow of the channel.

original: ge ser sbas pa'i @130a * //🔽spyod yul te //
analyzed: ge ser sbas pa'i @130a * //🔽spyod yul te //
translated: The field of experience of the hidden lion

original: zhes pa ni padma'i ge sar gyi dbus na gnas pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni padma'i ge sar gyi dbus na gnas pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means “situated in the middle of the filaments of the lotus.”

original: sman de sha ri kar gsungs so //
analyzed: sman de sha ri kar gsungs so //
translated: That medicine is said to be sugar.

original: zhes pa ni sman de sha ri ka ra yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sman de sha ri ka ra yang dag par bshad do //
translated: This means that the medicine is explained to be sugar.

original: me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang //
analyzed: me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang //
translated: The woman who has the flower

original: zhes pa ni gang rdul dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma'o ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni gang rdul dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma'o ;
translated: This means the wisdom consort who has the menstrual discharge.

original: ; kha dog nag mo rab mdzes ma //
analyzed: ; kha dog nag mo rab mdzes ma //
translated: The dark-colored one, very beautiful

original: zhes pa ni kha dog nag mos rab tu mdzes ma'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni kha dog nag mos rab tu mdzes ma'o //
translated: This means the one who is very beautiful with dark color.

original: de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung //
analyzed: de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung //
translated: The substance that arises from their union

original: zhes pa ni de dang lhan cig tu kha sbyar sbyor ba ste dbang po gnyis sbyor ba las byung ba'i rdzas te sman de'i ming ni grub ma zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de dang lhan cig tu kha sbyar sbyor ba ste dbang po gnyis sbyor ba las byung ba'i rdzas te sman de'i ming ni grub ma zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means the substance that arises from the union of the two organs, the union of the two of them. The name of that medicine is said to be “the accomplished one.”

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the Buddha’s skull

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yar dag par sbyor bar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yar dag par sbyor bar bshad pa'o //
translated: This explains the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yis //
analyzed: mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yis //
translated: By the enjoyment of the indivisible

original: zhes pa ni rang gi srog dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rang gi srog dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is the wisdom woman who is like one's own life.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is her special quality? It is stated:

original: rab mdzes ma nyams dang zhes pa ni skyes pa gzhan dang sbyar bar ma gyur pa de ni rab tu mdzes shing bzang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rab mdzes ma nyams dang zhes pa ni skyes pa gzhan dang sbyar bar ma gyur pa de ni rab tu mdzes shing bzang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Very beautiful, not damaged means that she who has not been united with another man is said to be very beautiful and good.

original: de las dang por byung ba'i rdzas //
analyzed: de las dang por byung ba'i rdzas //
translated: The substance that arises from that

original: zhes pa ni nyi ma dang po las byung ba'i rdzas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni nyi ma dang po las byung ba'i rdzas te /
translated: means the substance that arises from the first day.

original: khrag dang de dang yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang bsres pa'i sman de ni byis pa can du yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: khrag dang de dang yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang bsres pa'i sman de ni byis pa can du yang dag par bshad do //
translated: That medicine mixed with blood and the bodhicitta that arises from the perfect union is explained as having a child.

original: lhan cig skyes dga' byung ba'i rdzas //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' byung ba'i rdzas //
translated: The substance that arises from the innate joy

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par shes pa'i sbyor ba med par chos kyi 'byung gnas su lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba skyes pa'i rdzas ni padma'i bcud ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma yang dag par shes pa'i sbyor ba med par chos kyi 'byung gnas su lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba skyes pa'i rdzas ni padma'i bcud ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: means the substance that arises from the innate joy in the place of dharma without the yoga of knowing the vajra and lotus. It is called the essence of the lotus.

original: mar khu dag ni bsre zhes pa ni rtsa'i bcud dang padma'i bcud bsre ba yin te /
analyzed: mar khu dag ni bsre zhes pa ni rtsa'i bcud dang padma'i bcud bsre ba yin te /
translated: The “mixing of the milk” is the mixing of the essence of the channel and the essence of the lotus.

original: sman de ni thod can ma zhes yang dag par bshad do //
analyzed: sman de ni thod can ma zhes yang dag par bshad do //
translated: This medicine is called “the one with the skull.”

original: sman lnga po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs so //
analyzed: sman lnga po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs so //
translated: These five medicines are taught in the Buddhakapāla Tantra.

original: zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the moon and sun,

original: zhes pa ni dkar mo'i rdul sna khung g-yas pa'i rlung rgyu ba na snar gzhug bar bya zhing nag mo'i rdul sna khung g-yon pa'i rlung rgyu ba na snar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkar mo'i rdul sna khung g-yas pa'i rlung rgyu ba na snar gzhug bar bya zhing nag mo'i rdul sna khung g-yon pa'i rlung rgyu ba na snar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: the “white particle” is to be inserted into the right nostril when the wind moves there, and the “black particle” is to be inserted into the left nostril when the wind moves there.

original: sbyor bas 'di dag byas na ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'dir the tshom med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor bas 'di dag byas na ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'dir the tshom med par 'gyur ro //
translated: When these are done by the union, there is no doubt that it will be as taught.

original: zla bas zla bar zhes pa la /
analyzed: zla bas zla bar zhes pa la /
translated: “By the moon, to the moon” means

original: zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: that the moon is the bodhicitta,

original: sna g-yon pa'i sna khung du sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sna g-yon pa'i sna khung du sbyin par bya'o //
translated: which is to be inserted into the left nostril.

original: @130b nyi mas nyir zhes pa ni /
analyzed: @130b nyi mas nyir zhes pa ni /
translated: “By the sun, to the sun” means

original: shes rab ma'i sna khung g-yas bar blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab ma'i sna khung g-yas bar blugs par bya'o //
translated: that the sun is the wisdom’s right nostril, into which it is to be inserted.

original: de lus skra dkar gnyer ma zhi //
analyzed: de lus skra dkar gnyer ma zhi //
translated: By that, the body is free of white hair and wrinkles.

original: zhes pa ni lus kyi ste mgo'i skra dkar zhi zhing sbangs zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus kyi ste mgo'i skra dkar zhi zhing sbangs zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the body, the pacification of the white hair on the head, the meaning of which is clear.

original: gnyer ma zhi zhes pa ni gnyer ma dang bral ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gnyer ma zhi zhes pa ni gnyer ma dang bral ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The pacification of wrinkles is the meaning of being free from wrinkles.

original: ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar //
analyzed: ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar //
translated: For as long as the Buddha remains

original: zhes pa ni ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs pa de srid kyi bar du tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs pa de srid kyi bar du tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that one will have a long life for as long as the Buddha remains.

original: de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: One's life will be extended

original: zhes pa ni dus ring por tshe 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽dngos po gang dang gang yang rung //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dus ring por tshe 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go // dngos po gang dang gang yang rung //
translated: This means that one's life will be extended and flourish for a long time.🔽Whatever things

original: zhes pa la dngos po gang dang gang ste /🔽lcags dang zangs ma la yang rung //
analyzed: zhes pa la dngos po gang dang gang ste / lcags dang zangs ma la yang rung //
translated: Whatever things means🔽even iron and copper

original: rdul byugs pas dngul dang gser du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdul byugs pas dngul dang gser du 'gyur ro //
translated: will become silver and gold by anointing them with the powder.

original: da ni dgongs pas bshad pa yang dag par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni dgongs pas bshad pa yang dag par bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the intentional explanation should be explained correctly.

original: dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
translated: The intentional explanation is very difficult to find.

original: zhes pa la dgongs pas bshad pa ni brda'i tshig ste rab tu dka' che bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //🔽dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste //
analyzed: zhes pa la dgongs pas bshad pa ni brda'i tshig ste rab tu dka' che bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro // dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste //
translated: The explanation of the meaning of this is the symbolic expression, which is very difficult.🔽The urine is the vajra of intuition.

original: zhes pa la ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi dri chu'o //🔽dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid //
analyzed: zhes pa la ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi dri chu'o // dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid //
translated: The vajra of intuition is the urine having the nature of Akshobhya.🔽The feces are the good vajra.

original: ces pa la rdo rje bzang po zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin dri chen no //
analyzed: ces pa la rdo rje bzang po zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin dri chen no //
translated: The good vajra is the feces having the nature of Vairochana.

original: khrag ni mar me rdo rje yin //
analyzed: khrag ni mar me rdo rje yin //
translated: The blood is the vajra of the lamp.

original: zhes pa la mar me rdo rje ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin khrag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa la mar me rdo rje ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin khrag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The vajra of the lamp is the blood having the nature of Ratnasambhava.

original: khu ba rdo rje thabs byung nyid //
analyzed: khu ba rdo rje thabs byung nyid //
translated: The semen is the vajra arisen from method.

original: ces pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs las byung ba byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i rang bzhin gtso bo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ces pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs las byung ba byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i rang bzhin gtso bo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The semen having the nature of the bodhicitta arisen from the method of all Buddhas is the chief, that is, the vajra arisen from method.

original: sha ni chos kyi rdo rje yin //
analyzed: sha ni chos kyi rdo rje yin //
translated: The flesh is the vajra of phenomena.

original: zhes pa la chos kyi rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi sha yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa la chos kyi rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi sha yin no //
translated: The Dharma-vajra is the flesh of Amoghasiddhi.🔽These five are the supreme yoginis,

original: de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog / ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin ni rnal 'byor ma lnga'i bdud rtsi rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin mchog tu phul du byung ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽ngag gi dam tshig rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog / ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin ni rnal 'byor ma lnga'i bdud rtsi rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin mchog tu phul du byung ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go // ngag gi dam tshig rnyed dka' ba //
translated: means that the five nectars of the five yoginis are the supreme nature of the five channels, which is the nature of the five Tathagatas.🔽The pledge of speech is difficult to obtain.

original: zhes pa la ngag gi dam tshig ni tshig gi brnga rnyed par dka' ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la ngag gi dam tshig ni tshig gi brnga rnyed par dka' ba ste /
translated: The pledge of speech is difficult to obtain,

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i dka' bas kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i dka' bas kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: means that it is not obtained even by the austerities of the Sravakas, etc.

original: ba lang sha ni 'bar ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //🔽de lnga rnal @131a * //
analyzed: ba lang sha ni 'bar ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o // de lnga rnal @131a * //
translated: The flesh of the cow is blazing, etc.

original: 'byor mchog tu gsungs //
analyzed: 'byor mchog tu gsungs //
translated: These five are said to be the supreme yoga.

original: zhes pa ni go ku da ha na la sogs pa dam tshig lnga yang dag par sbyor ba'i phul ni sbyor ba'i mchog tu gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni go ku da ha na la sogs pa dam tshig lnga yang dag par sbyor ba'i phul ni sbyor ba'i mchog tu gsungs so //
translated: The supreme union is said to be the union of the five pledges, such as the cow, etc.

original: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma ldan par //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma ldan par //
translated: The yoga is endowed with the yoginis.

original: zhes pa la rnal 'byor zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la rnal 'byor zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: The yogas are the five nectars.

original: rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni sha lnga'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni sha lnga'o //
translated: The yoginis are the five meats.

original: ldan zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga po dag gcig tu byas te gang bza' ba'o //
analyzed: ldan zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga po dag gcig tu byas te gang bza' ba'o //
translated: The union is the eating of the five nectars and the five meats, which have been made into one.

original: de'i yon tan gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i yon tan gsungs pa //
translated: The qualities of that are stated:

original: de tshe rnam rtog de thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhes pa ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'jig cing zad par 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de tshe rnam rtog de thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhes pa ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'jig cing zad par 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: All those discursive thoughts are destroyed at that time, means that all the discursive thoughts of the mind are destroyed and exhausted.

original: zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste //
analyzed: zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste //
translated: The name of the food is merit.

original: zhes pa la zan gyi ming ni bsod nams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la zan gyi ming ni bsod nams zhes bya'o //
translated: The name of the food is merit.

original: tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid //
analyzed: tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid //
translated: The vegetables are sin.

original: ces pa ni sha'i tshod ma srog gcod pa la sogs pa med par tshod ma med de des na tshod ma'i med ni sdig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni sha'i tshod ma srog gcod pa la sogs pa med par tshod ma med de des na tshod ma'i med ni sdig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since there are no vegetables without killing and so on, the absence of vegetables is called sin.

original: byis pa la ni 'gal ba nyid//
analyzed: byis pa la ni 'gal ba nyid//
translated: The children are contradiction.

original: ces pa ni byis pa shi ba la ni 'gal ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni byis pa shi ba la ni 'gal ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The dead children are called contradiction.

original: skyes pa la ni rdo rjer gsungs //
analyzed: skyes pa la ni rdo rjer gsungs //
translated: The man is said to be vajra.

original: zhes pa ni skyes pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni skyes pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: The vajra of the male is called the vajra.

original: bud med la ni snod bzangs nyid //
analyzed: bud med la ni snod bzangs nyid //
translated: The female is the excellent vessel.

original: ces pa ni shes rab ma'i padma'i ming ni snod bzangs zhes bya'o //🔽rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid //
analyzed: ces pa ni shes rab ma'i padma'i ming ni snod bzangs zhes bya'o // rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid //
translated: The lotus of the wisdom woman is called the excellent vessel.🔽The excellent passion is the excellent seeing.

original: ces pa ni rab tu chags pa na rab chags te bzang po mthong bas so //
analyzed: ces pa ni rab tu chags pa na rab chags te bzang po mthong bas so //
translated: When there is passion, there is the excellent passion, because of the excellent seeing.

original: ci zhe na padma mthong bas rab tu chags pa bzang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci zhe na padma mthong bas rab tu chags pa bzang por 'gyur ro //
translated: What is it? The excellent passion is the seeing of the lotus.

original: 'khyud pa la ni chos zhes brjod //
analyzed: 'khyud pa la ni chos zhes brjod //
translated: The embrace is called the Dharma.

original: ces pa ni chos 'byung gi rdo rje 'khyud pa gang yin pa de ni 'khyud pa ste chos su brjod do //
analyzed: ces pa ni chos 'byung gi rdo rje 'khyud pa gang yin pa de ni 'khyud pa ste chos su brjod do //
translated: The embrace of the vajra of the Dharma source is the embrace, which is called the Dharma.

original: 'dri ba la ni mar me'o //
analyzed: 'dri ba la ni mar me'o //
translated: The question is the lamp.

original: zhes pa la gsal bas mar me ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la gsal bas mar me ste /
translated: The lamp is the clear.

original: 'dod chags kyis gsal bar byed pas na mar me'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis gsal bar byed pas na mar me'o //
translated: Because of the clarity of passion, it is the lamp.

original: 'dri ba ni rdo rje chos 'byung 'dri bas na 'dri ba la mar me zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dri ba ni rdo rje chos 'byung 'dri bas na 'dri ba la mar me zhes bya'o //
translated: The question is the vajra Dharma source, because of the question. Therefore, the question is called the lamp.

original: shin tu 'dri la me zhes bya //
analyzed: shin tu 'dri la me zhes bya //
translated: The excellent question is the lamp.

original: zhes pa ni 'dod chags chen po'i me'i rdo rjes padma la rab tu 'dri bas na shin tu 'dri zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dod chags chen po'i me'i rdo rjes padma la rab tu 'dri bas na shin tu 'dri zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called very fragrant because of the fragrance of the lotus by the vajra of the fire of great passion.

original: 'gro ba la ni phreng can ma //
analyzed: 'gro ba la ni phreng can ma //
translated: The garland-bearer is in the going.

original: zhes pa la rdo rje padmar 'gro zhing song ba de ni phreng can ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la rdo rje padmar 'gro zhing song ba de ni phreng can ma zhes bya'o //
translated: In the going, in the vajra lotus, that is called the garland-bearer.

original: 'ong la shin tu phreng can ma //
analyzed: 'ong la shin tu phreng can ma //
translated: The very garland-bearer is in the coming.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje las byang chub kyi sems 'phro ba'i rnam pa 'ong ba de la ni shin tu phreng can ma zhes @131b bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje las byang chub kyi sems 'phro ba'i rnam pa 'ong ba de la ni shin tu phreng can ma zhes @131b bya'o ;
translated: In the coming, in the vajra, the form of the bodhicitta flowing, that is called the very garland-bearer.

original: ; myur ba la ni byug ces bya //
analyzed: ; myur ba la ni byug ces bya //
translated: The anointing is in the quick.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rjes padma la myur bar byug cing reg pa la sogs par 'gyur ba la byug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rjes padma la myur bar byug cing reg pa la sogs par 'gyur ba la byug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: In the quick, in the vajra, the anointing is in the form of the anointing of the lotus, the touching, and so on.

original: bldag la lce 'og ces bya ste //
analyzed: bldag la lce 'og ces bya ste //
translated: The tongue-under is in the sucking.

original: zhes pa ni padma'i 'og gi cha la lces pa ldags  pa de la lce 'og ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni padma'i 'og gi cha la lces pa ldags  pa de la lce 'og ces bya'o //
translated: In the sucking, in the part under the lotus, the tongue is called the tongue-under.

original: so la bza' ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: so la bza' ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The eating, and so on, are easy to understand.

original: 'di dag bshad do lag chen po //
analyzed: 'di dag bshad do lag chen po //
translated: These are explained, O Great Being.

original: zhes pa la 'di dag ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la 'di dag ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the intentional explanation.

original: lag chen po zhes pa ni lag na rdo rje la bod pa'o //
analyzed: lag chen po zhes pa ni lag na rdo rje la bod pa'o //
translated: The great hand is addressed to Vajrapāṇi.

original: shin tu phreng can ma zhes pa la sogs pa nas grags mthong ma zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / he ru ka dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rnam par dag pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i brda'i tshig ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: shin tu phreng can ma zhes pa la sogs pa nas grags mthong ma zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / he ru ka dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rnam par dag pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i brda'i tshig ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The twenty-four yoginīs beginning with very necklace up to renowned seen and the twenty-five maṇḍalas together with the heruka are the meaning of the words of the intentional explanation.

original: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The three worlds and so on are easy to understand.

original: sa bcu'i nang gi sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: sa bcu'i nang gi sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: The application within the ten stages should be explained.

original: nyer 'dun grong mtha' lhan cig ces pa ni lus dang nye ba'i 'dun pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dun pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyer 'dun grong mtha' lhan cig ces pa ni lus dang nye ba'i 'dun pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dun pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The body and desire is the meaning of desire for desire.

original: de gang zhe na ham ngo //
analyzed: de gang zhe na ham ngo //
translated: What is that? It is the haṃ.

original: lhan cig ces pa ni /
analyzed: lhan cig ces pa ni /
translated: The together is the sa.

original: bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin gyi zla tshes dang / thig le dang har ldan pa ni ham zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin gyi zla tshes dang / thig le dang har ldan pa ni ham zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The crescent moon, drop, and haṃ endowed with the nature of the five nectars is the meaning of haṃ.

original: 'dus pa'i phyi rol zhes su gsungs //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i phyi rol zhes su gsungs //
translated: It is said to be the outer gathering.

original: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi dbang po rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs kyis gang du 'dus pa zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi dbang po rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs kyis gang du 'dus pa zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The outer sense organs are said to be the gathering in the form of the maṇḍala.

original: nye ba'i 'dus pa zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor gang phung po la sogs pa thams cad 'dus pa de ni nye ba'i 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'dus pa zhes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor gang phung po la sogs pa thams cad 'dus pa de ni nye ba'i 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The inner gathering is the gathering of all the aggregates and so on in the emanation cakra.

original: nang de bzhin zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos 'byung du aa'i thig le'i nang gi dbus su sems dgong pa ni nang de bzhin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nang de bzhin zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos 'byung du aa'i thig le'i nang gi dbus su sems dgong pa ni nang de bzhin zhes bya'o //
translated: The inner gathering is the resting of the mind in the center of the bindu of āli in the dharmodaya of suchness.

original: gnas la 'bras bu zhes su gsungs //
analyzed: gnas la 'bras bu zhes su gsungs //
translated: The place is said to be the result.

original: zhes pa ni sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / bde ba chen po rnams la gnas su gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / bde ba chen po rnams la gnas su gsungs so ;
translated: The emanation, dharma, enjoyment, and great-bliss places are said to be the place.

original: ; nye ba'i gnas la shing nyid do //
analyzed: ; nye ba'i gnas la shing nyid do //
translated: The inner place is the tree.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i shing gi gzugs su gnas pa ni nye ba'i gnas su dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i shing gi gzugs su gnas pa ni nye ba'i gnas su dgongs so //
translated: The middle of the wheel is the place of the form of the tree of the avadhūtī, and is intended as the near place.

original: grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs //
analyzed: grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs //
translated: The seed is said to be in the outskirts of the town.

original: zhes pa na aa dang h'um dang aom dang ham rnams sa bon gyi gzugs la 'khor lo'i @132a * //
analyzed: zhes pa na aa dang h'um dang aom dang ham rnams sa bon gyi gzugs la 'khor lo'i @132a * //
translated: The a, hūṃ, āṃ, and haṃ are in the form of seeds, and are in the middle of the wheel.

original: dbus su gnas pa la grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su gnas pa la grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs zhes bya'o //
translated: The seed is said to be in the outskirts of the town.

original: nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o //🔽zhes pa ni bya gdong gi khong stong gi myu gu ni grong mtha' ste /
analyzed: nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o // zhes pa ni bya gdong gi khong stong gi myu gu ni grong mtha' ste /
translated: The sprout is in the outskirts of the near town.🔽The sprout in the hollow of the bird-faced [channel] is the outskirts of the town.

original: des na myu gu ste bya gdong la grong mtha' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na myu gu ste bya gdong la grong mtha' zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the sprout is the outskirts of the bird-faced [channel].

original: tshogs pa la ni sdong bur gsungs //
analyzed: tshogs pa la ni sdong bur gsungs //
translated: The trunk is said to be in the gathering.

original: zhes pa la sdong bu ni aa wa dh'u t'i ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sdong bu ni aa wa dh'u t'i ste /
translated: The trunk is the avadhūtī.

original: gnas der byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i tshogs 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gnas der byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i tshogs 'gro ba ste /
translated: The gathering of the bindus of bodhicitta moves in that place.

original: des na tshogs pa la ni sdong bu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na tshogs pa la ni sdong bu zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the gathering is said to be the trunk.

original: gcig pu la ni 'dang mar gsungs //
analyzed: gcig pu la ni 'dang mar gsungs //
translated: The single is said to be the branch.

original: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po gcig pu nyid kyis sdig pa dang dmyal ba las skyob pas na 'dab ma ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po gcig pu nyid kyis sdig pa dang dmyal ba las skyob pas na 'dab ma ste /
translated: This is the petal, since the single great bliss alone protects from sin and hell.

original: des na gcig pu la 'dab ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na gcig pu la 'dab ma zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, the single one is called the petal.

original: stong pa la ni rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa la ni rtsa ba'o //
translated: The root is in the void.

original: zhes pa la stong pa zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa la stong pa zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Here, the void is the nature of wisdom.

original: rtsa ba zhes pa ni mdud pa gsum gyi rtsa ba ste gzhi zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rtsa ba zhes pa ni mdud pa gsum gyi rtsa ba ste gzhi zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The root is the root of the three knots, meaning the basis.

original: des na stong pa la rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na stong pa la rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, the void is called the root.

original: de ltar sa bcu pa la sogs pas bshad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar sa bcu pa la sogs pas bshad par rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it should be understood that the ten stages and so forth are explained.

original: de ltar dgongs pas bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de ltar dgongs pas bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Thus, the intentional explanation and so forth are easy to understand.

original: kye lags zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: kye lags zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: O friend means O friend.

original: grogs mo zhes pa ni bshes mo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: grogs mo zhes pa ni bshes mo zhes pa'o //
translated: Friend means female friend.

original: 'gro kun gang zhes pa ni gang gis bde ba dang bral na 'gro ba mtha' dag la thabs med ces pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro kun gang zhes pa ni gang gis bde ba dang bral na 'gro ba mtha' dag la thabs med ces pa'o //
translated: What is the case for all beings means that if one is separated from bliss, there is no means for all beings.

original: mtha' dag dri ma med pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid ma gtogs par bden brdzun mtha' dag ci yang ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //🔽blta dang bral ba skye bo ltos //
analyzed: mtha' dag dri ma med pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid ma gtogs par bden brdzun mtha' dag ci yang ma yin no zhes pa'i don to // blta dang bral ba skye bo ltos //
translated: The meaning of “all is stainless” is that, except for emptiness, nothing at all is true or false.🔽“ Look at the people who are free from being seen!”

original: zhes pa ni blta bar bya ba dang bral ba la skye bo ltos shig pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni blta bar bya ba dang bral ba la skye bo ltos shig pa ste /
translated: The meaning is that one should look at the people who are free from being seen.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag gis stong pa nyid du ltos shig ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag gis stong pa nyid du ltos shig ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should look at emptiness, the totality of the world.

original: gsog gsob rang bzhin brdzun slu ba //
analyzed: gsog gsob rang bzhin brdzun slu ba //
translated: “ Empty, hollow, false, deceptive!”

original: zhes pa ni gsog gsob kyi sngags kyi sgra dang bral na slu zhing brdzun par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsog gsob kyi sngags kyi sgra dang bral na slu zhing brdzun par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, free from the sound of the mantra “empty, hollow,” one becomes deceptive and false.

original: pad rtsa'i grib ma lta bur ltos //
analyzed: pad rtsa'i grib ma lta bur ltos //
translated: “ Look at the shadow of the lotus root!”

original: zhes pa ni padma'i rtsa ba'i grib ma la ngang pa lta ba de bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor pa rtsa'i grib ma lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bur bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni padma'i rtsa ba'i grib ma la ngang pa lta ba de bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor pa rtsa'i grib ma lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bur bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The meaning is that, just as a swan looks at the shadow of the lotus root, the divine yogin should meditate on the shadow-like nāḍī and the illusion-like .

original: blta bar bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the object of seeing?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: dbang po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing //
analyzed: dbang po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing //
translated: The five sense faculties are like illusions,

original: zhes pa la dbang po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bur bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la dbang po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bur bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should meditate on the five faculties as being like an illusion and like a dream.

original: lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni /
translated: The nature of the five aggregates is pure means

original: phung po lnga mngon par rdzogs @132b par sangs rgyas kyi gzhan ni sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga mngon par rdzogs @132b par sangs rgyas kyi gzhan ni sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: that the five aggregates are fully enlightened, and the others are not enlightened.

original: rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub //
translated: This yoga is accomplished by meditation.

original: ces pa ni phung po lnga po 'di ni rnal 'byor bsgoms pas bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa ni phung po lnga po 'di ni rnal 'byor bsgoms pas bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that the five aggregates are accomplished by the nature of concentration through the meditation of yoga.

original: 'o'i sgra ni le'u rdzogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'o'i sgra ni le'u rdzogs pa'i don to //
translated: The word o means the completion of the chapter.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga ba'o //
translated: From the Buddhakapala Tantra, this is the fifth chapter on the explanation of the good medicine and the intention.

original: // de nas zhes pa de ni sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: // de nas zhes pa de ni sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Then, after the good medicine and the explanation of the intention,

original: rab bshad pa zhes pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rab bshad pa zhes pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: well explained means taught.

original: ci zhe na dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhe na dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa'o //
translated: What? The mandala of fear.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la dkyil ni snying po'o //🔽'khor ni len pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la dkyil ni snying po'o // 'khor ni len pa ste /
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: mchog bzang zhes pa la mchog ni snying po'o //
analyzed: mchog bzang zhes pa la mchog ni snying po'o //
translated: mandala means:
