analyzed: bzang po ni phul du byung ba ste bshad ces sbyar ro // shes rab thabs kyi sgrub pa yis //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma dag gi sbyor bas de kho na nyid bshad pa'o //🔽gang gis slob ma dbang bskur bar //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma dag gi sbyor bas de kho na nyid bshad pa'o // gang gis slob ma dbang bskur bar //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: zhes pa ni gang gis slob ma bkrus shing dbang bskur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gang gis slob ma bkrus shing dbang bskur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: shes rab padma'i nang dbus su //🔽zhes pa ni shes rab kyi chos 'byung gi nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su slob ma dbang bskur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: shes rab padma'i nang dbus su // zhes pa ni shes rab kyi chos 'byung gi nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su slob ma dbang bskur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: ko ti zhes pa ni mtha' ste mdud pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: ko ti zhes pa ni mtha' ste mdud pa'i gnas so //
translated: mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:🔽mandala means:

original: yo dza na ni zhes pa ni der sems sbyor bar byed pas na yo dza na ni ste dpag tshad do //
analyzed: yo dza na ni zhes pa ni der sems sbyor bar byed pas na yo dza na ni ste dpag tshad do //
translated: Yojana means “to join the mind there,” thus it is a yojana.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la dkyil ni snying po'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la dkyil ni snying po'o //
translated: Maṇḍala means “center” and “circle,” thus it is a maṇḍala.

original: 'khor ni len pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor ni len pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “to take” is “to take up.”

original: sum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus //
analyzed: sum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus //
translated: The body is pure, with three layers.

original: zhes pa ni chos 'byung khong stong dang ze'u 'brur bcas pa ni sum brtsegs te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos 'byung khong stong dang ze'u 'brur bcas pa ni sum brtsegs te /
translated: The empty interior of the source of phenomena, together with the anthers, are the three layers.

original: rnam par dag pa'i lha dang ldan //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i lha dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the pure deity,

original: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: is the meaning of the verse.

original: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa //
translated: It protects from the fear of samsara.

original: zhes pa la 'jigs pa ni 'jigs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la 'jigs pa ni 'jigs par byed pa ste /
translated: Fear is that which causes fear.

original: 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed pas na skyob pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed pas na skyob pa'o //
translated: Since it liberates from samsara, it is a protector.

original: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the center of that maṇḍala,

original: zhes pa ni de'i dkyil 'khor de'i sar gnas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i dkyil 'khor de'i sar gnas te /
translated: the place of that maṇḍala,

original: lha'i de kho na nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ston pa'o //🔽mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur //
analyzed: lha'i de kho na nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ston pa'o // mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur //
translated: the master should teach the deity’s reality, the connate gnosis.

original: zhes pa ni bla ma la @133a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bla ma la @133a * //
translated: The wise one should confer empowerment on the good disciple.🔽The guru should confer empowerment on the disciple.

original: gus pa'i slob ma la der dbang bskur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gus pa'i slob ma la der dbang bskur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: “Initiate the respectful disciple there.”

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor bya ba min //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor bya ba min //
translated: The outer maṇḍala should not be made.

original: zhes pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor byas pa ni byang chub las ring par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor byas pa ni byang chub las ring par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “Making the outer maṇḍala is far from enlightenment.”

original: ji ltar zhe na dkyil 'khor rdul tshon gyis bri bar byas nas slar 'jig par byas pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na dkyil 'khor rdul tshon gyis bri bar byas nas slar 'jig par byas pas so //
translated: How so? Having drawn the maṇḍala with colored powders, it is destroyed again.

original: lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely destroying the deities,

original: sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur //
translated: a great sin is produced.

original: zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor mi bya zhing nang gi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor mi bya zhing nang gi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: the meaning is: “The outer maṇḍala should not be made, and initiation should be conferred in the inner maṇḍala.”

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus,

original: lus kyi de nyid mi shes pa'i //
analyzed: lus kyi de nyid mi shes pa'i //
translated: those who do not know the reality of the body,

original: rnal 'byor phyi yi sbyor dga' ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor phyi yi sbyor dga' ba //
translated: are yogis who delight in outer union,

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong la ni 'bras bu med //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong la ni 'bras bu med //
translated: have no result in the eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid kyis na nang gi rnal 'byor ni mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na nang gi rnal 'byor ni mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the inner yoga becomes supreme.

original: gang gis spyan drangs shing zhes pa ni gang gis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid lus la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis spyan drangs shing zhes pa ni gang gis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid lus la gnas pa yin no //
translated: Who invited? means that the Tathagata who invited is present in the body.

original: gang gis gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni yang de nyid nang na gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni yang de nyid nang na gnas pa yin no //
translated: Who requested to depart? means that he is present in the inner space.

original: gang na'ang bzhugs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang na'ang bzhugs pa ma yin no //
translated: He is not present anywhere.

original: zhes pa ni gnas gang na'ang mi gnas te rang gi sems nyid la gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnas gang na'ang mi gnas te rang gi sems nyid la gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: means that he is not present in any place, which is to say, he is present in one's own mind.

original: lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo zhes pa ni dbyangs yig bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi shes rab ma lo bcu gnyis ma'o //
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo zhes pa ni dbyangs yig bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi shes rab ma lo bcu gnyis ma'o //
translated: The twelve-year-old girl means that the wisdom consort, who is the nature of the twelve vowels, is twelve years old.

original: ka ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: ka ni bde ba'o //
translated: Ka is bliss.

original: n+ya ni 'dren pa ste dga' ba la sogs pa rim bzhin du skyed par byed pas na ka n+ya ste bu mo'o //
analyzed: n+ya ni 'dren pa ste dga' ba la sogs pa rim bzhin du skyed par byed pas na ka n+ya ste bu mo'o //
translated: Nya is the guide, which is to say, the one who generates joy and so on in sequence, and so she is a girl.

original: tshul khrims ma nyams pa zhes pa nas dul zhes pa'i bar gyi yon tan bcu gnyis dang ldan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshul khrims ma nyams pa zhes pa nas dul zhes pa'i bar gyi yon tan bcu gnyis dang ldan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: She has the twelve qualities, from unbroken moral discipline up to tamed, which is to say, she is praised by the tathagatas.

original: de nas zhes pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Then is easy to understand.

original: de rnams la ni de nyid bshad //
analyzed: de rnams la ni de nyid bshad //
translated: To them, that reality is explained.

original: ces pa ni slob ma gus pa de rnams la de kho na nyid bshad cing bstan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ces pa ni slob ma gus pa de rnams la de kho na nyid bshad cing bstan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means to those disciples who have devotion, that reality is explained and taught.

original: gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni //
analyzed: gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni //
translated: The outer five of the secret,

original: zhes pa la gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa la gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
translated: Secret is the secret empowerment.

original: lnga ni phyi'i dbang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lnga ni phyi'i dbang zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Five is the meaning of outer empowerment.🔽The seven and the fourteen are explained,

original: bdun dang bcu bzhi bshad pa dang // zhes pa la bdun ni dbang bdun te slob dpon gyi dbang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bdun dang bcu bzhi bshad pa dang // zhes pa la bdun ni dbang bdun te slob dpon gyi dbang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Seven is the seven empowerments, the meaning of master empowerment.

original: bcu bzhi zhes pa ni de kho na nyid bcu bzhi rnam par dag pa'i dbang mtha' dag go //
analyzed: bcu bzhi zhes pa ni de kho na nyid bcu bzhi rnam par dag pa'i dbang mtha' dag go //
translated: Fourteen is the complete empowerment of the fourteen totally pure realities.🔽The two combined into one,

original: gnyi ga gcig tu 'dus pa zhes pa la @133b gnyi ga ni shes rab dang ye shes so //
analyzed: gnyi ga gcig tu 'dus pa zhes pa la @133b gnyi ga ni shes rab dang ye shes so //
translated: Two is wisdom and timeless awareness.

original: 'dus pa zhes pa ni bsres na bcu bzhir 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes pa ni bsres na bcu bzhir 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Combined means that when they are combined, there are fourteen.

original: gang du de kho na nyid bshad snyam pa la de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang du de kho na nyid bshad snyam pa la de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Where is that reality explained?

original: gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the secret reality.

original: zhes pa la gsang ba ni bde ba chen po'i gnas so //
analyzed: zhes pa la gsang ba ni bde ba chen po'i gnas so //
translated: Here, the secret is the place of great bliss.

original: der de kho na nyid bshad cing bstan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: der de kho na nyid bshad cing bstan zhes pa'o //
translated: There, the reality is explained and taught.

original: su la zhe na /
analyzed: su la zhe na /
translated: To whom?

original: slob ma la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: slob ma la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: To the disciple, is the meaning.🔽According to some, the secret is explained as the knot of the emanation wheel.

original: kha cig gi gsung gis ni gsang ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa mtshon par bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: kha cig gi gsung gis ni gsang ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa mtshon par bya bar bshad do //
translated: And it is said:

original: de yang / bzhi mdo mtshan gcig chu bo'i 'gram //
analyzed: de yang / bzhi mdo mtshan gcig chu bo'i 'gram //
translated: At a crossroads, on a riverbank,

original: der ni ri khrod gnas byas pa //
analyzed: der ni ri khrod gnas byas pa //
translated: there, having made a mountain retreat,

original: gdong lnga ba ni gzung mi nus //
analyzed: gdong lnga ba ni gzung mi nus //
translated: the five-faced one cannot be grasped,

original: glang chen mchog kyang ring bar bsam //
analyzed: glang chen mchog kyang ring bar bsam //
translated: and the supreme elephant is thought to be far away.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang /
translated: And it is also said:

original: gang du yid rlung rgyu med pas //
analyzed: gang du yid rlung rgyu med pas //
translated: Where the mind-wind does not move,

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer 'jug pa med //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer 'jug pa med //
translated: the sun's rays do not enter,

original: bla mas bshad pa'i man ngag gis //
analyzed: bla mas bshad pa'i man ngag gis //
translated: by the guru's explanatory instruction,

original: der ni sgrub po'i sems ngal bsos //🔽zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: der ni sgrub po'i sems ngal bsos // zhes gsungs so ;
translated: there the practitioner's mind rests.

original: ; slob ma legs dang ldan zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ; slob ma legs dang ldan zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The disciple who is endowed with good qualities, etc. is easy to understand.🔽

original: slob mas gsol ba gdab pa'i tshigs bcad gsungs pa /
analyzed: slob mas gsol ba gdab pa'i tshigs bcad gsungs pa /
translated: The disciple recites the verse of supplication:

original: 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mgon po zhes pa'i mthar thug pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs bcad do //
analyzed: 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mgon po zhes pa'i mthar thug pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs bcad do //
translated: The verse from cyclic life up to protector is the supplication.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The verse from thus is easy to understand.

original: man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni //
analyzed: man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni //
translated: The parts of this instruction

original: glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min //
analyzed: glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min //
translated: are not the domain of the books.

original: zhes pa la de kho na nyid 'di ni glegs bam la mi bri'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la de kho na nyid 'di ni glegs bam la mi bri'o //
translated: This reality is not written in the books.

original: 'o na gang las shes na /🔽bla ma'i kha las shes par bya //
analyzed: 'o na gang las shes na / bla ma'i kha las shes par bya //
translated: If it is asked, Well, from where is it known?

original: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: it is the meaning of it is known from the guru's mouth.

original: dkyil 'khor gang la gang gis brgyan //🔽zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gang la lha gang gis brgyan te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gang la gang gis brgyan // zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gang la lha gang gis brgyan te /
translated: What is the ornament of which maṇḍala?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis brgyan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis brgyan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the meaning of the ornament of the maṇḍala of the Bhagavān’s mind.

original: de nyid kyis na phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the outer maṇḍala should not be drawn.

original: mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kye //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kye //
translated: The meaning of the sign is arranged elsewhere.

original: zhes pa la mtshan ma ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: zhes pa la mtshan ma ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o//
translated: The sign is the vajra, etc.

original: don gzhan zhes pa ni don gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: don gzhan zhes pa ni don gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The other meaning is the other transformation.

original: gar bkod ces pa ni gnas gang du bkod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gar bkod ces pa ni gnas gang du bkod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Where is it placed? means in what place is it placed?

original: kye zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: kye zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: The hey is an exclamation.

original: su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kyi //
analyzed: su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kyi //
translated: By whom is the Buddha invited?

original: zhes pa la su yis zhes pa ni gang gis zhes pa'i don to //🔽sangs rgyas spyan drangs @134a * //🔽zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la su yis zhes pa ni gang gis zhes pa'i don to // sangs rgyas spyan drangs @134a * // zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku ste /
translated: The by whom means by what.🔽The Buddha invited is the Buddha's body.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lus spyan drangs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lus spyan drangs pa'o //
translated: The Buddha's body invited is the Buddha's body invited.

original: gang gis spyan drangs zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis spyan drangs zhe na /
translated: By whom is it invited?

original: sems kyis zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽'gro ba brdzun dra'i som nyid ltung //
analyzed: sems kyis zhes pa'i tha tshig go // 'gro ba brdzun dra'i som nyid ltung //
translated: The by mind is the meaning.

original: zhes pa ni brdzun rtsi dra ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni brdzun rtsi dra ba ste /
translated: The world falls into the net of false doubt is the net of false praise.

original: mig 'phrul lta bu la 'gro ba rnams the tshom skyes pa'o //
analyzed: mig 'phrul lta bu la 'gro ba rnams the tshom skyes pa'o //
translated: The world is the people who are born. The doubt is the doubt about the magic show.

original: de nyid kyis na sems can brdzun zhing mig 'phrul lta bu'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sems can brdzun zhing mig 'phrul lta bu'o //
translated: Therefore, sentient beings are false and like a magic show.

original: de lta bu mthong nas 'gro ba rnams the tshom skyes zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu mthong nas 'gro ba rnams the tshom skyes zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that.

original: mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye //
analyzed: mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye //
translated: The entire void is unstained.

original: zhes pa ni mtha' dag stong pa la dri mas spags pa dang bral bas na gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mtha' dag stong pa la dri mas spags pa dang bral bas na gos pa med pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the entire void is free from the defilement of stains, and so is unstained.

original: kye zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: kye zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: The exclamation “Hey!” is an expression of surprise.

original: des na thams cad stong pa nyid dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: des na thams cad stong pa nyid dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that the entire void is stainless by nature.

original: chu nang zla ba ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: chu nang zla ba ci 'dra ba //
translated: Like the moon in water,

original: zhes pa ni chu'i nang gi zla ba ci 'dra ba de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chu'i nang gi zla ba ci 'dra ba de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that the maṇḍala wheel is like the moon in water.🔽The maṇḍala in the center of a lotus

original: de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus zhes pa ni de dang 'dra ba padma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ste /🔽chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du chud pa'i chu'i zla ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus zhes pa ni de dang 'dra ba padma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ste / chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du chud pa'i chu'i zla ba lta bu ste /
translated: is like that.

original: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the maṇḍala of Heruka is like the moon in water, which is contained within the source of phenomena.

original: kye lags rnal 'byor ma tshogs ltos //
analyzed: kye lags rnal 'byor ma tshogs ltos //
translated: Hey! Look at the assembly of yoginīs!

original: zhes pa ni padma'i nang der rtsa'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs ltos zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni padma'i nang der rtsa'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs ltos zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that one should look at the assembly of yoginis in the form of channels in the lotus.

original: de ni he ru ka gcig dang zhes pa ni de he ru ka gcig pus blta ba ste gnas der he ru ka gcig pu 'ba' zhig byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin du blta zhes pa'i tha tshig go //🔽thams cad skyed par byed ces pa ni //
analyzed: de ni he ru ka gcig dang zhes pa ni de he ru ka gcig pus blta ba ste gnas der he ru ka gcig pu 'ba' zhig byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin du blta zhes pa'i tha tshig go // thams cad skyed par byed ces pa ni //
translated: One should look at that as the single Heruka means that one should look at that as the single Heruka, which means that one should look at the single Heruka alone in that place as the nature of bodhicitta.

original: thams cad skyed pa'i gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad skyed pa'i gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It generates everything means the place that generates everything, which is the meaning.

original: 'gro kun rmi lam slu ba zhes pa ni ji ltar rmi lam du bud med bzang mo dang sbyor ba mthong ba de ltar thams cad blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro kun rmi lam slu ba zhes pa ni ji ltar rmi lam du bud med bzang mo dang sbyor ba mthong ba de ltar thams cad blta bar bya ste /
translated: All beings are deceived by dreams means that one should look at everything as if one sees a beautiful woman and unites with her in a dream.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag rmi lam gyis slu zhes pa'i don to //🔽gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag rmi lam gyis slu zhes pa'i don to // gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos //
translated: The meaning is that all beings are deceived by dreams.

original: zhes pa ni gti mug las skyes pa ltos shig pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gti mug las skyes pa ltos shig pa ste /
translated: Look at what is generated from delusion means look at what is generated from delusion.

original: gti mug las rnam par rtog pa thams cad bskyed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gti mug las rnam par rtog pa thams cad bskyed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that all concepts are generated from delusion.

original: ltos zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje la sna tshogs sde mas bod pa'o //
analyzed: ltos zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje la sna tshogs sde mas bod pa'o //
translated: The look is addressed to Vajrapāṇi by Viśvarūpa.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The Buddhakapāla has been explained.

original: dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa 'jigs par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa 'jigs par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur bar bya ba ste /
translated: The mandala of fear is the mandala that generates fear of conceptualization, and it is here that the consecration is to be performed.

original: @134b de'i le'u ni drug pa'o /
analyzed: @134b de'i le'u ni drug pa'o /
translated: This is the sixth chapter.

original: // / da ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /🔽de nas zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: // / da ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste / de nas zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Now the drawing of the outer mandala is to be done.

original: lha bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: lha bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Then, after the consecration mandala has been taught, the mandala of the generation of the deity is to be taught.

original: ri'i phug dang tshang tshing ngam //
analyzed: ri'i phug dang tshang tshing ngam //
translated: In a mountain cave or a thicket, etc.

original: zhes pa la bde ba chen po mi g-yo ba'i bdag nyid kyis na ri'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la bde ba chen po mi g-yo ba'i bdag nyid kyis na ri'o //
translated: A mountain is a mountain because of the immobility of the nature of great bliss.

original: dman pa'i sems can rnams kyis gting dpag par mi nus pas na phug go //
analyzed: dman pa'i sems can rnams kyis gting dpag par mi nus pas na phug go //
translated: A cave is a cave because it cannot be fathomed by inferior beings.

original: bdud rtsi'i khung bur gyur pas na tshang tshing ngo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i khung bur gyur pas na tshang tshing ngo //
translated: A thicket is a thicket because it is a source of nectar.

original: yang na dur khro dang ni zhes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du lhag par gnas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang na dur khro dang ni zhes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du lhag par gnas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Or else, “charnel ground” means that the mind of all sentient beings abides in equality.

original: gdod nas grub pa zhes pa ni rtag tu grub pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa 'char ba dang nub pa dang bral ba rtag tu nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bde ba chen po'i rnam pa gang du nyams su myong ba de'i rang bzhin du bya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: gdod nas grub pa zhes pa ni rtag tu grub pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa 'char ba dang nub pa dang bral ba rtag tu nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bde ba chen po'i rnam pa gang du nyams su myong ba de'i rang bzhin du bya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: “Primordially established” means that the nature of that which is always established, perfect, free from rising and setting, always equal to space, the form of great bliss, should be applied.

original: rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhes pa ni de dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i shes rab ma'i chu skyes ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhes pa ni de dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i shes rab ma'i chu skyes ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo //
translated: “Ocean shore” means that the lotus of the wisdom mother who is united with that is the ocean shore.

original: shes rab ma gcig gi chos 'byung la yang yon tan lnga dang ldan par gsungs so //
analyzed: shes rab ma gcig gi chos 'byung la yang yon tan lnga dang ldan par gsungs so //
translated: It is said that the single lotus of the wisdom mother also has five qualities.

original: yang na shes rab ma yang lngar gsungs te /
analyzed: yang na shes rab ma yang lngar gsungs te /
translated: Or else, five wisdom mothers are mentioned.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: de nyid bshad pa /🔽ri phug ces pa ni lo bcu gcig ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa / ri phug ces pa ni lo bcu gcig ma'o //
translated: That is explained.🔽“Mountain cave” is the eleven-year-old.

original: tshang tshing zhes pa ni lo bcu gnyis ma'o //
analyzed: tshang tshing zhes pa ni lo bcu gnyis ma'o //
translated: “Thicket” is the twelve-year-old.

original: dur khrod ces pa ni lo bcu drug ma'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ces pa ni lo bcu drug ma'o //
translated: The charnel ground is a sixteen-year-old.

original: gdod nas grub pa zhes pa ni lo nyi shu ma'o //
analyzed: gdod nas grub pa zhes pa ni lo nyi shu ma'o //
translated: The naturally formed is a twenty-year-old.

original: rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhes pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhes pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'o //
translated: The ocean shore is a twenty-five-year-old.

original: lo bcu gcig ma ni bcud kyis len pa sgrub pa la'o //
analyzed: lo bcu gcig ma ni bcud kyis len pa sgrub pa la'o //
translated: The eleven-year-old is for the accomplishment of the elixir.

original: lo bcu gnyis ma ni shin tu chags pa'i dam tshig gi don du bstan to //
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis ma ni shin tu chags pa'i dam tshig gi don du bstan to //
translated: The twelve-year-old is taught for the purpose of the pledge of great passion.

original: lo bcu drug ma dang sngags la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: lo bcu drug ma dang sngags la goms par bya'o //
translated: The sixteen-year-old is for the practice of mantra.

original: lo nyi shu ma dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba sgrub po //
analyzed: lo nyi shu ma dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba sgrub po //
translated: The twenty-year-old is for the accomplishment of flying in space.

original: lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma ni dbang bskur ba'i don du'o zhes pa 'di dag thams cad bshad do //
analyzed: lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma ni dbang bskur ba'i don du'o zhes pa 'di dag thams cad bshad do //
translated: The twenty-five-year-old is for the purpose of consecration. All of these are explained.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The outer maṇḍala and so on are easy to understand.🔽The three-storied palace and so on is as follows:🔽 The three-storied palace is the triple-storied celestial mansion.🔽 The round is the round celestial mansion surrounded by a vajra garland.🔽 The wheel is the wheel drawn inside the celestial mansion.

original: pho brang rim gsum zlum po la //
analyzed: pho brang rim gsum zlum po la //
translated: The three-storied palace is the triple-storied celestial mansion.🔽 The round is the round celestial mansion surrounded by a vajra garland.

original: zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi nag du rim pa gsum pa rdo rje'i phreng bas zlum por bskor ba'i 'khor lo bri zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi nag du rim pa gsum pa rdo rje'i phreng bas zlum por bskor ba'i 'khor lo bri zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The wheel is the wheel drawn inside the celestial mansion.

original: rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor //
translated: Surrounded by the three vajras.

original: zhes pa ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje nag pos bskor zhes @135a * //🔽pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje nag pos bskor zhes @135a * // pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means surrounded by a three-pointed black vajra.🔽The outer square, even,

original: phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa zhes pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du gru zhi lham pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa zhes pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du gru zhi lham pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means that outside the vajra garland there is an even square.

original: sgo bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: sgo bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The four doors, etc., are easy to understand.🔽The twenty-five lotuses and suns

original: padma nyi ma nyi shu lnga'i zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbus su nyi ma'i gdan lnga'o //
analyzed: padma nyi ma nyi shu lnga'i zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbus su nyi ma'i gdan lnga'o //
translated: means that in the center of the wheel there are five sun seats.

original: de'i phyi rol du yang nyi ma'i gdan brgyad do //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du yang nyi ma'i gdan brgyad do //
translated: Outside of that there are eight sun seats.

original: sgo bzhir nyi ma'i gdan bzhi dgod do //
analyzed: sgo bzhir nyi ma'i gdan bzhi dgod do //
translated: In the four doors there are four sun seats.

original: de'i dbus chud sa bon ni //
analyzed: de'i dbus chud sa bon ni //
translated: In the center of that, the seed.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbus kyi nyi ma'i steng du h'um bsam pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbus kyi nyi ma'i steng du h'um bsam pa ste /
translated: This means that on top of the sun in the center of the wheel one should imagine a hūṃ.

original: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i sa bon h'um dang phreng bzangs ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams sgo nga las skye ba'i rim pas ka la sogs pa'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi sa bon du 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i sa bon h'um dang phreng bzangs ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams sgo nga las skye ba'i rim pas ka la sogs pa'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi sa bon du 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The seed of the Blessed Heruka is hūṃ, and the goddesses such as Supriyā are the twenty-four seed syllables such as ka, in the manner of birth from an egg.

original: skad cig tsam gyis zhes pa la skad cig ste /
analyzed: skad cig tsam gyis zhes pa la skad cig ste /
translated: In an instant means

original: myur bar rdzus te skye ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i tshe lha thams cad bskyed par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: myur bar rdzus te skye ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i tshe lha thams cad bskyed par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: in a moment, quickly, in the manner of miraculous birth, when the Blessed One is generated, all the deities are generated.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag mtshan gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag mtshan gsungs pa /
translated: The Blessed One’s hand implements are taught:🔽In the right [hands] are a ḍamaru and flaying knife,

original: g-yas na cang te'u dang gri gug go //
analyzed: g-yas na cang te'u dang gri gug go //
translated: and in the left [hands] a skull and a khaṭvāṅga.
